A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, tãn-paalga la wʋn botɩ fu-kɛka la ãagɛ mɛ gãnna kʋrʋm na.
La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wɔ-kɛgsɩ pʋam.
A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wɔɔsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ, tɩ dãam na, la wɔɔsɩ la wuu sã'am.
La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wɔ-paalsɩ pʋam.» Vo'osgo daarɛ yelle Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan dɔla vatɔ pʋam tɔlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kɔ si wẽena ɔbra.
Tɩ Farisi dõma yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bɩsɛ, bẽm tɩ ba ɩta sɛla n sisri vo'osgo daarɛ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kɔm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ ba bɔɔra dia tɩ ba di, tɩ Adavidi yʋʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, wakat-sɛka tɩ Abiata de Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la?
A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego la pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bĩŋe bɔ Nawẽnnɛ na obe.
La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma mã'a.
La Adavidi yʋʋn obe ba mɛ, dee bɔ nẽr-sɛba n boe a zẽ'am na.» Azezi yele bɛla dee le yele ba yetɩ: «La de la nẽrsaala ĩyã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ vo'osgo daarɛ, a ka ẽŋɛ nẽrsaala vo'osgo daarɛ ĩyã.
Bɛla, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe sɛla woo, baa la vo'osgo daarɛ.»
Bʋraa nu'ugo n ki, tɩ Azezi botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi le kẽ la Zifdõma wẽndeem.
Tɩ bʋraa bɔna mĩ tɩ a nu'ugo ki.
Tɩ ba bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ bʋraa la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Ba daan eerɩ la ba doose bilam dõrɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: «Isge ze'ele tẽŋasʋka.» Dee soke sɛba n bɩsrɩ ẽ na yetɩ: «Sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em?
Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?» Tɩ ba sĩna.
Tɩ Azezi sũure yĩige, tɩ a bɩsɛ nẽrba la kaagɛ, tɩ a sũure sã'am, ba sũure n kɛ la ĩyã.
La a yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la.» Tɩ a tẽegɛ, tɩ nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
Tɩ Farisi dõma yese tɔtɔ ka bãm la naba A'erɔdɩ nẽrba bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi.
Nẽrba zozo'e n lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am Galile mõgrʋm Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ la Galile mõgrʋm bɔba.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ze'ele Galile, la Zude, la Zerizalɛm, la Idume, la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa doone, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm Tiiri la Sidõ doose ẽ.
Nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la daan wõm na ẽn ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba vuta õorŋɔ lɛm na tɩ nẽrba la da wa mike ẽ.
A daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, bɛla tɩ bã'adõma wuu daan mikra taaba bɔɔra tɩ ba paagɛ kalʋm ẽ.
La kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ nẽr-sɛba la sãn ẽn yẽ ẽ, ba luti la a nẽŋam kaasra tagursi yɛta tɩ: «Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.» Tɩ Azezi daan zɛbɛ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yetɩ, ba da botɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n de nẽr-sɛka.
Azezi looge a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi La bɛla poorʋm Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom na tãŋa zuo, dee wi nẽr-sɛba tɩ a boorɩ la tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am.
Tɩ a looge nẽrba pia la ayi tɩ ba bɔna la ẽ, tɩ a tõnna ba tɩ ba sẽnna mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga, dee bɔ ba pãŋa tɩ ba digra kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yɛsra.
Sɛba tɩ a looge la daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azebede dayɔɔsɩ Azakɩ la a yɩbga Azã, tɩ a sɩ ba yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Bʋanɛrgɛsɩ.
A võorɛ de la nẽrba n ãn wʋ sa-dãmŋɔ.
La A'ãndre, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi, la Amatie, la Atoma, la Alfe dayʋa Azakɩ, la Atade, la Asimõ sɛka n de Zelɔtɩ nẽra ayɩla la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo, sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi la.
Azezi pãŋa gãnnɩ Asũtãana La Azezi daan kule la yire, tɩ nẽrba le lagsɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ka yẽ folle wʋn di.
Tɩ ba daan yetɩ Azezi yirsri mɛ, tɩ a yir-dõma wõm bɛla sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Zerizalɛm wa'am wa yetɩ: «Abelzebuli n dolɩ ẽ, la de la ẽŋa n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ tɩ ba yɛsra.» Tɩ Azezi wi ba, makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Asũtãana wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne dige Asũtãana?
So'olʋm ayɩla nẽrba sãn welge zɛbra taaba, so'olʋm ẽŋa wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
La yire ayɩla dõma sãn welge zɛbra taaba, yi-ẽŋa wʋn wõrgɛ mɛ.
La Asũtãana sãn isge zɛbɛ la a mẽŋa welge, a pãŋa la ba'asɛ mɛ, a kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele.
La nẽra ka tã wʋn kẽ pãŋa dãana yire ka vaagɛ a lɔgrɔ, sãn dagna tɩ a dẽŋɛ lʋ pãŋa dãana la mɛ, dee vaagɛ a lɔgrɔ la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn basɛ nẽrsaalba tõon-be'ero la wuu tɩ ba ɩtɩ la, la ba pɔ'ɔrɛ yetɔga la wuu taalɛ.
La nẽra sãn pɔ'ɔgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn malɩn basɛ ẽ taalɛ.
Tõon-be'e-ẽna taalɛ boe la a dãana zuo wakatɛ wuu.» Ban yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ na ĩyã, tɩ a yele bɛla.
Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ Tɩ Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ wa'am wa zɛ yẽŋa dee tõm yetɩ, ba wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am.
La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n daan zĩ kaagɛ ẽ, tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n wãna n boe yẽŋa ɛɛra fɔ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Ãne n de mam ma, la ãndõma n de mam yɩbsɩ?» Dee bɩsɛ nẽr-sɛba n zĩ kaagɛ ẽ na, yetɩ: «Mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ n wãna.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n ɩtɩ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ se'em na n de mam yɩbga, la mam tã, la mam ma.»
Kaara n lobge a bõnbuuri makrɛ Azezi le bɔna la mõgrɛ la nõorʋm zãsna nẽrba.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
Bɛla tɩ a kẽ õorŋɔ la n boe mõgrɛ la pʋam na zĩ'ire, dee tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu bɔna mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
Tɩ a makɛ magsa zãsʋm ba yɛla zozo'e.
A zãsŋɔ la pʋam a yele ba yetɩ: «Selse-ya, kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri.
La ẽn sẽŋɛ ka lɔbgra bõnbuuri la, basɛba lui la sore zuo, tɩ niinto wa'am wa di ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'a n de tãmpĩisi tɩ tẽntõnnɔ ka zo'oge mĩ.
Tẽntõnnɔ n ka zo'oge mĩ na ĩyã, tɩ ba bule tɔtɔ yese, tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa yẽkɛ wẽ ba tɩ ba ki, ba yẽga n ka kẽ tẽŋa la ĩyã.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a.
Tɩ gõ'osɩ la yese fʋrɛ ba, tɩ ba ka wɔm biɛ.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋɔ pʋam bule yese, bɩ wɔm biɛ.
Basɛba wɔm na biɛ pitã-tã, tɩ basɛba wɔm pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba wɔm kɔbga kɔbga.» A yele bɛla dee yetɩ: «Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.» Azezi pa'alɛ magsa võorɛ La Azezi yese la kẽnkɛrŋa tɩ sɛba n kaagɛ ẽ na, la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la soke ẽ magsa la võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ.
La sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, yɛla wuu de la magsa bɔ ba.
‹Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsɛ yẽ dee kãn bãŋɛ.
Ba wʋn wõm dee kãn bãŋɛ a võorɛ.
Sãn dagɩ nɩ bɛla, ba wʋn leme wa'am Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, tɩ a basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.› » La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma sãn ka bãŋɛ makrɛ ẽna wã võorɛ, yãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne bãŋɛ magsa la wuu võorɛ?
Bõnbuuri la tɩ kaara la lobge la, de la Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am tɔtɔ wa yese yetɔga la ba sũure pʋam.
La tãmpĩa la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la dee sakɛ to'oge ba tɔtɔ la sũ-yẽlga.
La yetɔga la n ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam na ĩyã, ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, la toogo bɩɩ nãmsgɔ sãn paagɛ ba yetɔga la ĩyã, ba basrɩ mɛ tɔtɔ.
La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, tɩ ba yɛm yɔɔra la dũnia wã yɛla, tɩ bõntarsõm yɛla pã'asra ba, tɩ yɛla basɛba yɛmleego tara ba, botɩ yetɔga la ka tãna wʋn wɔm biɛ ba sũure pʋam.
La zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ kõ-yẽlga la sakra, wɔm biɛ.
Tɩ basɛba wɔm pitã-tã, tɩ basɛba pisyoob-yoobɩ, tɩ basɛba kɔbga kɔbga.» Fɩtla makrɛ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Ba yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgɔ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ ze'ele gɔrgɔ tilum?
Ayɛɩ, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo.
Bɛla, bõn-sɛka n sʋgɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a puke.
La bõn-sɛka wuu n lile wʋn lilge.
Nẽr-sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.» A le yele ba yetɩ: «Mõrgɛ-ya wõm yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ.
Bõn-sɛka tɩ ya dɩkɛ makɛ bɔ nẽrba la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn makɛ la bɛla lebse ya, le makɛ pa'asɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, sɛka n tarɩ, a wʋn bɔ ẽ pa'asɛ.
La sɛka n ka tarɩ, bõn-sɛka tɩ a tarɩ la, a wʋn to'oge ẽ.» Bõnbuuri bɩa makrɛ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm ãn wʋ nẽra n bʋrɛ a bõnbuuri va'am pʋam.
A sãn gĩsra mɛ bɩɩ a sãn piga mɛ, wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋɔ, bõnbuuri la bulli mɛ yɛsra bɩta, tɩ a ka mina lan ɩtɩ se'em.
Tẽntõnnɔ n botɩ bõnbuuri la yɛsra ba mẽŋa, dẽŋɛ puse võorɔ, yãŋa yõgɛ pʋa, wɔm biɛ, tɩ ba bɩ.
La biɛ la sãn bɩ, kaara la sɛ'ɛrɩ ba mɛ, se'ere n soe la, bõnkɔɔla lagsgɔ paagɛ mɛ.» Sɔ'ɔrɔ biire makrɛ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, bɩɩ tɩ wʋn yetɩ a wõn na bẽm?
A ãn wʋ sɔ'ɔrɔ biire n ãn pɩka pɩka gãnna bõnbuuri wuu n boe dũnia zuo.
La ba sãn bʋrɛ ẽ, a bɩtɩ mɛ puse wil-kãra gãnna zẽvõorɔ buuri wuu.
Tɩ niinto tãna wʋn tɛ ba tʋgrɔ a zuo a mã'asʋm pʋam.» Azezi daan dɩkɛ la magsa zozo'e n ãn wʋ bãna tɔgɛ bɔ ba, masɛ wʋ ban wʋn tã'agɛ wõm se'em na.
A ka tɔgɛ bɔ ba tɩ la sãn dagna magsa.
La a sãn yese la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a kẽnkɛrŋa, tɩ a pa'alɩ ba yɛla la wuu võorɛ.
Azezi botɩ kʋsebgo yõkɛ Daar-ẽŋa mẽŋa zaanõorɛ, tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Tɩ dooge-ya mõgrɛ la ke bɔba.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ õorŋɔ la tɩ Azezi boe mĩ na pʋam, dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa.
La õornɔ basɛba n daan mẽ boe ba zẽ'am.
Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ wa vugra ke'enke'em, tɩ ko-mĩ'isi wẽ'era kẽ'era õorŋɔ la pʋam deege la ba pɩrɛ ẽ.
La Azezi gã la õorŋɔ la poorʋm kʋkɛ dafeere gĩsra.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la nẽegɛ ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma n yetɩ ki wã, la ka pakɛ fõn?» Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo la, dee yele ko-mĩ'isi la yetɩ: «Go'oge-ya, ãna-ya sĩm.» Tɩ kʋsebgo, la ko-mĩ'isi la go'oge ãna sĩm.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya zɔta dabeem bɛla?
Bẽm tɩ ya ka bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra?» Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba.
Tɩ ba sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «Ãne n de ẽna tɩ kʋsebgo la ko'om sakra a nõorɛ?»
Kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ bʋraaga, tɩ Azezi dige ba La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la dooge paagɛ la mõgrɛ la doone Geraza dõma tẽŋa pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋɔ la pʋam sige.
Tɩ bʋraa tɩ kʋlkã'arga dolɩ ẽ darɛ ze'ele yɔɔrʋm sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ.
Bʋraa la daan kẽ'erɩ la yɔɔrɔ la tẽŋasʋka.
Tɩ ba daan ka le tãna wʋn ba ẽ na bãnsɩ.
Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ẽn ba la a nãma la a nu'usi la bãnsɩ, tɩ a ẽn kɔ ba basɛ.
Tɩ nẽra nẽra daan ka tãna wʋn yãŋɛ ẽ.
Wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋɔ a ẽn ɛɛra la yɔɔrʋm, la tãnsɩ tẽŋasʋka kaasra tagursi, dee wẽ'era a mẽŋa la kuga pɔgna.
Tɩ a yẽ Azezi zãazãarɛ, zoe sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, dee tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm n boe mam na fõn tẽŋasʋka?
Mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ ĩyã, da nãmsɛ ma.» Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ yetɩ a yese dee basɛ ẽ.
Bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa, se'ere n soe la, tõma zo'oge mɛ.» Tɩ a belem Azezi yetɩ, a da dige bãma tɩ ba yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
La kurkurdõma zozo'e n daan boe tãŋa zuo ɔbra.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ: «Bɔ tɩ nõorɛ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la.» Tɩ a sakɛ ban yele se'em na.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la.
Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki.
Ba kãllɛ daan de wʋ tʋsayi.
Tɩ sɛba n daan gu'uri kurkurdõma la zoe sẽŋɛ tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ la wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em.
La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la daan dolɩ ẽ na n zĩ mĩ, yɛ futo, tɩ a yɛm bɔna sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ sɛba n yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, tɔgɛ pa'alɛ ba bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ bʋraa la, la bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ kurkurdõma la.
Tɩ ba belem Azezi yetɩ a fõrgɛ bãma tẽŋa.
Tɩ Azezi daan kẽ'era õorŋɔ la pʋam, tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ daan dolɩ ẽ na belem Azezi yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ a dɔla ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi ka sakɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Kule ya yire ka yele fʋ yir-dõma Zuudãana n zoe fʋ ninbãalga se'em, la ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla wuu bɔ fʋ la.» Tɩ bʋraa la sẽŋɛ Dekapɔlɩ so'olʋm ka mõola Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bɔ ẽŋa.
Tɩ la daan di'ige ba wuu.
Azayirusi pɔyʋa, la pɔka n kalʋm Azezi fuugo yelle Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la doone ke bɔba la õorŋɔ la, daan bɔna mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ zozo'e lagsɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadõma nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azayirusi wa'am mĩ wa yẽ Azezi, ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, belem ẽ na a sũure wuu yetɩ: «Mam pɔyʋa n bẽ'erɩ deege la a ki, wa'am wa dɩkɛ fʋ nu'usi paglɛ a zuo tɩ a põsɛ da ki.» Tɩ Azezi dɔla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ dɔla ẽ mikra ẽ.
La pɔka n daan boe nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi, tɩ la ka gɔ'ɔra.
A daan nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e tɩbdõma zẽ'am, dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla wuu sã'am, dee tɩ la ka sõna, la malɩn gãnna la bɛla.
Tɩ pɔka la daan wõm Azezi yelle, wa'am wa fɩrgɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la tẽŋasʋka paagɛ Azezi poorʋm kalʋm a fuugo.
A daan yele a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: «Mam sãn kalʋm a fuugo mã'a, mam wʋn yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.» La ẽn kalʋm fuugo la, a zɩɩm na n yesrɩ la ze'ele mɛ ka le yɛsra, tɩ a bãŋɛ a ĩyã pʋam tɩ ẽŋa yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La bilam mẽŋa tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese ẽŋa pʋam ẽŋɛ sɛla, tɩ a gelge soke nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la yetɩ: «Ãn kalʋm mam fuugo?» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n mikri fõn wãna, dee sɔkra tɩ ãn kalʋm fõn.» Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ kaagɛ tɩ a bãŋɛ nẽr-sɛka n ẽŋɛ bɛla.
Tɩ dabeem tara pɔka la, tɩ a gõgra.
La ẽn bãŋɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ ẽ na, a wa'am mɛ wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam tɔgɛ ẽ a sɩra wuu.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «M bia, fõn bɔ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm, fʋ bã'a la basɛ ya.» La Azezi n ken bɔna mĩ tɔgra la, tɩ nẽrba ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ pɔyʋa la ki mɛ.
Da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama.» Tɩ Azezi wõm ban yele se'em na, dee yele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yetɩ: «Da zoe dabeem, wen bɔ mam sɩra.» La Azezi daan ka basɛ tɩ nẽra nẽra kɔlgɛ ẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la a yɩbga Azã mã'a.
La ban sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana yire la, tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n voolɩ, kaasra dee fabla zozo'e.
Tɩ a kẽ yire la yele ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya vɔɔla dee kɛlla?
Bia la ka ki, a gĩsri mɛ.» Tɩ ba la'ara ẽ.
Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la wuu yese yẽŋa, dee doose bia la sɔ, la a ma, la a karẽnbiisi batã la kẽ bia la n boe zẽ'a na, gʋrɛ a nu'ugo dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Talita kumi.» A võorɛ de la: «Pugla, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge.» Tɩ pugla la daan darɛ isge sẽnna.
Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ.
Pugla la daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi.
Tɩ Azezi daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da kãn botɩ nẽra nẽra bãŋɛ bõn-ẽŋa.
Dee yetɩ, ba bɔ pugla la dia tɩ a di.
Nazarɛtɩ nẽrba ka bɔ Azezi sɩra Azezi daan basɛ tẽn-ẽŋa dee sẽŋɛ la a mẽŋa tẽŋam, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.
Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba.
Tɩ nẽrba pãɩ wõm a zãsŋɔ la, tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna yẽ zãsŋɔ ẽna la bɛ?
Ãne bɔ ẽ yɛm ẽna?
A ẽŋɛ la wãne ɩta bõn-yãlma bɛla?
Dagɩ ẽna n de dɔ-wãta la?
Dagɩ ẽna n de Amaari dayʋa, tɩ a yɩbsɩ dɛna Azakɩ, la Azoze, la Azudi, la Asimõ la?
Dagɩ a tãpa n boe tõma zẽ'am kalam wã?» Bɛla tɩ ba zagsɛ ka bɔ Azezi sɩra.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa yẽtɩ pẽka mɛ, sãn dagna a mẽŋa tẽŋa, la a buuri, la a yir-dõma tẽŋasʋka mã'a tɩ a ka yẽtɩ pẽka.» La a daan ka yãŋɛ tõm tõon-yãlma bilam, sãn dagna bã'adõma fẽe tɩ a daan dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La ban daan ka bɔ ẽ sɩra la, la di'ige ẽ mɛ.
Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi Azezi daan kaarɩ la tẽnsɩ la n boe bilam na zãsna nẽrba, daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi, dee bɔ ba pãŋa tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ.
Dee daan yele ba yetɩ: «Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sore la sẽnnɛ ĩyã, dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ mã'a, da tara-ya dia, bɩɩ tãmpɔkɔ, bɩɩ ligri sũm sẽŋɛ.
La pire-ya tagra, dee da yɛ-ya futo bayi bayi.» A le yele ba yetɩ: «Yan sẽŋɛ ka sige yi-sɛka, kẽ'era-ya bilam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn yese fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
La tẽn-sɛka nẽrba n ka to'oge ya, bɩɩ ka selse ya yetɔga, ya yese zẽ'e-ẽŋa dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnɔ basɛ mĩ.
Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa.» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.
Dee dige kʋlkã'arsɩ zozo'e tɩ ba yese, dee ẽŋɛ kaam ẽŋɛ bã'adõma zozo'e zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na kũm yelle Tɩ naba A'erɔdɩ wõm Azezi yelle, se'ere n soe la, Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ daan yese la zẽ'a woo.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan yɛta tɩ: «A de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge, bɛla n soe tɩ a tara pãŋa tõnna tõon-yãlma.» Tɩ basɛba yetɩ: «A de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli n leme wa'am.» Tɩ sɛba yetɩ: «A de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ayẽma wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba basɛba n daan boe la.» Tɩ naba A'erɔdɩ daan wõm bɛla, yetɩ: «A de la Azã sɛka tɩ mam daan botɩ ba wike a zuugo la n vo'oge.» Se'ere n soe la, A'erɔdɩ mẽŋa n daan botɩ ba yõkɛ Azã lʋ tarɩ ka kẽ'esɛ yʋ'a deem, a kẽema Afilipi pɔga A'erodɩadɩ ĩyã.
Se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pɔga di.
Tɩ Azã daan yele ẽ yetɩ, la ka masɛ tɩ a fãagɛ a kẽema pɔga di.
Tɩ A'erodɩadɩ sũure yĩige la Azã, tɩ a zɩgra tɩ a kʋ ẽ, la A'erɔdɩ ĩyã a ka tã'agɛ kʋ ẽ.
A'erɔdɩ daan zotɩ Azã mɛ, a daan mi tɩ a de la nẽr-sõŋɔ, dee dɛna pʋpeelem dãana, bɛla ĩyã tɩ a gu'ura ẽ tɩ sɛla da ẽŋɛ ẽ.
A daan sãn ẽn sɛlsra Azã yetɔga, la dãanɩ ẽ mɛ zozo'e, la baa bɛla, a ẽn sɛlsra ẽ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ A'erɔdɩ ẽŋɛ a dɔka daarɛ kibsa, wi a tẽŋa nẽrzuto, la sʋda-kɛ'ɛndõma, la Galile nẽŋadõma.
Tɩ A'erodɩadɩ yẽ sore ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ se'em na.
A'erodɩadɩ pɔyʋa n daan kẽ ka wa, tɩ A'erɔdɩ, la sãama la sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm.
Tɩ naba la yele pugla la yetɩ: «Sose mam fõn boorɩ sɛla tɩ m bɔ fɔ.» Dee pɔɩ yetɩ: «Bõn-sɛka wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sose mam, baa la sãn dɛna mam so'olʋm pʋsʋka, mam wʋn bɔ fɔ.» Tɩ pugla la yese ka soke a ma yetɩ: «M sose bẽm?» Tɩ a ma lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Sose Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo.» Tɩ pugla la lebe naba la zẽ'am tɔtɔ ka yele ẽ yetɩ: «Mam boorɩ tɩ fʋ dɩkɛ la Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na zuugo ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam bɔ ma lɛɛlɛ wã.» Tɩ naba la sũure sã'am halɩ, la ẽn pɔɩ nẽrba la zẽ'am na ĩyã, a ka boorɩ tɩ a mõŋɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a tõm a sʋdaaga tɔtɔ yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka wike Azã zuugo tarɩ wa'am.
Tɩ a yese sẽŋɛ yʋ'a deem na ka wike Azã zuugo, dɩkɛ ẽŋɛ la-pɛsŋa pʋam tarɩ wa'am wa bɔ pugla la.
Tɩ pugla la dɩkɛ zuugo la bɔ a ma.
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi wõm, sẽŋɛ ka dɩkɛ kũm na laagɛ.
Azezi bɔ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ dia Azezi n tõm sɛba la leme mɛ wa lagsɛ taaba a zẽ'am tɔgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ sɛla, la bãma n zãsʋm se'em wuu.
La nẽrba zozo'e n daan sẽnnɩ mĩ dee fõrgra, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan ka yẽ folle wʋn di.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Wa'am-ya tɩ tɩ yese kẽnkɛrŋa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe mĩ na, tɩ ya ka vo'ose fẽe.» Tɩ ba kẽ õorŋɔ wɛ'ɛsa kẽnkɛrŋa zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan yẽ ban we'esɩ la bãŋɛ ba, daan yese tẽnsɩ la wuu pʋam lagɩm sẽŋɛ tɔtɔ dẽŋɛ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba we'esɩ la.
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ ze'ele õorŋɔ la zuo sige, yẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la, tɩ ba ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, ba ãn wʋ piisi n ka tarɩ dũnsĩina.
Tɩ a daan zãsna ba yɛla zozo'e.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan kẽ'era, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka yele ẽ yetɩ: «Kalam zẽ'a de la mõom dee tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ'era, basɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba sẽŋɛ yiɛ, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ la ka da dia di.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Yãma mẽŋa bɔ ba dia tɩ ba di.» Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn sẽŋɛ ka da borborɩ lig-kõba kɔbsyi tarɩ wa'am wa bɔ ba tɩ ba di?» Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?
Sẽŋɛ-ya ka bɩsɛ.» Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ, dee leme wa yetɩ: «Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu la zũma bayi.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ, ba basɛ tɩ nẽrba la welse sill-sille zĩ'ire mõ-mã'asa la zuo.
Tɩ ba daan zĩ'ire kɔbga kɔbga, tɩ basɛba zĩ'ire pinu-nu.
Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise borborɩ la bɔ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba pʋɩ nẽrba la, dee dɩkɛ zũma bayi la fiise bɔ ba wuu.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ borbor-gito, la zũn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtɔ pia la ayi.
Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de la tʋsanuu.
Azezi sẽnnɩ ko'om zuo Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi darɛ basɛ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋɔ dẽŋɛ ẽ dɔɔra mõgrɛ la doone ke bɔba, Betisayida tẽŋa bɔba.
Dee tɩ a mẽŋa weege tɩ a keese nẽrba la.
La ẽn keese ba la, a sẽŋɛ la tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ tɩ õorŋɔ la bɔna ko-kãtɛ la tẽŋasʋka, dee tɩ Azezi bɔna doone ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la n mõnnɩ õorŋɔ la nãmsrɩ mɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, kʋsebgo n vugri tʋ'ʋsra ba.
Tɩ beere yɔna wiire, tɩ a sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa ba bɔba, bɔɔra tɩ a gãŋɛ ba tole.
La ban yẽ ẽn sẽnnɩ ko'om na zuo la, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ a de la ki-isgne, tɩ ba kaasɛ tagursi.
Ba wuu yẽ ẽ mɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ a darɛ yele ba yetɩ: «La de la mam, keŋe-ya ya sũure, da zoe-ya dabeem!» Dee zom ba zẽ'am õorŋɔ la pʋam, tɩ kʋsebgo la go'oge.
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, se'ere n soe la, ba ka bãŋɛ borborɩ bõn-yãlma la võorɛ, ba pʋtẽ'era ka like.
Azezi botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Zenezarɛtɩ tẽŋam Ba pãrgɛ mõgrɛ la dooge paagɛ la Zenezarɛtɩ, ze'ele mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
La ban daan ze'ele õorŋɔ la pʋam dooge la, tɩ nẽrba la bãŋɛ Azezi tɔtɔ.
Tɩ ba zoe kẽ so'olʋm na wuu, tɩ ba zɛ bã'adõma ba bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am, bãma n wõm tɩ Azezi boe zẽ'e-sɛka la.
La Azezi daan sãn ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka woo, tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n boe kẽnkɛrsɩ la, ba tarɩ la bã'adõma sẽnna gã'ata da'asɩ pʋam, dee bɛlna ẽ yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ bã'adõma la kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ mã'a.
La sɛba wuu n daan kalʋm a fuugo la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm mɛ.
Yaabdõma zãsŋɔ, la bõn-sɛba n botɩ nẽra dɛna dẽgrɔ Farisi dõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma basɛba n ze'ele Zerizalɛm daan wa'am wa lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am, yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛba diti la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa, la boorɩ tɩ la yetɩ ba ka peege nu'usi wʋ Zifdõma sisgo n yetɩ ba ɩta se'em na.
Farisi dõma, la Zifdõma wuu sãn ka wobse nu'usi wʋ ba yaabdõma malŋɔ la, ba ka diti.
Ba sãn ze'ele da'am wa'am, ba wʋn peege ba mẽŋa mɛ dee di.
La malŋɔ basɛba zozo'e tɩ ba ɩtɩ, la de la wama, la yɔa, la kuto laasɩ peere.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la soke Azezi yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka sakra tɩ yaabdõma malŋɔ la, dita dia la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «A'ezayi n yʋʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga la tɔgɛ ya yelle la, a tarɩ bʋʋrɔ, yãma de la pʋlibsum dõma wʋ lan gʋlsɛ se'em na.
La gʋlsɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: ‹Nẽr-bãna pẽgrɩ mam na nõorɛ yetɔga, la ba sũure la zãagɛ la mam mɛ.
Ban nã'asrɩ mam na, la de la zãŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, ba zãsnɩ la zãsŋɔ n de nẽrsaalba nõorɛ.› Ya basɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ mɛ dee dɔla nẽrsaalba malŋɔ.» Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Ya sɩrɩ zagsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ mɛ, dee tɩ ya dɔla ya mẽŋa malŋɔ.
Amoyisi yʋʋn yetɩ: Nanna fʋ sɔ, la fʋ ma.
Dee le yetɩ: Nẽr-sɛka sãn tɔgɛ a sɔ bɩɩ a ma be'em, dẽnɩ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
La yãma yetɩ: Nẽra sãn yele a sɔ, bɩɩ a ma yetɩ: Mam n tarɩ bõn-sɛba tɩ m sõŋɛ fʋ la de la ‹Kɔrbã›, (a võorɛ de la ‹Nawẽnnɛ bõnɔ›), la ka le masɛ tɩ a ɩta sɛla bɔ'ɔra a sɔ, la a ma.
Yãma mẽŋa malŋɔ la tɩ ya zãsnɩ nẽrba la, botɩ ya basɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga la dɛna la zãŋa.
La bõnɔ zozo'e n wõm na bɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ.» La Azezi le wi la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma wuu, selse-ya mam sõŋa wõm a võorɛ.
Sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ.
Bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ.
[ Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.
]» La a daan ze'ele nẽrba la zẽ'am kẽ la deem.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma yɛm mẽ ka like?
Yãma ka bãŋɛ tɩ sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'era nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ?
Se'ere n soe la, bõn-bãma ka kẽ'erɩ sũure pʋam, ba kẽ'erɩ la pʋʋrɛ pʋam tɩ ba yẽ'era ba basra.» (Azezi n daan yele bɛla la, a boorɩ tɩ a yetɩ dia ka bɔ'ɔrɩ dẽgrɔ, nẽra tã wʋn di dia wuu mɛ.)
Dee daan le yetɩ: «La de la bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ.
Se'ere n soe la, pʋtẽ'e-yooro ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a bɔɔra tɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em: yalsɩ, la nayigum, la nẽr-kʋa, la taaba pɔgba la taaba sɩrba gã'a, la nẽra n nõŋɛ bõnɔ, la pʋtʋʋlgɔ, la yɛmkẽgsɩga, la tõon-dẽgrɔ, la nẽra n ɩtɩ sũure la a tadãana bõnɔ, la pɔ'ɔrɛ yetɔga, la pa'al-m-mẽŋa, la yalm-tõoma.
Bõn-be'ero bãna wuu ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ.» Pɔka n bɔ Azezi sɩra Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Tiiri so'olʋm ka kẽ yire pʋam, dee ka bɔɔra tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ tɩ ẽŋa boe bilam.
La a daan ka tã'agɛ sʋgɛ.
Tɩ pɔka ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arga daan dolɩ a pɔyʋa, wõm Azezi yelle, sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, sose ẽ yetɩ, a dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese dee basɛ a pɔyʋa la.
Pɔka la daan de la Grɛkɩ, ba dɔgɛ ẽ na Fenisi tẽŋa n boe Siiri so'olʋm pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Basɛ tɩ kɔma dẽŋɛ di tɩgɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ kɔma dia bɔ baasɩ.» Tɩ pɔka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, la de la sɩra, la baasɩ n boe ba dãana taablɩ tilum diti la kɔma di-zõra n luti la.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn lerge se'em wã ĩyã, kule, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ fʋ pɔyʋa la.» Tɩ pɔka la daan lebe kule, la ẽn paagɛ yire la, a yẽ tɩ a pɔyʋa la gã la bõn-gã'ala pʋam, la kʋlkã'arga la sɩrɩ yese dee basɛ ẽ mɛ.
Azezi botɩ bʋraa n de waŋa, dee ka tãna tɔgra sõŋa, tã'agɛ tɔgra dee wõnna Azezi le ze'ele Tiiri so'olʋm doose la Sidõ, doose Dekapɔlɩ tẽnsɩ pʋam lebe Galile mõgrɛ la bɔba.
Tɩ ba tarɩ bʋraa n de waŋa, dee ka tãna tɔgra sõŋa wa'am a zẽ'am, wa belem ẽ yetɩ, a dɩkɛ a nu'ugo paglɛ waŋa la zuo.
Tɩ Azezi tarɩ ẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa dɩkɛ a nu'ubiɛ tũm a tʋba pʋam, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm kalʋm bʋraa la zɩlɩŋa.
Dee gorge saazuo sĩ'im vo'ose fõo, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Efata», a võorɛ de la «yo'oge!» Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bʋraa la tʋba yo'oge, tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tɔgra sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tɔgɛ bɔ nẽra nẽra.
La ẽn daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tɔgɛ bɔ nẽra nẽra la, ba daan tõn tɔgra mɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ la di'ige ba zozo'e halɩ tɩ ba yɛta tɩ: «A ẽŋɛ sɛla woo la sõŋa, botɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ mugro tɔgra.»
Azezi le bɔ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ dia Dabs-bãma pʋam nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n daan le lagsɛ, tɩ dia ka bɔna tɩ ba wʋn di.
Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ wã ninbãalga n tarɩ mam, se'ere n soe la, dabsa atã tɩ ba boe mam zẽ'am dee ka tara dia wʋn di.
Mam sãn basɛ ba tɩ ba kule ba yiɛ la kɔm, ba wʋn ka vibe mɛ sore, se'ere n soe la, basɛba ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tã'agɛ yẽ dia tɩ la seke nẽr-bãna wuu, zẽ'e-ẽna n de mõom wã?» Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Bayopɔɩ.» Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la zĩ'ire tẽŋa.
Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ bayopɔɩ la pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bɔ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la.
La ba daan tarɩ la zũn-pɩgsɩ mẽ fẽe.
Tɩ Azezi pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ zũma la ĩyã, dee botɩ a karẽnbiisi la dɩkɛ pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ nẽrba la daan di tɩgɛ.
Dee tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ dia n weege pɩrɛ pɩtɔ bayopɔɩ.
Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de wʋ tʋsanaasɩ.
Tɩ Azezi daan botɩ ba kule, dee tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋɔ sẽŋɛ Dalmanuta so'olʋm.
Farisi dõma pʋlibsum yelle Tɩ Farisi dõma daan wa'am wa wẽ'era nõke'ene la Azezi, yetɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a botɩ bõn-yãlma ze'ele saazuo ẽŋɛ n pa'alɩ tɩ ẽŋa ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Tɩ Azezi sĩ'im vo'ose fõo, dee soke yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ zamãana ẽna nẽrba ɛɛra bõn-yãlma?
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ mam kãn botɩ bõn-yãlma n pa'alɛ bɛla ẽŋɛ tɩ zamãana ẽna yẽ.» La Azezi basɛ ba mɛ dee le kẽ õorŋɔ dɔɔra mõgrɛ la doone ke bɔba.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la daan yĩm ka dɩkɛ borborɩ, sãn dagna borborɩ ayɩla mã'a tɩ ba tarɩ õorŋɔ la pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: «Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la naba A'erɔdɩ dãbɩllɛ la.» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la tɔgra la taaba yetɩ: «Tõma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ĩyã tɩ a yele bɛla.» Tɩ Azezi daan bãŋɛ, soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya tɔgra la taaba tɩ la de la yãma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ĩyã?
Yãma ka wõm a võorɛ?
Yãma yɛm ka like?
Yãma tarɩ la nini dee ka yẽta?
Ya tarɩ la tʋba dee ka wõnna?
Yãma ka tẽrɩ?
Mam n daan fiise borborɩ banuu la bɔ bʋraasɩ tʋsanuu tɩ ba di la, borborɩ gito n deege la, pɩtɔ balɛ tɩ yãma daan vaagɛ?» Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Pɩtɔ pia la ayi.» Tɩ a le soke ba yetɩ: «La mam n daan fiise borborɩ bayopɔɩ la pʋɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanaasɩ la, yãma daan vaagɛ sɛba n deege la pɩtɔ balɛ?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Pɩtɔ bayopɔɩ.» Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma nãn ka wõm a võorɛ?» Azezi botɩ fʋa nini yẽta Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ la Betisayida.
Tɩ ba tarɩ fʋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa belem ẽ yetɩ a kalʋm ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ fʋa la nu'ugo ve'ege ẽ tẽŋa la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa, ka tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm ẽŋɛ a nini, dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ a zuo, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽtɩ sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ bʋraa la dɔ'ɔgɛ zuugo bɩsɛ, yetɩ: «Mam yẽtɩ nẽrba tɩ ba ãna wʋ tɩɩsɩ la, la ba sẽnnɩ mɛ.» Tɩ Azezi le dɩkɛ a nu'usi kalʋm fʋa la nini.
Tɩ a nini pike yɩlɩŋɛ, tɩ a yẽta sɛla woo sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi basɛ ẽ yetɩ a kule, a da le kẽ tẽŋa la pʋam.
Apɩyɛɛrɩ pa'alɛ Azezi n de nẽr-sɛka La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan we'esɩ la tẽnsɩ n lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Filipi Sezaare.
La ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na.
Tɩ basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli.
Tɩ sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n yʋʋn boe la nẽra ayɩla.» Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «La yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: «Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na.» Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tɔgɛ ẽŋa yelle bɔ nẽra nẽra.
Azezi dẽŋɛ tɔgɛ a nãmsgɔ, la a kũm yelle Tɩ Azezi yãŋa zãsna a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: «Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e.
Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ.» A daan tɔgɛ ba la vẽelga vẽelga.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wi ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka yele ẽ yetɩ, a da le tɔgɛ bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi gelge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la, dee tãsɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asũtãana, sẽŋɛ lebe mam poorʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ tẽ'esgɔ la dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ tẽ'esgɔ, la de la nẽrsaala tẽ'esgɔ.» Dee wi nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la, la a karẽnbiisi la a zẽ'am, yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgɔ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dɔ-puurŋa dɔla mam.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vɔm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vɔm mam ĩyã, la kõ-yẽlga la ĩyã, a wʋn yẽ vɔm.
Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorɔ de la bẽm?
Bẽm tɩ nẽrsaala wʋn dɩkɛ teege vɔm?
Sɛla kaɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ĩyã, la mam yetɔga la ĩyã, zamãana ẽna wã n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra, dee dɛna tõon-be'ero dõma wã tẽŋasʋka, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ na ẽ, wakat-sɛka tɩ a wʋn leme wa'am la a Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma la.»
La a le yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã, basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n sẽm na pãŋa.» Azezi nẽŋa teere Tɩ dabsa ayoobɩ daan tole, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã mã'a doose ẽ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãn-kãtɛ zuo.
Tɩ a nẽŋa teege ba nẽŋam.
Tɩ a futo pelge yɩlɩ yɩlɩ yẽgra halɩ, tɩ nẽra ka bɔna dũnia wã zuo tãna wʋn peege tɩ ba pelge bɛla.
Tɩ A'eli, la Amoyisi puke ba zẽ'am tɔgra la Azezi.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ.
Basɛ tɩ tɩ tĩ põnsɩ batã, bɔ fõn ayɩla, bɔ Amoyisi ayɩla, bɔ A'eli ayɩla.» A daan ka mi ẽŋa n tɔgɛ se'em, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n daan kẽ ba.
Tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm.
Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: «Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ.
Selse-ya a yetɔga.» Bilam mẽŋa tɩ ba bɩsɛ kaagɛ ka le yẽ nẽra, sãn dagna Azezi mã'a n boe ba zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sigra, tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: «Da tɔgɛ-ya pa'alɛ nẽra nẽra yãma n yẽ sɛla la, sãn dagna tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa ki mɛ, dee vo'oge.» Tɩ ba to'oge ẽn yele se'em na, dee sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «Kũm vo'ore võorɛ de la bẽm?» Tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ A'eli dẽŋɛ wa'am, tɩ Krisi yãŋa wa'am poorʋm?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Asɩra, A'eli n wʋn dẽŋɛ wa'am wa malgɛ sɛla woo.
La bẽm tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la yelle yetɩ, a wʋn nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e dee yẽ pɔ'ɔrɛ?
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ A'eli põn wa'am mɛ, tɩ nẽrba ẽŋɛ ẽ ban boorɩ se'em, wʋ lan gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam se'em na.» Kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ bia, tɩ Azezi dige ẽ tɩ a yese Ban lebe ka lɛm karẽnbiisi basɛba la zẽ'am na, ba yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ zozo'e n kaagɛ ba, tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma basɛba wẽ'era nõkɛ'ɛma la ba.
La nẽrba la n daan yẽ Azezi la, la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba zoe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'era nõke'ene la ba?» Tɩ nẽra ayɩla ze'ele nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la tẽŋasʋka yele yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, mam tarɩ la m dayʋa wa'am fõn zẽ'am, kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ botɩ a dɛna muko.
La kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a lʋbrɩ ẽ mɛ tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra, tɩ a ɔbra yẽna dee gorŋe.
Bɛla tɩ mam tarɩ ẽ wa'am wa sose fʋ karẽnbiisi la yetɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bɔ'ɔrɩ mam sɩra, mam wʋn bɔna la yãma mã'agɛ m mẽŋa halɩ ka paagɛ la wakat-kãna?
Tarɩ-ya bia la wa'am.» Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ wa'am a zẽ'am.
La kʋlkã'arga la n yẽ Azezi la, bilam mẽŋa a dãan bia la mɛ, tɩ a lui tẽŋa bilna, tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra a nõorʋm.
Tɩ Azezi soke bia la sɔ yetɩ: «Wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽna ẽŋɛ ẽ?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «A bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm.
La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn lʋbɛ ẽ na bugum, bɩɩ ko'om pʋam, bɔɔra tɩ a kʋ ẽ.
Fʋ sãn tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla, zoe tɩ ninbãalga sõŋɛ tɔ.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fʋ yetɩ, fõn sãn tãna?
Nẽr-sɛka woo n bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra, a tã wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo bɔ ẽ mɛ.» Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bia la sɔ tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Mam bɔ sɩra, la sõŋɛ mam tɩ m bɔ sɩra pa'asɛ.» La Azezi daan yẽ tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n zotɩ sẽna a zẽ'am, tɩ a tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: «Kʋlkã'arga n botɩ nẽra dɛna muko la waŋa, mam yetɩ fʋ yese dee basɛ ẽ, da le doose ẽ.» Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la kaasɛ tagurga, dee bigse bia la ke'enke'em, dee yese.
Tɩ bia la ãna wʋ kũm na.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yetɩ a ki mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ a nu'ugo zẽkɛ ẽ, tɩ a isge ze'ele saazuo.
La Azezi daan kẽ la deem, ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a, tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ tõma ka tã'agɛ dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Sãn dagna pʋ'ʋsgɔ, sɛla sɛla ka boe n tã wʋn dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna buuri.» Azezi le tɔgɛ a kũm, la a vo'ore yelle La ba daan yese bilam doose la Galile tẽŋa tole.
La Azezi daan ka boorɩ tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boe zẽ'a.
A daan zãsʋm a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ la nẽrba nu'usum, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
La ba sãn kʋ ẽ, dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ.» Tɩ ba daan ka bãŋɛ yetɔga la võorɛ, dee zɔta ka soke ẽ.
Ãne n wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ?
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Kapɛrnaʋm kẽ deem.
Tɩ Azezi soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'erɩ nɩ nõke'ene sore zuo la?» Tɩ ba sĩna, se'ere n soe la, ba wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ sɛka n de nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi zĩ'ire, wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dɛna poorʋm dãana, la nẽrba wuu tõntõnna.» Azezi yele bɛla dee tarɩ la bi-pɩka wa ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka, dɩkɛ a nu'usi kɔkɛ bia la, dee yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn to'oge bi-pɩka ẽna tadãana mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã, a to'oge la mam mẽŋa, la nẽra sãn to'oge mam mẽŋa, la dagɩ mam tɩ a to'oge, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na.» Tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma daan yẽ la bʋraa n tarɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ĩyã tɩ tõma gu ẽ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Da gu-ya ẽ, se'ere n soe la, nẽra ka boe wʋn tõm tõon-yãlma la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ, dee tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe tɩ a le tã'agɛ tɔgɛ mam be'em.
Nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri tõma, a de la tõma nẽra.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn bɔ ya ko'om tɩ ya yũ, yãma n de mam n de Krisi nẽrba la ĩyã, ẽŋa dãana kãn koŋe a yɔɔrɔ.
La nẽra sãn botɩ kɔm-pɩgsɩ bãna wã n bɔ mam sɩra la ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, sɩbgrɛ sɛka tɩ a wʋn yẽ la, ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam n sõɩ.
La fʋ nu'ugo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nu'u-yẽŋɔ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vɔa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nu'usi bayi dee kẽ bug-tẽŋa, [ zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mĩ dita nẽrba ĩyã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kĩŋra.]
La fʋ nã'arɛ sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nã'a-yẽŋɔ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vɔa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nãma bayi dee tɩ ba dɩkɛ fʋ lobe basɛ bug-tẽŋa, [ zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mĩ dita nẽrba ĩyã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kĩŋra.]
La fʋ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ kɩrgɛ ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nin-yẽŋɔ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nini bayi dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bug-tẽŋa, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mĩ dita nẽrba ĩyã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kĩŋra.
Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la bugum makɛ nẽrba wuu wʋ ban dɩkɛ yaarʋm yugse sɛla.
Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la yaarʋm sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm?
Ãna-ya wʋ yaarʋm n tarɩ yẽlʋm se'em na, dee tara sũ-mã'asʋm la taaba.»
Pɔka lebsgo yelle La Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm, Zʋrdẽ doone ke bɔba.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e le lagsɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a zãsna ba wʋ ẽŋa n ẽn ɩta se'em na.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba wa'am tɩ ba di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bʋraa tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ a lebse a pɔga mɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: «Amoyisi yʋʋn bɔ ya nõorɛ yetɩ bẽm?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Amoyisi yʋʋn sakɛ tɩ tɩ gʋlsɛ la pɔgdire lebsgo gõŋɔ, dee tarɩ ẽ ka lebse.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «La de la ya sũure n kɛ tɩ ya ka sakɛ pa'algɔ la ĩyã tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ nõor-ẽŋa bɔ ya.
La halɩ dũnia pĩ'iluŋo, Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn nãam nẽrsaalba la, a nãam la bʋraa la pɔka.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ bʋraa wʋn basɛ a sɔ, la a ma, dee lagɩm na a pɔga.
La ba ka le dɛna bayi, ba lebge la ayɩla.
Bɛla, sɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lagɩm na taaba, nẽrsaala da welge ba.» La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ la deem, tɩ ba le soke ẽ yelle ẽŋa võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Bʋraa sãn lebse a pɔga dee di pɔka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pɔga.
La pɔka mẽ sãn basɛ a sɩra dee ele bʋraa ayẽma, a mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ a gã'arɛ la bʋraa n dagɩ a sɩra.» Azezi kã kã'a-sõma bɔ kɔma Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tarɩ kɔm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la zɛbɛ nẽrba la.
La Azezi n yẽ bɛla la, la ka ẽŋɛ a sũure yẽlʋm, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya kɔm-pɩgsɩ la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kɔma wã bõnɔ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɔna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» A yele bɛla, dee to'ose kɔma la mɛ, dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto kã kã'a-sõma bɔ ba.
Bõntarsa yelle Azezi daan basɛ bilam dee le dɩkɛ la sore sẽnna.
Tɩ bʋraa zoe wa'am a zẽ'am, wa ka dũma a nẽŋam soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋɔ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ?» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fõn wi'ira mam tɩ nẽr-sõŋɔ?
Nẽra ka boe n ãn sõŋa sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Fõn mi Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em: ‹Da kʋ nẽra, da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pɔga, da zũ, da tɔgɛ põmpɔrŋɔ kaseto, da wẽgɛ nẽra, nanna fʋ sɔ, la fʋ ma.› » Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, halɩ mam bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm tɩ mam põn sakra bõn-bãma wuu.» Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ ẽ nõŋɛ ẽ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sɛla ayɩla n deege dɛna fʋ ẽŋɛ: Sẽŋɛ ka koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ ligri la bɔ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dɔla mam.» La ẽn wõm wãna la, tɩ a nẽŋa zũŋe tɩ a fõrgɛ la sũ-sã'aŋɔ, se'ere n soe la, a tarɩ la bõntarsõm zo'oge.
Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la kaagɛ, dee yele ba yetɩ: «La tɔ mɛ bɔ bõntatba tɩ ba kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» Tɩ a yetɔga la di'ige a karẽnbiisi la.
Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «M kɔma, la tɔ mɛ tɩ nẽra kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupĩim yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» Tɩ la di'ige ba halɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?» Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba dee yetɩ: «Nẽrsaala ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, la Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ tã sɛla woo ɩta mɛ.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma basɛ sɛla woo mɛ dee dɔla fõn.» Tɩ Azezi yele yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a yire, bɩɩ a kẽendõma, la a yɩbsɩ, bɩɩ a ma, bɩɩ a sɔ, bɩɩ a kɔma, bɩɩ a vatɔ mam ĩyã, la Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la ĩyã, dũnia wã zuo a wʋn to'oge yiɛ, la kẽendõma, la yɩbsɩ, la madõma, la kɔma, la vatɔ nõor-kɔbga, la a wʋn yẽ nãmsgɔ.
La wakatɛ n sẽm, a wʋn yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ.
La nẽŋam dõma zozo'e wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma lebge nẽŋam dõma.» Azezi le tɔgɛ a kũm, la a vo'ore yelle Ba daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi bɔna ba nẽŋa.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽgra, dee tɩ dabeem tara nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ ba la.
Tɩ Azezi le tarɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la sẽŋɛ ka tɔgra pa'ala ba bõn-sɛba n wʋn wa ẽŋɛ ẽŋa, yetɩ: «Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, bilam tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nu'usum.
Tɩ ba wʋn tɔgɛ a yelle kʋ yetɩ a masɛ la kũm, dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum, tɩ ba la ẽ, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mĩ ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa dee kʋ ẽ.
La a wʋn vo'oge dabsa atã daarɛ.» Azakɩ la Azã sosgo Tɩ Azebede kɔma Azakɩ la Azã sẽŋɛ lɛm Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma boorɩ la tõma n wʋn sose fõn bõn-sɛka la, fʋ ẽŋɛ bɔ tɔ.» Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bɔ ya?» Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, botɩ tõma nẽra ayɩla zĩ'ire fʋ zʋʋgɔ, tɩ ayɩla zĩ'ire fʋ gɔbga.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Ya ka mi yãma n sosrɩ sɛla.
Ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ nãmsgɔ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã, bɩɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ wʋ mam n sakɛ tɩ m nãmsɛ se'em na halɩ ka ki?» Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ bɛla.» Tɩ Azezi lebe yele ba yetɩ: «Asɩra, ya wʋn nãmsɛ nãmsgɔ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã halɩ ka ki.
La, la dagɩ mam n wʋn looge sɛka n wʋn zĩ'ire mam zʋʋgɔ bɩɩ mam gɔbga.
Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm zẽ'e-bãma tɩ a bɔ la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a yetɩ a bɔ la.» La karẽnbiisi pia la n wõm bɛla la, ba sũure n isge la Azakɩ la Azã.
Tɩ Azezi wi ba wuu, yele ba yetɩ: «Ya mi tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma soe ba nẽrba la pãŋa, dee tɩ kɛ'ɛndõma pẽrgra nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bãma n boorɩ se'em.
La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla.
Nẽr-sɛka n boe ya pʋam bɔɔra tɩ a lebge nẽr-keko, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
La nẽr-sɛka n boorɩ tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya wuu yamŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ nẽrba tõm bɔ ẽ, a wa'am tɩ a tõm mɛ bɔ, dee dɩkɛ a vɔm bɔ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ fãarɛ.» Azezi botɩ Abartime nini yẽta Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ dɔla la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam tɔlla, la ban daan ze'ele tẽŋa la pʋam yɛsra la, nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n dolɩ ba.
Tɩ fʋa zẽa sore nõorʋm sɔsra, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Abartime, a de la Atime dayʋa.
La ẽn wõm tɩ ba tɔgrɩ tɩ la de la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la, tɩ a tĩi tɔgra yetɩ: «Azezi, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga.» Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tãsɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Go'oge fʋ yetɔga la.» Tɩ a malɩn tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga.» Tɩ Azezi ze'ele dee yetɩ: «Wi-ya ẽ tɩ a wa'am.» Tɩ ba wi ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Keŋe fʋ sũure, isge tɩ a wi'iri fo.» Tɩ a lobe a fugɔbga basɛ, dee vaa isge sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bɔ fɔ?» Tɩ a yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, mam boorɩ tɩ m le yẽta mɛ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ, fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã tɩ fʋ yẽ laafɛ.» Tɩ fʋa la yẽta bilam mẽŋa, dɔla Azezi sore la zuo.
Azezi kẽ'erɩ Zerizalɛm la na'am Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka yɔna la Zerizalɛm, lɛm Betɩfaazɩ la Betani, Oliivi tãŋa la zẽ'am.
Tɩ a tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi, yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽn-sɛka n boe ya nẽŋa la pʋam.
Ya sãn paagɛ mĩ, ya wʋn yẽ bõn-biire tɩ ba lʋ ze'ele, tɩ nẽra nãn ka bã ẽ.
Ya lorge ẽ tarɩ wa'am.
La nẽra sãn soke ya yetɩ: ‹Wãne tɩ ya lɔrgra ẽ?›, ya lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ›, tɩ a wʋn basɛ tɩ ya tarɩ ẽ leme wa'am tɔtɔ.» Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ bõn-biire la n lʋ zanõrʋm sore nõorʋm, tɩ ba lorge ẽ.
La nẽrba basɛba n daan ze bilam soke ba yetɩ: «Wãne tɩ yãma lɔrgra bõn-biire la?» Tɩ ba lerge wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, tɩ nẽrba la basɛ ba.
Tɩ ba tarɩ bõn-biire la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, ka dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ Azezi bã.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yɛrgɛ ba futo sore zuo, tɩ basɛba sẽŋɛ va'am ka kɔ võorɔ wa yɛrgɛ sore zuo.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe a nẽŋa, la sɛba n boe a poorʋm na daan tĩi tɔgra yetɩ: «Ozaana!
Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.
Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm tɩ a di tɩ yaaba Adavidi na'am na.
Ozaana!
Nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum.» Tɩ Azezi paagɛ Zerizalɛm kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bɩsɛ sɛla woo kaagɛ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ mã'agɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yese sẽŋɛ Betani.
Azezi kã be'em bɔ kẽnkãŋa Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ ba ze'ele Betani lɛbra Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kɔm dõnna.
Tɩ a yẽ kẽnkãŋa n ze zãazãarɛ tara võorɔ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka bɩsɛ a na'an wʋn yẽ sɛla kẽnkãŋa la zuo.
La ẽn paagɛ la, a ka yẽ sɛla a zuo, a yẽ la võorɔ mã'a.
Se'ere n soe la, kẽnkãma wakatɛ daan nãn ka paagɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yele kẽnkãŋa la yetɩ: «Nẽra kãn le malɩn di fʋ biɛ.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wõm.
Azezi dige nẽrba n koosrɩ lɔgrɔ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na Tɩ ba paagɛ Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra nẽr-sɛba n koosrɩ, la sɛba n da'arɩ Wẽndeem na tɩ ba yɛsra.
Dee zã'agɛ lig-tɛɛrba taablɩdõma, la sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma la kʋgsɩ lʋbɛ.
La a daan ka sakɛ tɩ nẽra zɛɛra sɛla dɔla Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam.
Dee daan zãsna nẽrba la yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: ‹Ba wʋn wi'ira mam deego la tɩ pʋ'ʋsgɔ deego buuri wuu ĩyã.› La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgɔ zẽ'a.» Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma wõm bɛla, ɛɛra bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ ẽ, la ba zotɩ ẽ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋɔ la daan kẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la sũure mɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ zaanõorɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
Kẽnkãŋa n kʋɩ yelle Tɩ bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ tɩ ba dɔla sore la, yẽ kẽnkãŋa la n kʋɩ la yẽga wuu.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, yele Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ, kẽnkãŋa la tɩ fʋ kã be'em bɔ ẽ na kʋɩ mɛ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: ‹Võogɛ ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam›, dee bɔ sɩra a sũure pʋam tɩ ẽŋa n yele se'em na wʋn ẽŋɛ, dee ka sẽ'ena, la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ.
Bɛla tɩ mam yetɩ, ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ sɔsra sɛla, bɔ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra tɩ ya to'oge ya, tɩ ya wʋn sɩrɩ to'oge.
La ya sãn bɔna mĩ pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, ya sãn tara yelle la nẽra, basɛ-ya ẽ taalɛ, tɩ ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
[ Yãma sãn ka basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ kãn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
]» Ãne n bɔ Azezi nõorɛ tɩ a tõnna?
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la le sẽŋɛ la Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na ɛɛra.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am, ka soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna?
Bɩɩ ãne n bɔ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta bõn-bãna?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla, tɩ ya sãn lerge mam, mam mẽ wʋn yele ya nõor-sɛka tɩ mam tarɩ ɩta bõn-bãna.
Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba?
Lerge-ya ma.» Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: «Tɩ sãn lerge yetɩ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ĩyã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
Tɩ mẽ kãn tã'agɛ yetɩ la de la nẽrsaalba n tõm ẽ.» Ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu daan sakɛ tɩ Azã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa.
Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma ka mi.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãma.»
Nẽrba n bɩsrɩ va'am makrɛ Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi daan magsrɩ la magsa tɔgra bɔ'ɔra ba yetɩ: «Bʋraa ayɩla n daan kɔ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, mẽ lalga kaagɛ ẽ, dee tũ boko tɩ ba wẽkra viinye la biɛ, dee mẽ de-woko tɩ ba zɔnna bɩsra a va'am na, yãŋa dɩkɛ va'am na bɔ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna tɩ a sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am ka to'oge a pʋrɛ wa'am wa bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ ba yõkɛ tõntõnna la wẽ, botɩ a lebe kule zãŋa.
Tɩ va'am na dãana le tõm nẽra ayɩla ba zẽ'am, tɩ ba wẽ a zuugo ãagɛ, dee yaalɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a le malɩn tõm nẽra ayɩla, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
Tɩ a tõm nẽrba zozo'e, tɩ ba wẽ basɛba, dee kʋ basɛba.
La nẽra ayɩla mã'a n daan deege tɩ a tãna wʋn tõm, la de la a bi-nõŋrɛ.
Tɩ a daan tõm ẽ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, dee tẽ'esra yetɩ: ‹Ẽna n de mam dayʋa la, ba wʋn nan ẽ.› Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na yele taaba yetɩ: ‹Ẽna n wʋn wa sɔɔgɛ sɔna a sɔ bõntarsõm na, basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ, tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnɔ.› Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ kʋ, tarɩ ẽ yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka basɛ.
Bɛla, va'am na dãana yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?
A wʋn wa'am wa kʋ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na mɛ, dee to'oge va'am na bɔ basɛba.
Yãma põn karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ zẽ'e-sɛka n gʋlsɛ yetɩ: ‹Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la n lebge kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa.
La de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, tɩ la dɛna yel-di'iŋa bɔ tõma.› » Tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma la daan ɛɛra tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi, se'ere n soe la, ba mi tɩ la de la bãma ĩyã tɩ a makɛ makrɛ ẽŋa, la ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Ba soke Azezi lampo yʋa yelle Tɩ ba tõm Farisi dõma basɛba, la naba A'erɔdɩ nẽrba basɛba, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka soke Azezi sokre tɩ a tɔgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn de la sɩra dãana, dee ka fabla nẽrba n tɔgrɩ fõn yelle se'em na, fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba, la fõn zãsnɩ nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla la sɩra.
Tõma yetɩ tɩ soke bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ tɩ yɔ lampo bɔ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, sore ka boe?
Tɩ yɔ bɩɩ tɩ da yɔ?» Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ ba boorɩ tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽŋa mɛ, soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya bẽta ma?
Tarɩ-ya lagfɔ wa'am tɩ m bɩsɛ.» Tɩ ba tarɩ lagfɔ la wa'am wa bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «La de la Rom na-keko la.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee bɔ Nawẽnnɛ ẽn soe bõn-sɛka.» Tɩ Azezi yetɔga la di'ige ba.
Ba soke Azezi kũm vo'ore yelle Saduse dõma n yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ bɔ tõma yetɩ: ‹Nẽra sɔbia sãn ki deege a pɔga dee ka tara bia, a di pɔkõorɛ la dɔgɛ kɔma bɔ sɛka n ki la.› La bʋraasɩ bayopɔɩ n daan boe dɛna sɔbiisi.
Tɩ pɔspɔsɩ dãana la di pɔga, ki dee ka dɔgɛ bia.
Tɩ bʋyi dãana la di pɔkõorɛ la, mẽ ki dee ka dɔgɛ bia.
Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla.
La bãma bayopɔɩ la wuu lagɩm di pɔka la mɛ, ki dee ka dɔgɛ bia.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pɔka la mẽ ki.
Bãma bayopɔɩ wuu n lagɩm di pɔka la dee ki la, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, ãne n wʋn sɔna pɔka la?» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Ya tuuge mɛ, yãma n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ n yele se'em, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa n ãn se'em na ĩyã.
Kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bʋraasɩ ka diti pɔgba, la pɔgsɩ mẽ ka ellɩ sɩrba, ba wuu wʋn ãna wʋ malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire la.
La sãn dɛna kũm vo'ore yelle, yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Amoyisi gõŋɔ la pʋam Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn ze'ele tũntuugo la pʋam tɔgɛ la ẽ se'em na?
A yʋʋn yele yetɩ: ‹Mam de la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakɔbɩ Nawẽnnɛ.› La pa'alɛ tɩ bãma wuu vɔa mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la sɛba n vɔa Nawẽnnɛ.
Ya tuuge mɛ zozo'e.» Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ?
Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nẽra ayɩla wõm ban tɔgrɩ la taaba, dee bãŋɛ tɩ Azezi lerge Saduse dõma la sõŋa, tɩ a lɛm ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na wuu pʋam, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Sɛka n gãnnɩ wuu n wãna: ‹Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, selse-ya.
Zuudãana n de tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na, de la Zuudãana ayɩla.
Nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de fʋ Zuudãana la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu.› La bʋyi dãana n wãna: ‹Nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.› Nõorɛ ayẽma ka boe n gãnnɩ bãna.» Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fõn yele se'em na ãn sõŋa, la de la sɩra, Nawẽnnɛ de la ayɩla, ayẽma ka boe sãn dagna ẽŋa mã'a.
Fʋ nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na, ãn sõŋa mɛ gãnna kãabgɔ buuri wuu.» Tɩ Azezi yẽ ẽn lerge la yɛm na, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ ka zãagɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm.» Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sokre.
Krisi de la naba Adavidi Zuudãana Azezi n daan zãsnɩ nẽrba Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, a soke ba yetɩ: «Wãne tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ Krisi de la naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa?
Dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yʋʋn botɩ Adavidi mẽŋa tɔgɛ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zĩ'ire m zʋʋgɔ bɔba halɩ tɩ m wa ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba la tɩ ba bɔna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.› Adavidi mẽŋa sãn wi ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana›, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?» Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la sɛlsra a yetɔga la sũ-yẽlʋm.
Azezi yele nẽrba tɩ ba da ãna wʋ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma Azezi n zãsnɩ nẽrba la, a yele ba yetɩ: «Guuse ya mẽŋa la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n eerɩ kaara la fu-wogro bɔɔra tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra nã'asra ba da'asʋm, dee bɔɔra nã'asgɔ zẽ'esɩ wẽndeto pʋam, la dia zẽ'esʋm tɩ ba zẽa la.
Ba to'osrɩ la pɔkõpa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ba.
Ba wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu.» Pɔkõorɛ bɔ'a yelle Azezi daan zĩ la Wẽnde-kãtʋm ligri daka la zẽ'am dee bɩsra nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la n sẽnnɩ ɩta ligri daka la pʋam.
Tɩ bõntatba zozo'e ɩta ligri pãɩ.
Tɩ pɔkõorɛ n de nasa wa'am wa dɩkɛ lig-kõb-pɩgsɩ bayi mã'a ẽŋɛ mĩ.
Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ pɔkõorɛ ẽna n de nasa la ẽŋɛ ligri daka la pʋam zo'oge gãnna ba wuu mɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, bãma wuu looge la bãma n tarɩ sɛla pãɩ la pʋam wa ẽŋɛ mĩ.
La ẽŋa n de nasa la, dɩkɛ la a dia ligri wuu wa ẽŋɛ mĩ.»
Wẽnde-kãtɛ la sã'aŋɔ, la dũnia ba'asgɔ nãmsgɔ yelle Azezi daan ze'ele la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na yɛsra, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ kuga n ba ãna sõŋa tɩ ba dɩkɛ mẽ de-kãra se'em.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ de-kãra wã, ba wʋn lʋbɛ ba wuu mɛ saam saam tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo.» La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la Oliivi tãŋa zuo tɩ a nẽŋa bɩsra Wẽnde-kãtɛ la.
La Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la A'ãndre mã'a n daan boe a zẽ'am, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Yele to, wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ, la bẽm n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ wakatɛ la paagɛ mɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu wʋn ẽŋɛ?» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Guuse-ya tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: ‹Mam n de Krisi la.› La ba wʋn botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tuuge mɛ.
Ya sãn wa wõm zɛbrɛ dãmnɛ, la zɛbrɛ yelle, da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem kẽ ya, dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma ẽŋɛ.
La, la nãn ka de dũnia ba'asgɔ.
Buuri ayɩla wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma.
La tẽŋa wʋn tĩi mĩim mɛ zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, la kɔm wʋn bɔna.
Bɛla wuu nãn de la toogo la sẽŋrɛ, la ãn wʋ pɔka virgre toogo n nãn sẽŋrɩ la.
Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ nẽrba wʋn tarɩ ya mɛ sẽŋɛ ka sãm ba sarɩyadia zẽ'esʋm, tɩ ba wẽ ya ba wẽndeto pʋam.
La ba wʋn tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ gɔmnadõma, la na'adõma nẽŋam mam ĩyã.
La ya wʋn tɔgɛ mam yɛla pa'alɛ ba.
La dẽnɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la dẽŋɛ mõolɛ bɔ buuri wuu, dee tɩ dũnia ba'asgɔ paagɛ.
La ba sãn wa yõgɛ ya tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka sãm sarɩyadia zẽ'am, ya da fabla yãma n wʋn tɔgɛ se'em, wakatɛ sãn wa paagɛ, tɔgɛ-ya yetɔg-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ ya mẽŋa n wʋn tɔgɛ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn sõŋɛ ya.
Sɔbia wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ sɔbia kʋ, tɩ sɔ mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ a bia bɛla, la kɔma wʋn zɛbra la ba sɔdõma, la ba madõma botɩ ba kʋ ba.
Nẽrba zozo'e wʋn sise ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã.
La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn mõrgɛ ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgɔ wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
Ya wʋn wa yẽ sɛka n de bõn-be'ego n sã'anɩ sɛla woo la, tɩ a boe zẽ'e-sɛka n ka masɛ tɩ a bɔna la.» (Sɛka n karẽŋrɩ la mõrgɛ wõm a võorɛ.)
«Ya sãn yẽ bɛla, sɛba n boe Zude zoe zom tãnsɩ zuo.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe gɔsgɔ da sige bɔɔra tɩ a kẽ deem dɩkɛ sɛla.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe va'am da kãn lebe kule yire tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo.
Dabs-bãma, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bɔ pɔg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa la, la sɛba n tarɩ kɔma tɩ ba mõgra la.
Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yel-bãma da wa dɛna ɔɔrɔ wakatɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, dabs-bãma wʋn dɛna la toogo zozo'e, tɩ ba nãn ka yẽ halɩ pĩ'iluŋo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nãam dũnia wa paam zĩna, la toog-ẽŋa buuri kãn le malɩn wa'am.
Nawẽnnɛ sãn ka bo'oge nɩ dabs-bãma sõorɛ, nẽra ka boe nɩ n wʋn põsɛ.
La Nawẽnnɛ mẽŋa nẽrba tɩ a looge la ĩyã, tɩ a bo'oge dabs-bãma sõorɛ.
La nẽra sãn yele ya yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ-ya, Krisi boe la kalam›, bɩɩ ‹bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke›, ya da sakɛ.
Nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Krisi, la nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba tõm tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ, bɔɔra tɩ ba sãn tã'agɛ, ba botɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la tuuge doose ba.
Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ya sɛla woo mɛ.» Azezi n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo Azezi le yele yetɩ: «Toogo la dabsa poorʋm, wẽntulle wʋn sobge mɛ, tɩ wõrga kãn le nẽera a peelem.
La wõrbiɛ wʋn ze'ele saazuum lui.
La bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mĩim mɛ.
La ba wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n boe sawara pʋam sẽna la pãn-kãtɛ, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ.
La a wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma mɛ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ dũnia gɔbga la zʋʋgɔ, la dapoore la zanõrɛ, ka lagsɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu.» Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Dɩkɛ-ya makrɛ la kẽnkãŋa bãŋɛ zãsŋɔ la võorɛ.
Kẽnkãŋa wila sãn wa pusra võorɔ, ya mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn wa yẽ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu ɩtɩ, ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lɛm mɛ, a boe la zanõrʋm.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ɩta mɛ dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetɔga kãn malɩn tole.
Nẽra nẽra ka mi daar-sɛka la wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am.
Baa malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, bɩɩ Dayʋa la mẽŋa ka mi, sãn dagna Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Guuse ya mẽŋa sõŋa, la ya mãasʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakatɛ la.
La wʋn ãna wʋ bʋraa n we'esɩ sore dee dɩkɛ a yire gu'ule a tõntõnɩba, bɔ tõntõnna woo a tõonɛ, dee yele zanõr-gu'ura tɩ a gu'ura.
Bɛla ĩyã gu'ura-ya, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakat-sɛka tɩ yidãana la wʋn leme wa'am.
A tã wʋn leme wa'am zaanõorɛ mɛ, bɩɩ sõnsʋa, bɩɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kaasga wakatɛ, bɩɩ bulika.
Guuse-ya tɩ yidãana la da wa'am wa di'ige ya, tɩ ya gĩsri mɛ.
Mam n yetɩ ya se'em na, mam yetɩ nẽrba wuu la bɛla, gu'ura-ya.»
Zifdõma nẽŋadõma eerɩ sore tɩ ba kʋ Azezi La daan deege la dabsa ayi tɩ Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa tɩ ba obrɩ borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ dabsa paagɛ.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma ɛɛra sore tɩ ba sʋgɛ yõkɛ Azezi kʋ.
Tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: «Tɩ da kãn ẽŋɛ-ya bɛla kibsa wã pʋam, tɩ nẽrba la wʋn gire mɛ.» Pɔka n ka'agɛ kaam ẽŋɛ Azezi zuo Azezi daan boe la Betani, Asimõ n wa dɛna kõnkonne yire, tɩ ba daan bɔna mĩ dita.
Tɩ pɔka tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ ka-sõma ligri n zo'oge tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ naarɩ, wa'am wa vuke dugla la, ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ Azezi zuugo.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba n boe bilam na sũure sã'am, tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ pɔka la sã'am ka-sõma la wãna?
Ba tã nɩ wʋn koose ba gãŋɛ lig-kõba kɔbstã mɛ, dɩkɛ ligri la bɔ nasdõma.» Tɩ ba zɛrgɛ pɔka la.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya pɔka la bãalam, bẽm tɩ ya tɔgra ẽ tɩ a sũure sã'am?
Ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla bɔ mam na de la tõon-sõŋɔ.
Nasdõma boe la ya lɛ mɛ wakatɛ wuu, ya tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa mɛ yan boorɩ wakat-sɛka, la mam kãn bɔna la ya lɛ wakatɛ wuu.
Ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la, tɩ a ẽŋɛ.
Ẽn ka'agɛ ka-sõma la ẽŋɛ mam ĩyã la, a dẽŋɛ ẽŋɛ la ban wʋn ẽŋɛ mam se'em mam laarɛ daarɛ.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ dũnia wã zẽ'e-sɛka wuu tɩ ba wʋn wa mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba mẽ wʋn tɔgɛ pɔka wã n ẽŋɛ mam se'em wã, tɩ ba tẽra a yelle.» Azudaasɩ eerɩ sore tɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi Tɩ Azudaasɩ Iskariyo n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla sẽŋɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am, ka yele ba tɩ ẽŋa wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
La ban daan wõm ẽn yele se'em na, tɩ ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ ba yetɩ bãma wʋn bɔ ẽ ligri.
Tɩ Azudaasɩ yãŋa ɛɛra so-sɛka tɩ a wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yãŋɛ yõkɛ ẽ na.
Azezi diti Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la a karẽnbiisi Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la pɔspɔsɩ daarɛ tɩ ba kʋʋrɩ pebilsi dita Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la n daan paagɛ.
Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ la bɛ ka mãasʋm Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la tɩ fʋ di?» Tɩ Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ya wʋn tʋ'ʋsɛ bʋraaga n tʋ yoore la ko'om, ya doose ẽ sẽŋɛ yi-sɛka tɩ a wʋn kẽ la, ka yele yidãana la yetɩ: ‹Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, deego boe la bɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi wʋn di Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la?› A wʋn pa'alɛ ya de-kãtɛ n boe ayẽma zuo, tɩ sɛla woo mãasʋm bɔna mĩ.
Bilam tɩ ya wʋn mãasʋm tɩ tɩ di kibsa la.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la pʋam ka yẽ sɛla woo wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na.
Tɩ ba mãasʋm Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la bilam.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am, wa zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ya nẽra ayɩla n diti la mam kalam n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam.» Tɩ la daan sã'am ba sũure.
Tɩ ba sɔkra ẽ ayɩla ayɩla yetɩ: «La de la mam?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «La de la ya nẽrba pia la ayi la nẽr-sɛka n wʋn yɛglɛ la mam tũm a nu'ugo laaga pʋam na.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ lan põn gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam se'em na.
La sɛka n yetɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn yẽ toogo.
Nẽr-ẽŋa ma sãn ka dɔgɛ nɩ ẽ n sõɩ.» La ban daan diti la, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bɔ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «To'oge-ya di, ẽna wã de la mam ĩyã.» Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee bɔ ba, tɩ ba wuu yũ.
Dee yele ba yetɩ: «Bãna wã de la mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ nẽrba zozo'e ĩyã, pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bĩŋe nõorɛ la ba.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn le yũ ba Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» Tɩ ba yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yese wɛ'ɛsa Oliivi tãŋam.
Azezi yetɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ ẽŋa Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Yãma wuu wʋn lebe la poorʋm dee basɛ mam, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn kʋ dũnsĩina dee tɩ piisi la wɩrgɛ.› » La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «La mam sãn wa vo'oge, mam wʋn dẽŋɛ ya sẽŋɛ Galile.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Baa ba wuu sãn lebe poorʋm dee basɛ fõn, mam kãn basɛ fõn.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zĩna, yʋ'ʋŋɔ ẽna wã, lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rɔɔgɔ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Baa la sãn dɛna tɩ mam lagɩm na fõn ki, mam kãn malɩn sɩ'ɩsɛ fõn.» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la wuu lagɩm yele bɛla.
Azezi pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ Getsemane Tɩ ba paagɛ zẽ'e-sɛka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Getsemane la.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Zĩ'ire-ya kalam dee tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ.» La a tarɩ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã sẽŋɛ.
Tɩ a sũure sã'am zozo'e, tɩ la dãan ẽ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Sũ-sã'aŋɔ n tarɩ mam zozo'e tɩ mam ãna wʋ m yetɩ m ki mɛ na.
Weege-ya kalam gu'ura, da gĩse-ya.» La a sẽŋɛ la nẽŋa fẽe, ka võglɛ tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, la sãn tãna, toogo la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
Dee yetɩ: «M Sɔ, fõn tã sɛla woo ɩta, basɛ tɩ nãmsgɔ ẽna fõrgɛ dee basɛ ma.
La, la da kãn dɛna mam n boorɩ se'em, la dɛna fõn boorɩ se'em.» La a leme a karẽnbiisi batã la zẽ'am wa yẽ tɩ ba gĩsri mɛ, tɩ a soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asimõ, fõn gĩsri mɛ?
Fõn ka tã wʋn gu karf-ayɩla ka gĩse?» Dee yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya gẽem dee pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui.
Ya sɩa la boorɩ mɛ, la ya ĩyã ka tara pãŋa.» La a daan le lebe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ se'em na.
Dee le leme wa yẽ tɩ ba gĩsri mɛ, se'ere n soe la, gẽem n ba tarɩ ba.
Tɩ ba ka mina ban wʋn yele ẽ se'em.
A daan le sẽŋɛ mɛ, dee leme wa'am nõorɛ atã pʋam wa soke ba yetɩ: «Ya ken vɔ'ɔsra mɛ dee gĩsra?
La ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ mɛ, wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ tõon-be'ero dõma nu'usum.
Isge-ya tɩ sẽŋɛ, tɩ sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam na n wãna sẽm.» Ba yõkɛ Azezi Azezi n daan ken tɔgra la, tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla, doose la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ sẽŋɛ paam.
La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la daan tarɩ la sʋkɔbrɔ, la dɔa dɔla ẽ.
La de la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma n tõm ba.
La Azudaasɩ n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na, põn tɔgɛ mɛ pa'alɛ ba yetɩ: «Sɛka tɩ mam wʋn kɔkɛ ẽ na, ẽŋa n bɛla, yõkɛ-ya ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sõŋa fõrgɛ.» La Azudaasɩ n paam na, a sẽŋɛ lɛm na Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama.» Dee kɔkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ nẽrba la paagɛ yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe mĩ na nẽra ayɩla fooge a sʋkɔbgɔ sɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna tʋbrɛ fiige.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ la sʋkɔbrɔ, la dɔa sẽna tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la?
Mam daan boe la yãma lɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo zãsna nẽrba, tɩ ya ka yõkɛ mam.
La, la de la tɩ bõn-sɛka n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam na ẽŋɛ.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wuu zoe dee basɛ ẽ.
La budib-polle ayɩla n daan lobe fugɔbga mã'a dɔla Azezi.
Tɩ ba daan zɛ ẽ tɩ ba yõkɛ, tɩ a basɛ a fugɔbga la dee zoe beele fõrgɛ.
Ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Zifdõma sarɩyaditba zẽ'am Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire, bilam tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la wuu tigse.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan bɔna poorʋm zãazãarɛ dɔla, ka paagɛ kẽ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire zẽnzakam, zẽa la tõntõnɩba ɔɔsra bugum.
La kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la sarɩyaditba la wuu daan eerɩ la yelle tɩ ba dõrɛ Azezi botɩ ba kʋ ẽ, la ba ka yẽ.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan parɩm bɔ Azezi, la ba yetɔga la ka doose taaba.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan isge parɩm bɔ ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma wõm tɩ a yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la tɩ nẽrsaalba mẽ la, dee le mẽ ayẽma dabsa atã pʋam n dagɩ nẽrsaalba mẽa.› » Baa bõn-ẽŋa pʋam ba yetɔga la ka doose taaba.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la isge ze'ele ba wuu nẽŋam soke Azezi yetɩ: «Ban tɔgɛ fõn se'em na, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?» Tɩ Azezi daan sĩna ka lerge se'ere.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la le soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ tɩ tõma pẽgrɩ la Dayʋa la?» Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Ẽe, mam de la ẽŋa.
La ya wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tɩ a zĩ Nawẽnnɛ n de pãŋa dãana la zʋʋgɔ bɔba, ya wʋn yẽ tɩ a boe sawara pʋam sẽna.» Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la ãasʋm a mẽŋa futo, dee yetɩ: «Tɩ le ɛɛra la bẽm kaset-dõma?
Ya wõm ẽn sã'am Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ.
Yãma tẽ'esɛ la wãne?» Tɩ ba wuu yetɩ: «A masɛ la kũm.» Tɩ ba nẽrba basɛba daan sẽŋɛ tʋbsra nõtõorʋm ɩta Azezi, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ pĩ a nini, mũm kũnkũra wẽ ẽ, dee yɛta ẽ tɩ: «Bãŋɛ pa'alɛ tɔ nẽr-sɛka n wẽ fɔ?» Tɩ gu'urba la to'oge ẽ, wẽ a pɛgsɩ.
Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ tɩ ẽŋa ka mi Azezi La Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan ken bɔna la zẽnzakam na, tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõn-pɔka wa'am mĩ, wa yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ n ɔɔsrɩ bugum na, tɩ a bɩsra ẽ, dee yetɩ: «Fõn mẽ daan po bɔna la Nazarɛtɩ bʋraa Azezi lɛ.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ yetɩ: «Mam ka mi, mam ka bãŋɛ fõn yele se'em na võorɛ.» Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla dee yese ka zɛ la zanõrʋm, tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kaasɛ.
Tɩ tõntõn-pɔka la le yẽ ẽ, yele sɛba n boe mĩ na yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna de la Azezi nẽra ayɩla.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le sɩ'ɩsɛ.
Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ze mĩ na le yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asɩra, fõn de la ba nẽra ayɩla.
Fõn de la Galile nẽra.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pɔɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Mam ka mi bʋra-sɛka tɩ ya tɔgrɩ a yelle wã.» Bilam mẽŋa tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ le kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi pʋam.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ Azezi n daan yele ẽ yetɩ: «Lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rɔɔgɔ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam» na.
Tɩ a sũure sã'am, tɩ a kɛlla.
Ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ gɔmna Apilatɩ zẽ'am Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, bãma wuu n de sarɩyaditba la daan lagsɛ mɛ tɔgɛ kʋ, botɩ ba lʋ Azezi tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am.
Tɩ Apilatɩ soke Azezi yetɩ: «Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «La de la fõn yele se'em na.» Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la dõrɛ ẽ yɛla zozo'e.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke Azezi yetɩ: «Fõn wõm yetɔg-sɛba wuu tɩ ba tɔgɛ bɔ fʋ wã, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?» Tɩ Azezi ka le lerge se'ere, tɩ la di'ige Apilatɩ.
Ba tɔgɛ tɩ ba kʋ Azezi Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa woo Apilatɩ daan ẽn botɩ ba yese la nẽr-sɛka tɩ nẽrba la boorɩ la yʋ'a deem basɛ.
La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Abarabasɩ, ẽŋa la nẽrba basɛba n daan dãmɛ tẽŋa, kʋ nẽra tɩ ba yõgɛ ba yʋ.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n ɩtɩ se'em na bɔ ba.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Ya boorɩ tɩ m yese la Zifdõma naba la basɛ bɔ ya?» Se'ere n soe la, a bãŋɛ tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la ẽŋɛ la sũure botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi wa bɔ ẽ.
La kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la daan sa'asɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la mɛ, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka sose Apilatɩ tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bɔ ba.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke ba yetɩ: «Bɛla, sɛka tɩ ya wi'iri tɩ Zifdõma naba la, yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ ẽ na wãne?» Tɩ ba tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.» Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: «A ẽŋɛ la bẽm n de be'em?» Tɩ ba malɩn tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.» La Apilatɩ daan boorɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ tɩ nẽrba la sũure n ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bɔ ba.
Dee botɩ ba wẽ Azezi la ka'asa, dee dɩkɛ ẽ bɔ tɩ ba ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.
Sʋdaasɩ yaalɛ Azezi Tɩ sʋdaasɩ tarɩ Azezi kẽ gɔmna la yire zẽnzakam, dee wi sʋdaasɩ la wuu, tɩ ba lagsɛ.
Tɩ ba dɩkɛ fuugo n de gomusga yɛ Azezi, dee dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ.
Dee yãŋa pʋ'ʋsra ẽ yetɩ: «Zifdõma naba, naa!» Dee dɩkɛ dasaarɛ wẽ a zuugo, tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mĩ ẽ, dee ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asra ẽ.
Ban yaalɛ ẽ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba yɛɛgɛ gomusga fuugo la mɛ, dee le yɛ ẽ a futo, tarɩ ẽ yese tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka ka dɔ-puurŋa zuo kʋ.
Ba ka Azezi dɔ-puurŋa zuo Ban daan tarɩ Azezi wɛ'ɛsa la, ba daan tʋ'ʋsɛ la bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, a de la Alɛgsãndrɩ la Arufusi sɔ.
A daan ze'ele la va'am lɛmna.
Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la pẽrgɛ ẽ, tɩ a to'oge Azezi kũm dɔ-puurŋa la buke.
Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Golgota, a võorɛ de la zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a.
Ba daan dɩkɛ la dãam n gaam na tɩɩm yʋ'ʋrɛ n de miiri bɔ ẽ tɩ a yũ, tɩ a zagsɛ ka yũ.
Tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo, dee dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ taaba, pɔsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge se'em.
La daan de la bulika karf-awɛɩ wakatɛ tɩ ba ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.
Ba daan gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgɔ pa'alɛ bõn-sɛka n botɩ ba ka ẽ lablɛ dɔ-puurŋa la zuo.
Ba daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «Zifdõma naba.» Ba daan tarɩ la fãarba bayi wa po ka dɔ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a zʋʋgɔ bɔba, ayẽma a gɔbga bɔba.
[ La de la bɛla, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ n gʋlsɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ.
La gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «Ba geele ẽ pa'asɛ la tõon-be'ero dõma pʋam.»] Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ bilam tɔlla la lɔbra ba zuto, dee tʋʋra ẽ yetɩ: «Ẽhẽe, faa!
Dagɩ fõn yetɩ fõn wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam?
Fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa dɔ-puurŋa la zuo sige.» Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la mẽ la'ara ẽ yɛta taaba yetɩ: «A daan fãagrɩ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, dee ka tãna wʋn fãagɛ a mẽŋa.
A sãn dɛna Krisi, Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba la, a ze'ele dɔ-puurŋa la zuo sige nãnannɛ wã tɩ tɩ yẽ dee sakɛ.» Tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba ka dɔ-puursi zuto lɛm ẽ na mẽ tɔgɛ ẽ be'em.
Azezi kũm Wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka n daan paagɛ, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika halɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
Karf-atã la wakatɛ tɩ Azezi tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani.» La võorɛ de la: «Mam Wẽnnaam, mam Wẽnnaam, bẽm n soe tɩ fõn basɛ mam?» Tɩ sɛba n ze bilam na basɛba wõm bɛla, yetɩ: «Selse-ya, a wi'iri la A'eli.» Tɩ nẽra ayẽma zoe ka dɩkɛ nẽtɩŋa lʋsɛ dã-mĩ'isgo pʋam zẽkɛ la dɔɔgɔ bɔ ẽ tɩ a yũ, dee yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ gu bɩsɛ A'eli la sãn wʋn wa sike ẽ dɔ-puurŋa la zuo.» Tɩ Azezi le kaasɛ ke'enke'em dee yãŋa ki.
Wakat-ẽŋa, tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka saazuum ka paagɛ tẽŋa.
Tɩ Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma daan zɛ Azezi nẽŋam yẽ ẽn ki se'em, tɩ a yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna wã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.» La pɔgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan boe mĩ zɛ kẽnkɛrŋa bɩsra.
Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari n de Azakɩ pɩka la Azoze ma, la Asalome n daan boe ba pʋam.
Azezi n daan boe Galile la, ba daan dolɩ ẽ mɛ dee sõŋra ẽ.
La pɔgsɩ basɛba zozo'e n daan lagɩm doose ẽ wa'am Zerizalɛm n boe mĩ.
Azezi laarɛ Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bɔna mĩ kẽ'era, la daan de la beere n wʋn wiige Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ, tɩ ba daan bɔna mĩ mãasna.
Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ, a ze'ele la Arimate, a de la sarɩyaditba la nẽra ayɩla tɩ ba nannɩ.
A mẽ daan gu'uri la Nawẽnnɛ n wʋn wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.
Lan daan de beere n wʋn wiige vo'osgo daarɛ la ĩyã, tɩ a kɛ'ɛm sũure sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose Azezi kũm na.
La Apilatɩ n wõm tɩ Azezi darɛ ki mɛ na, la di'ige ẽ mɛ.
Tɩ a botɩ ba wi sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la, tɩ a soke bãŋɛ Azezi ki yuuge mɛ?
La Apilatɩ n wõm sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la lergre la, tɩ a bɔ Azozɛfʋ sore tɩ a sike kũm na.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ da tãnnɛ sike kũm na dɔ-puurŋa la zuo, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ la vile ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ yɔɔgɔ tɩ ba daan tũ tãmpĩa ĩyã, yãŋa bilge kug-kãtɛ lige yɔɔgɔ la nõorɛ.
Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azoze ma Amaari daan ze mɛ bɩsra zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba bĩŋe ẽ na.
Azezi vo'ore Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ n daan tole, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azakɩ ma Amaari, la Asalome da tɩdarɛ yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa tɩ ba tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ Azezi ĩyã.
Tɩ Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika wẽnnɛ n doorɩ se'em mã'a la, tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa yɔɔm na, dee tɔgra la taaba sore yetɩ: «Ãne n wʋn bilge kugre la yɔɔgɔ la nõorʋm bɔ tɔ?» La ban paagɛ la, ba yẽ tɩ kugre la n ba ãna kãtɛ la põn bilge mɛ gã.
Tɩ ba kẽ yɔɔgɔ la pʋam, yẽ budib-polle n yɛ fu-pɛɛlga zẽa zʋʋgɔ bɔba, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Da basɛ-ya tɩ ya palẽŋa ẽgra, mam mi tɩ ya eerɩ la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ ba ka dɔ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la.
A vo'oge mɛ, a ka boe kalam.
Bɩsɛ-ya zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan bĩŋe ẽ na n wãna.
Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a karẽnbiisi basɛba la yetɩ: ‹A wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile.
Bilam tɩ ya wʋn yẽ ẽ, wʋ ẽn daan yele ya se'em na.› » Tɩ ba yɛm bɔɩ, tɩ ba ĩyã gõgra, tɩ ba yese yɔɔgɔ la pʋam zoe, la ba daan ka yele nẽra nẽra sɛla, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n tarɩ ba.
Azezi dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ nẽrba [ Azezi n daan vo'oge Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ la, a dẽŋɛ dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala.
La de la ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopɔɩ daan dolɩ ẽ tɩ Azezi dige ba, tɩ ba yese la.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ Azezi la.
Ba daan zĩ la sũ-sã'aŋɔ la nintãm.
La ban daan wõm tɩ Azezi vo'oge mɛ tɩ Amaari yẽ ẽ na, ba daan ka sakɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi le teege nẽŋa ayẽma dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi bayi n daan boe sore wɛ'ɛsa tẽn-pɩka ayɩla.
Tɩ ba lebe ka yele ba taaba la, tɩ ba ka sakɛ.
La bɛla poorʋm, tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la daan zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ba.
Dee zɛbɛ ba, ban daan ka bɔ sɩra, la ba sũure n kɛ la ĩyã.
Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ka sakɛ sɛba n daan yẽ ẽ yetɩ a vo'oge mɛ na yetɔga.
A yele bɛla, dee yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya dũnia zẽ'a woo ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la bɔ nẽrba wuu.
Sɛka woo n bɔ sɩra, botɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.
La sɛka woo n ka bɔ sɩra, ba wʋn di a sarɩya sɩbgɛ ẽ.
La sɛba n wʋn bɔ mam sɩra la, wʋn ɩta la bõn-yãlma bãna pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa: Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee tɔgra yetɔg-zãŋsɩ.
La ba sãn yõgɛ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, bɩɩ yũ yabga, la kãn ẽŋɛ ba sɛla.
La ba wʋn dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ bã'adõma zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.» Azezi zom Nawẽnnɛ yire Zuudãana Azezi n daan tɔgɛ la ba kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a zẽkɛ mɛ zom Nawẽnnɛ yire, ka zĩ'ire Nawẽnnɛ zʋʋgɔ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la zẽ'esɩ wuu.
Tɩ Zuudãana la sõŋɛ ba, botɩ ba tõm tõon-yãlma pa'alɛ tɩ ba kõa la mõolgɔ de la sɩra.]
Se'ere n soe tɩ Aluki gʋlsɛ gõŋɔ la Mam sɩr-sõŋɔ Ateofili, nẽrba zozo'e n mõrgɛ gʋlsɛ yel-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ tõma zẽ'am na.
Ba gʋlsɛ yel-bãma wuu wʋ nẽrba basɛba n daan yẽ yɛla la wuu halɩ ba pĩ'iluŋo, dee mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la tɔgɛ pa'alɛ tɩ tõma wõm se'em na.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ mam mã'agɛ m mẽŋa doose yel-bãma nãma sõŋa sõŋa halɩ ba pĩ'iluŋo pʋam, tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ la ãn sõŋa tɩ m gʋlsɛ yɛla la n doose taaba se'em na bɔ fɔ.
Mam gʋlsrɩ wãna tɩ fʋ bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ yel-bãna wuu tɩ ba pa'alɛ fʋ la de la sɩra.
Azakari bia Azã tɩ ba wʋn dɔgɛ yelle Se'emwẽnʋm tɩ A'erɔdɩ daan de Zude tẽŋa naba la, bʋraa n daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azakari.
A daan de la Zifdõma kãabgɔ kẽema, a de la Abiya buuri nẽra.
Tɩ a pɔga yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'elizabɛtɩ, ẽŋa mẽ daan de la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana Aarõ buuri.
Bãma bayi daan de la nẽrba n ɩtɩ sõŋa Nawẽnnɛ nifum, dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ, la a lɔɔ la wuu sõŋa.
La ba daan ka tarɩ bia, se'ere n soe la, A'elizabɛtɩ daan de la kõndɔgrɛ, la bãma bayi la wuu mẽ kʋrgɛ mɛ.
La wakatɛ n daan paagɛ tɩ Abiya buuri kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam tɩ ba tõm.
Tɩ Azakari mẽ kẽ tɩ a tõm.
Kãabgɔ kẽma la malŋɔ daan de la ba pɔsɛ looge nẽr-sɛka n wʋn kẽ zẽ'e-sõŋɔ pʋam yõ tɩdarɛ bɔ Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ ba daan pɔsɛ, tɩ la yõkɛ Azakari.
Tɩ Azakari kẽ tɩ a yõ.
La tɩdarɛ la yõ'a wakatɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu boe la yẽŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka darɛ wa'am Azakari zẽ'am wa zɛ tɩdarɛ yõ'a bĩmbĩnne na zʋʋgɔ bɔba.
La Azakari n yẽ ẽ na, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ halɩ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ẽ.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azakari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wõm fʋ pʋ'ʋsgɔ mɛ.
Fʋ pɔga A'elizabɛtɩ wʋn dɔgɛ la budibla, tɩ fʋ sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azã.
La fʋ wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm.
La nẽrba zozo'e wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga bia la dɔka ĩyã.
A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ nifum, la a kãn yũ dãam bɩɩ bõn-yũula n bugri.
Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn bɔna la ẽ halɩ lan pɔsɛ ẽn boe a ma pʋʋrʋm, la wakatɛ wuu.
A wʋn botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba zozo'e lebe sakɛ ba Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ.
La a wʋn dẽŋɛ Zuudãana nẽŋam tara Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli n daan tarɩ se'em na.
La a wʋn naagɛ sɔdõma la ba kɔma yɛla, dee wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n sɩ'ɩsrɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la tara yɛm ɩta wʋ sɛba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ la.
A wʋn botɩ nẽrba mãasʋm sõŋa gu'ura tɩ Zuudãana.» Tɩ Azakari soke malɛka la yetɩ: «Bẽm n wʋn botɩ mam bãŋɛ tɩ bõn-ẽna de la sɩra?
Se'ere n soe la, mam de la bʋra-yã'aŋa dee tɩ mam pɔga mẽ kʋrgɛ.» Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Agabrɩyɛlɩ, mam ze la Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam.
Ẽŋa n tõm mam yetɩ, m wa'am yele fʋ yetɔg-yẽlga wã.
La fõn ka sakɛ mam yetɔga la ĩyã, fʋ nõorɛ n wʋn mãam.
La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, bõn-sɛba tɩ mam yele fʋ la wʋn ẽŋɛ.
La fʋ kãn le tãna tɔgra, halɩ tɩ la paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ la.» Wakat-ẽŋa, nẽrba la daan gu'uri mɛ tɩ Azakari yese.
La ẽn daan boe zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la pʋam yuura la, ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.
La ẽn yãŋa wa yese la, a ka tã'agɛ tɔgɛ la nẽrba la.
