A nõorʋm n mãam tɩ a tara nu'usi magra pa'ala ba.
Bɛla tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a yẽ la bõn-yãlma zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la pʋam.
Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azakari daan wʋn tõm Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam n ba'asɛ la, a daan lebe kule la a yire.
Dabs-bãna poorʋm, tɩ a pɔga A'elizabɛtɩ yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ bɔna yire wõr-sɩnuu.
Dee yetɩ: «Wãna de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõoma.
Wakat-ẽna ẽŋa n yãŋa bɩsɛ mam yelle, dee yese bõn-ẽna n de nɩ yãnnɛ bɔ mam nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.» Malɛka n tɔgɛ Azezi dɔka yelle -Pugla ayɩla n daan boe Galile tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari.
A daan nãn ka mi bʋraa.
La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ n yetɩ a di ẽ.
Azozɛfʋ de la naba Adavidi buuri nẽra.
La wakat-sɛka tɩ A'elizabɛtɩ daan tarɩ pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ pʋam na, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm a malɛka Agabrɩyɛlɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am.
Tɩ malɛka la sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ tõoma.
Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ boe la fʋ mɛ, a ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.» La Amaari n daan wõm malɛka yetɔga la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, tɩ a tẽ'esra malɛka la n yele se'em na võorɛ n de sɛla.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Amaari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
Fʋ wʋn yõkɛ la pʋʋrɛ dɔgɛ budibla, sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi.
A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko.
La ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Bia.
La Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ẽ a yaaba Adavidi na'am, tɩ a dɛna Azakɔbɩ buuri naba wakatɛ wuu, a na'am na kãn malɩn ba'asɛ.» Tɩ Amaari soke malɛka la yetɩ: «Mam ka mi bʋraa, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ mam yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ?» Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu Sɩa wʋn sige fʋ zuo, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa wʋn bɔna la fɔ, bɛla bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dɔgɛ la wʋn welge la to'ore, ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.
Bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ sõogɔ A'elizabɛtɩ tɩ ba yetɩ a de la kõndɔgrɛ la, a tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ n wãna.
Baa la ẽn kʋrgɛ la, a wʋn dɔgɛ la budibla.
Se'ere n soe la, sɛla sɛla ka boe tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ka tã ɩta.» Tɩ Amaari lerge yetɩ: «Mam de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõntõn-pɔka.
Nawẽnnɛ botɩ la ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn yele se'em na.» Tɩ malɛka la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
Amaari sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ A'elizabɛtɩ La dabsa bãma pʋam, tɩ Amaari isge sẽŋɛ tɔtɔ paagɛ Zude so'olʋm tẽŋa ayɩla tɩ tãnsɩ boe mĩ.
La ẽn paagɛ la, a kẽ la Azakari yire pʋ'ʋsɛ A'elizabɛtɩ.
La A'elizabɛtɩ n wõm a pʋ'ʋsgɔ la, bia la wẽrgɛ mɛ a pʋʋrʋm.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wa'am A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am la pãŋa, tɩ a tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ la fõn yel-sõnnɛ gãnna pɔgsɩ la wuu.
La bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dɔgɛ la, tarɩ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
Mam de la ãne tɩ mam Zuudãana ma sẽna mam zẽ'am?
Se'ere n soe la, mam wõm fõn pʋ'ʋsgɔ la, bia la n boe mam pʋʋrʋm na wẽrgɛ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
Fõn sakɛ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga tɩ a tɔgɛ bɔ fʋ la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ la, fʋ yẽ zu-yẽlga.» Amaari n yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ la yelle Tɩ Amaari yele yetɩ: «Mam pẽgrɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la m sũure wuu.
Mam tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ n de mam Fãagra la ĩyã, se'ere n soe la, a bɩsɛ mam n de a tõntõn-pɔg-tarma la yelle mɛ.
Bɛla lan pɔsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, zamãana wuu nẽrba wʋn wi'ira mam tɩ zu-yẽlga dãana.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ n tã wuu la n ẽŋɛ bõn-kãra bɔ mam.
A de la pʋpeelem dãana.
La nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ ẽ na, a zotɩ ba ninbãalga mɛ zamãana wuu.
A dɩkɛ la a nu'ugo tõm tõon-kãra, dee botɩ zẽk-m-mẽŋa dõma la zoe wɩrgɛ la ba zẽk-m-mẽŋa pʋtẽ'era la.
La sãn dɛna pãnsɩ dõma, a sikri ba mɛ ba na'am pʋam, dee zẽkra sik-m-mẽŋa dõma.
La sɛba n ka tarɩ sɛla la, a bɔ'ɔrɩ ba bõntarsõm zɔ'ɔra mɛ, dee botɩ bõntatba lebe fõrgɛ dee ka to'oge sɛla sɛla.
A tẽerɩ zɔta tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba n de a tõntõnɩba la ninbãalga mɛ, dee sõŋra tõma, wʋ ẽn yʋʋn bĩŋe a nõorɛ la tõma yaaba Abraham, la tõma sɔ-yaabdõma, la ba yɩɩsɩ la wuu tɩ a wʋn sõŋra tõma wakatɛ wuu se'em na.» La Amaari daan weege A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am ẽŋɛ wʋ wõr-sɩtã, dee yãŋa lebe kule.
Azã dɔka yelle A'elizabɛtɩ dɔka wakatɛ n daan paagɛ la, a dɔgɛ la budibla.
Tɩ a sawiiba, la a yir-dõma wõm tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ zoe a ninbãalga zo'oge, tɩ ba wuu lagɩm ɩta sũ-yẽlga la ẽ.
Bia la dɔka dabsa anii daarɛ tɩ ba wa'am tɩ ba wã ẽ, daan bɔɔra tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ a sɔ Azakari yʋ'ʋrɛ.
La a ma ka sakɛ, yetɩ: «Ayɛɩ, a yʋ'ʋrɛ wʋn dɛna la Azã.» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Ya yir-dõma la pʋam nẽra ka boe mĩ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azã.» Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ la nu'usi soke bia la sɔ tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ ba sɩ bia la yʋ'ʋrɛ se'em.
Tɩ a botɩ ba bɔ ẽ dɔ-palaka, tɩ a to'oge gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «A yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azã.» Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la waa wuu.
La ẽn gʋlsɛ yele bɛla la, bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tã'agɛ tɔgra pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ sɛba n lɛm bilam na wuu.
Tɩ kõ-ẽŋa saagɛ Zude tẽn-sɛba tɩ tãnsɩ boe mĩ na wuu.
Bãma wuu n daan wõm yɛla la, ba daan tẽ'esrɩ mɛ dee sɔkra yetɩ: «Bi-ẽna yetɩ a wa ãna la wãne?» Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa boe la ẽ mɛ.
Azakari n to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga bɔ nẽrba la yelle Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wa'am bia la sɔ Azakari zẽ'am la pãŋa.
Tɩ a to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ Zuudãana la, se'ere n soe la, a wa'am mɛ wa bɩsɛ a nẽrba yelle, fãagɛ ba basɛ.
A bɔ tõma la Fãagra n tarɩ pãŋa n wʋn yese a tõntõnna Adavidi buuri la pʋam, wʋ ẽŋa n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba tɔgra kʋrʋm se'em na.
A yetɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tɔ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum, la nẽr-sɛba n sisri tõma la nu'usum.
Bɛla, a zoe tɩ yaabdõma ninbãalga mɛ, dee tẽegɛ ẽn yʋʋn bĩŋe a nõorɛ la ba la yelle.
Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn bĩŋe nõorɛ mɛ la tɩ yaaba Abraham tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tɔ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum, dee wʋn botɩ tɩ tõm a tõoma, tɩ dabeem kana.
Dee dɔla ẽ la pʋpeelem, dee ɩta tɩ la masra ẽn boorɩ se'em ka paagɛ tɩ vɔm tɛka.
La fõn, m bia, ba wʋn wi'ira fʋ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu nõtɔ'ɔsa.
Bɛla ĩyã, fõn wʋn dẽŋɛ tɩ Zuudãana la nẽŋam malgɛ sore bɔ ẽ, dee yele Nawẽnnɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ ba basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ tõma ninbãalga la ĩyã tɩ a wʋn botɩ a peelem n ãn wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa n yẽkɛ bulika la, nẽegɛ bɔ nẽr-sɛba n boe lika pʋam, la nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ kũm dabeem na, dee pa'alɛ tɩ so-sɛka tɩ tɩ wʋn doose yẽ sũ-mã'asʋm.» Tɩ bia la daan bɩta, tɩ a pʋtẽ'erɛ pa'asra.
A daan boe la weem ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ a wa'am Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma la zẽ'am tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ.
Azezi dɔka yelle Ban daan dɔgɛ Azã la, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ na-keko A'ogisti daan bɔ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba kãalɛ a tẽŋa la wuu nẽrba.
La daan de la pɔspɔsɩ n bɛla tɩ ba kãalɛ nẽrba la, wakat-sɛka tɩ Akirinusi daan de Siiri tẽnsɩ gɔmna la.
Tɩ nẽrba wuu kule ba mẽnsɩ tẽnsʋm tɩ ba kãalɛ ba.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ mẽ yese Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm pʋam, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba yʋʋn dɔgɛ naba Adavidi.
Se'ere n soe tɩ a sẽŋɛ bilam na, a de la naba Adavidi buuri.
Ẽŋa la Amaari n de pɔg-sɛka n yetɩ a ele ẽ na sẽŋɛ mɛ tɩ ba kãalɛ ba, wakat-ẽŋa Amaari tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ.
La ban nãn boe Bɛtelɛm la, tɩ a dɔka daarɛ paagɛ.
Tɩ a dɔgɛ a budib-kẽema, vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yɔnnɔ daka pʋam.
Se'ere n soe la, zẽ'a n ka boe sãama yire la pʋam tɩ ba wʋn gã'arɛ.
Dũnsĩima la malɛkadõma yelle La tẽn-ẽŋa dũnsĩima daan boe la sẽkam gu'ura ba dũnsi yʋ'ʋŋɔ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka sige ba zẽ'am.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ gilge ba.
Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba halɩ.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ba yetɩ: «Da zoe-ya dabeem, tɩ mam tarɩ la kõ-yẽlga tɩ m yele ya, n wʋn basɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm.
La de la yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna tɩ ba dɔgɛ ya Fãagra la Adavidi tẽŋa pʋam, ẽŋa n de Zuudãana Krisi la.
La bõn-ẽna n wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ la de la sɩra, ya wʋn yẽ bilɩa tɩ ba vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yɔnnɔ daka pʋam.» Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma kʋʋŋ-kʋʋŋɔ darɛ wa'am wa naagɛ la ayɩla la.
Tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n soe pẽka, la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a nõŋɛ la tarɩ sũ-mã'asʋm dũnia zuo.» La malɛkadõma la lebe la Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee tɩ dũnsĩima la yele taaba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm ka bɩsɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele tɩ la.» La ba isge mɛ tɔtɔ sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ yẽ Amaari, la Azozɛfʋ, la bilɩa la tɩ a gã dũnsi yɔnnɔ daka pʋam.
La dũnsĩima la n yẽ ẽ na, ba tɔgɛ bia la yelle wʋ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.
Tɩ sɛba wuu n wõm dũnsĩima la n yele se'em na, la di'ige ba mɛ.
La Amaari tẽ'esrɩ yɛla wã wuu mɛ a sũure pʋam.
Dee tɩ dũnsĩima la daan lɛbra dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, ba wõm dee yẽ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.
Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ sɩa yelle La dabsa anii la daarɛ n daan paagɛ, tɩ ba botɩ ba wã bia la wʋ Amoyisi gõŋɔ n pa'alɛ tɩ ba wã ba budimto se'em na.
Tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi, yʋ'ʋr-sɛka tɩ malɛka daan yele ba tɩ ba sɩ ẽ na, wakat-sɛka tɩ Amaari daan nãn ka yõkɛ a pʋʋrɛ la.
Ba tarɩ Azezi ka bɔ Nawẽnnɛ La wakatɛ la n paagɛ tɩ Amaari malgɛ a mẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am wʋ Amoyisi lɔɔ gõŋɔ n yele se'em na.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari tarɩ bia la sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm Wẽnde-kãtʋm tɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ bɔ Nawẽnnɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ gõŋɔ la pʋam tɩ budib-kẽema woo wʋn dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ bõnɔ.
Ba daan sẽŋɛ tɩ ba kãabɛ la sɛla bɔ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ la n yele se'em na.
La yetɩ, ba bɔ mõom dawɛma bayi bɩɩ na'adawen-biɛ bayi.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ bʋraa daan boe Zerizalɛm tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Asimeyõ.
A de la nẽr-sõŋɔ dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ sõŋa, dee gu'ura Ɩsrayɛlɩ Fãagra la n sẽm na.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bɔna la ẽ.
La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la daan põn yele ẽ tɩ a kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ a yẽ la Krisi tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm tɩ a wa'am na.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la botɩ a sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi sɔ, la a ma daan tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ n yele se'em na.
Tɩ Asimeyõ to'oge bia la a nu'usum, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, lɛɛlɛ wã, fõn bĩŋe nõorɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ mɛ.
Fʋ yãŋa tã basɛ mam n de fõn tõntõnna sore tɩ m basɛ dũnia dee wa'am fõn yire la sũ-mã'asʋm.
Se'ere n soe la, m nini yẽ Fãagra la tɩ fʋ tõm na, ẽŋa tɩ fʋ mãasʋm bɔ tɩ dũnia nẽrba wuu yẽ.
Ẽŋa n de peelem n wʋn botɩ la nẽegɛ bɔ buuri wuu tɩ ba bãŋɛ fõn, dee wʋn botɩ tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n de fõn nẽrba yẽ pẽka.» La Asimeyõ n tɔgɛ bia la yɛla la, la daan di'ige bia la sɔ, la a ma mɛ.
Tɩ Asimeyõ kã kã'a-sõma bɔ ba, dee yele bia la ma Amaari tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge bi-ẽna tɩ a botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma zozo'e lui mɛ, dee tɩ zozo'e mẽ isge.
Ẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ tõoma, dee tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn zagsɛ ẽ.
Ẽŋa n wʋn nẽegɛ pa'alɛ sɛla n sʋgɛ ba pʋtẽ'era pʋam na.
Dee yetɩ, Amaari mẽŋa wʋn yẽ sũ-sã'aŋɔ wʋ sʋ'a tɩ ba sɩɩsɛ lʋ nẽra sũure la.
Wakat-ẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔs-pɔka n mẽ daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'annɩ.
Tɩ a sɔ yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Afanuyɛlɩ, a de la Azɛɛrɩ buuri nẽra.
Ẽŋa daan de la pug-sa'arɛ dee ele sɩra paagɛ yʋʋma ayopɔɩ tɩ a sɩra la ki.
La a sɩra la n ki la, a yãŋa de la pɔkõorɛ kʋrgɛ halɩ ka paagɛ yʋʋma pinii la anaasɩ.
A daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na wakatɛ wuu, tõnna bɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋɔ wuu ka basra, dee lʋta nõorɛ sɔsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a paagɛ ba zẽ'am, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ, dee tɔgra bia la yelle bɔ'ɔra sɛba wuu n gu'uri wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn le fãagɛ Zerizalɛm nẽrba la basɛ.
La ban ẽŋɛ sɛla woo ba'asɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ la n yele se'em na, tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari lebe kule Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm na.
Tɩ bia la bɩta tara pãŋa la yɛm, dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ bɔna la ẽ.
Azezi daan de la bia, dee weege Zerizalɛm Yʋʋnɛ woo Azezi sɔ, la a ma sẽnnɩ la Zerizalɛm dita Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa.
La Azezi daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi, dee tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kibsa la wʋ ban ẽn ɩta se'em na.
La kibsa la dabsa n ba'asɛ la, tɩ ba lebe kulla.
Dee tɩ Azezi weege Zerizalɛm, tɩ a sɔ la a ma daan ka bãŋɛ tɩ a weege ya.
Ba daan tẽ'esɛ tɩ a dolɩ la ba tẽŋa dõma, dee sẽŋɛ dabsrɛ mõonɛ sẽnnɛ.
La ban ɛ ẽ ba nẽrba la, la ba sɩrdõma zẽ'am dee ka yẽ ẽ na, ba daan lebe la Zerizalɛm ka ɛɛra ẽ.
La dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ ba yẽ ẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a zĩ la karẽnsãandõma sɛlsra, dee sɔkra ba sokrɩsɩ.
Azezi n daan tarɩ yɛm la ẽn lergrɩ se'em na, di'ige sɛba wuu n daan wõm na mɛ.
La a dɔgrɩba la n yẽ ẽ na, la ba di'ige ba mɛ.
Tɩ a ma soke ẽ yetɩ: «M bia, bẽm tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ tɩ wãna?
Mam la fʋ sɔ ɛ fʋ mɛ halɩ la sũ-sã'aŋɔ.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya ɛɛra ma?
Yãma ka mi tɩ la masɛ mɛ tɩ mam bɔna m Sɔ yire wã bɩɩ?» Tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ Azezi yetɔga la võorɛ.
Tɩ Azezi doose ba kule Nazarɛtɩ, dee sakɛ ba nõorɛ.
Tɩ a ma tẽ'esra yel-bãma wuu a sũurum.
Tɩ Azezi bɩta, tɩ a yɛm pa'asra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ la nẽrba nõŋɛ ẽ.
Azã mõolɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga dee misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam Na-keko Atibɛɛrɩ n daan di na'am na, a yʋʋma pia la anuu yʋʋnɛ, tɩ Apõnsɩ-pilatɩ de Zude gɔmna, dee tɩ A'erɔdɩ dɛna Galile naba, tɩ a sɔbia Afilipi mẽ dɛna Itiire la Trakoniti naba.
Tɩ Alisaniyasɩ dɛna Abilɛnɩ naba.
La A'annɩ, la Akayifu de la Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azakari bia Azã daan boe mõom tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tɔgɛ bɔ ẽ.
Bɛla tɩ Azã sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba n boe Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa nõorʋm la wuu ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ ba mise ba ko'om pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Azã n mõolɩ se'em na ẽŋɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ gõŋɔ pʋam se'em na.
A yʋʋn yetɩ: «Nẽra n mõolɩ weem tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana, malgɛ-ya sɔa la tɩ ba tɔ tẽntẽesɩ bɔ ẽ.
Palɛ-ya bɔgsɩ la wuu, sirge-ya tãnsɩ la kũnkũma la wuu, mãalɛ-ya so-gɔlma tɩ ba tɔ tẽntẽesɩ, palɛ-ya sorɔɔrɔ bogro tɩ ba naagɛ taaba.
Bɛla nẽrsaalba wuu wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ n ɩtɩ se'em fãagra nẽrba basra.» La nẽrba zozo'e n sẽŋɛ ka lagsɛ Azã zẽ'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, ãne n yele yãma yetɩ, ya tã wʋn zoe põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ n sẽm na?
Tõm-ya tõon-sɛba n pa'alɩ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.
Da kãn tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ Abraham n de yãma yaaba la, ya wʋn põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ mɛ.
Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn dɩkɛ kuga wã botɩ ba lebge Abraham yɩɩsɩ.
Nẽra n põn tara lɩa a nu'usum tɩ a lʋbɛ tɩɩsɩ.
Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wɔnnɩ biɛ sõma la, a wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ, lobge bugum pʋam tɩ bugum di ẽ.» Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la soke ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?» Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ, sɛka n tarɩ futo bayi, a looge bɔ sɛka n ka tarɩ.
Tɩ sɛka n tarɩ dia, mẽ ẽŋɛ bɔ sɛka n ka tarɩ.
Tɩ lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba mẽ wa'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Da to'oge-ya ligri gãŋɛ ban yele ya se'em na.» Tɩ sʋdaasɩ mẽ soke ẽ yetɩ: «Dee tõma, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?» Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Da to'oge-ya nẽra bõnɔ la pãŋa bɩɩ dõrɛ nẽrba to'oge sɛla.
Basɛ-ya tɩ ya yɔɔrɔ la seke ya.» Tɩ nẽrba daan zɛ gu'ura tɩ Nawẽnnɛ fãagɛ ba, la ba wuu daan sokrɩ la ba mẽŋa bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ, Azã na'an dɛna Krisi tɩ ba gu'ura la bɩɩ?
La ban tẽ'esrɩ bɛla la, tɩ Azã yele ba yetɩ: «Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la nẽra n boe tara pãŋa gãnna mam sẽna, la mam põn ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra bɔ ẽ.
Ẽŋa n wʋn mise ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, la bugum pʋam.
A wʋn welge nẽrba wʋ nẽra n zãlɩ pɩ'ɩgɔ a nu'usum tɩ a vaagɛ a si zɛɛŋa yeele ẽŋɛ a bãarɛ pʋam, dee yõ urgo la, la bugum n ka kĩŋri.» Yetɔg-bãna, la yetɔga basɛba zozo'e tɩ Azã daan dɩkɛ zãsʋm nẽrba la pa'alɛ ba Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la.
La Azã daan zɛrgɛ naba A'erɔdɩ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pɔga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de A'erodɩadɩ di, dee tõm tõon-be'ero basɛba zozo'e pa'asɛ, tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ la ka ãn sõŋa.
La A'erɔdɩ daan yõkɛ Azã ka pagɛ mɛ, bɛla A'erɔdɩ malɩn tõm la tõon-be'ero pa'asɛ.
Azezi ko'om misga Azã n daan misri nẽrba wuu ko'om pʋam na, a daan mẽ mise Azezi mɛ.
La Azezi daan pʋ'ʋsrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ saazuum yo'oge, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sige a zuo, tɩ ba yẽ ẽ tɩ a wõn na na'adawenne.
Tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: «Fõn de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu.
Fʋ paagɛ la mam yɛm.» Azezi yaabdõma La Azezi n daan pĩ'ilum a tõoma la, a daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pitã, tɩ nẽrba daan tẽ'esra tɩ a de la Azozɛfʋ bia.
Azozɛfʋ sɔ daan de la Aheli, tɩ Aheli sɔ dɛna Amata, tɩ Amata sɔ dɛna Alevi, tɩ Alevi sɔ dɛna Amelki, tɩ Amelki sɔ dɛna Azanayi, tɩ Azanayi sɔ dɛna Azozɛfʋ, tɩ Azozɛfʋ sɔ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ, tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sɔ dɛna Amõsɩ, tɩ Amõsɩ sɔ dɛna Anahum, tɩ Anahum sɔ dɛna A'esli, tɩ A'esli sɔ dɛna Anagayi, tɩ Anagayi sɔ dɛna Amatɩ, tɩ Amatɩ sɔ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ, tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sɔ dɛna Asemeyẽ, tɩ Asemeyẽ sɔ dɛna Azozɛkɩ, tɩ Azozɛkɩ sɔ dɛna Azoda, tɩ Azoda sɔ dɛna Azoanã, tɩ Azoanã sɔ dɛna Areza, tɩ Areza sɔ dɛna Azorobabɛlɩ, tɩ Azorobabɛlɩ sɔ dɛna Asalatɩyɛlɩ, tɩ Asalatɩyɛlɩ sɔ dɛna Aneri, tɩ Aneri sɔ dɛna Amelki, tɩ Amelki sɔ dɛna Adi, tɩ Adi sɔ dɛna Akozam, tɩ Akozam sɔ dɛna A'elmadam, tɩ A'elmadam sɔ dɛna A'eri, tɩ A'eri sɔ dɛna Azoze, tɩ Azoze sɔ dɛna A'eliezɛɛrɩ, tɩ A'eliezɛɛrɩ sɔ dɛna Azorim, tɩ Azorim sɔ dɛna Amata, tɩ Amata sɔ dɛna Alevi, tɩ Alevi sɔ dɛna Asimeyõ, tɩ Asimeyõ sɔ dɛna Azuda, tɩ Azuda sɔ dɛna Azozɛfʋ, tɩ Azozɛfʋ sɔ dɛna Azonam, tɩ Azonam sɔ dɛna A'eliakim, tɩ A'eliakim sɔ dɛna Ameleya, tɩ Ameleya sɔ dɛna Amena, tɩ Amena sɔ dɛna Amatata, tɩ Amatata sɔ dɛna Anatã, tɩ Anatã sɔ dɛna Adavidi, tɩ Adavidi sɔ dɛna Azese, tɩ Azese sɔ dɛna A'obɛɛdɩ, tɩ A'obɛɛdɩ sɔ dɛna Aboozɩ, tɩ Aboozɩ sɔ dɛna Asala, tɩ Asala sɔ dɛna Anaasõ, tɩ Anaasõ sɔ dɛna Aminadabɩ, tɩ Aminadabɩ sɔ dɛna Admẽ, tɩ Admẽ sɔ dɛna Arni, tɩ Arni sɔ dɛna A'ɛsrɔm, tɩ A'ɛsrɔm sɔ dɛna Afarɛsɩ, tɩ Afarɛsɩ sɔ dɛna Azuda, tɩ Azuda sɔ dɛna Azakɔbɩ, tɩ Azakɔbɩ sɔ dɛna A'izakɩ, tɩ A'izakɩ sɔ dɛna Abraham, tɩ Abraham sɔ dɛna Atara, tɩ Atara sɔ dɛna Anakɔɔrɩ, tɩ Anakɔɔrɩ sɔ dɛna Aseruki, tɩ Aseruki sɔ dɛna Arago, tɩ Arago sɔ dɛna Afalɛkɩ, tɩ Afalɛkɩ sɔ dɛna A'ebɛrɩ, tɩ A'ebɛrɩ sɔ dɛna Asala, tɩ Asala sɔ dɛna Akayinam, tɩ Akayinam sɔ dɛna Arfasadɩ, tɩ Arfasadɩ sɔ dɛna Asɛm, tɩ Asɛm sɔ dɛna Anoe, tɩ Anoe sɔ dɛna Alemɛkɩ, tɩ Alemɛkɩ sɔ dɛna Amatusala, tɩ Amatusala sɔ dɛna A'enõkɩ, tɩ A'enõkɩ sɔ dɛna Azarɛdɩ, tɩ Azarɛdɩ sɔ dɛna Amalelɛlɩ, tɩ Amalelɛlɩ sɔ dɛna Akayinam, tɩ Akayinam sɔ dɛna A'enõsɩ, tɩ A'enõsɩ sɔ dɛna Asetɩ, tɩ Asetɩ sɔ dɛna Adam, la Nawẽnnɛ n nãam Adam.
Asũtãana makɛ Azezi Azezi daan ze'ele la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaam lebe, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la kɔ'ɔn bɔna la ẽ.
La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la weem.
Bilam tɩ Asũtãana makɛ ẽ dabsa pinaasɩ.
La dabsa pinaasɩ la pʋam a ka di sɛla sɛla, tɩ a kɔm dõnna.
Bɛla tɩ Asũtãana yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ yele kugre wã tɩ a lebge dia.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ: ‹Nẽrsaala kãn vɔa dia mã'a ĩyã.› » Tɩ Asũtãana tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo, pa'alɛ ẽ dũnia so'olʋm wuu nif-kabsɩgɔ pʋam.
Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bãna wuu de la mam n soe, bɛla mam tã wʋn bɔ nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ mam boorɩ mɛ.
Mam wʋn bɔ fɔ dũnia wã na'am la wuu, la so'olʋm bãma wuu pẽka.
Fʋ sãn ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ mam, ba wuu wʋn dɛna la fõn dẽnnɛ.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga pʋam yetɩ: ‹Nã'asra Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ, dee sakra ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.› » Tɩ Asũtãana le tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm ka zom Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zuo yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ ze'ele kalam ẽkɛ bisge tẽŋa, tɩ la gʋlsɛ yetɩ: ‹Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma tɩ ba gu fo.
La ba wʋn kɔkɛ fɔ la ba nu'usi tɩ fʋ kãn wẽ fʋ nã'arɛ la kugre.› » Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ yele tɩ: ‹Da makɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ.› » La Asũtãana n daan makɛ Azezi bɛla wuu zɩgɛ koŋe la, a basɛ ẽ dee gu'ura la a sãn le yẽ folle.
Azezi n pĩ'ilum a tõoma Galile tẽŋa La Azezi daan lebe Galile la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pãŋa, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ kɔ'ɔn saagɛ zẽ'a wuu.
La a ẽn zãsna la nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, tɩ ba wuu pẽgra ẽ.
Nazarɛtɩ nẽrba ka bɔ Azezi sɩra La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ la Nazarɛtɩ, ban daan uge ẽ tẽn-sɛka la.
Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem wʋ ẽŋa ẽn kẽ'era se'em na, yãŋa isge ze'ele tɩ a karẽŋɛ.
Tɩ ba dɩkɛ gõn-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'ezayi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ la bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ a lakɛ gõŋɔ la yẽ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ a boorɩ la, yãŋa karẽŋɛ wʋ zẽ'a la n yele se'em na: «Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n boe la mam, ẽŋa n looge mam bɔ mam pãŋa, tɩ m bʋglɛ sũ-sã'aŋɔ dõma sũure, tɩ m mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la bɔ nasdõma, dee tõm mam tɩ m tɔgɛ bɔ yamsɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ yolsgo, dee tɔgɛ bɔ fɔɔsɩ tɩ ba nini wʋn pike, dee yese sɛba n boe nãmsgɔ pʋam la basɛ, dee mõolɛ tɩ wakatɛ paagɛ ya, tɩ Zuudãana wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽrba yel-sõnnɛ.» La ẽn karẽŋɛ ba'asɛ la, a lebe laglɛ gõŋɔ la mɛ bɔ sɛka n gu'uri gõnnɔ la, dee zĩ'ire.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba wuu n boe wẽndeem na bɩsra ẽ zĩi.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Zĩna, lɛɛlɛ wã, sɛla tɩ ba gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ yãma wõm wã, la ẽŋɛ wʋ lan yele se'em na.» Tɩ ba tɔgɛ pẽgɛ ẽ, la a yetɔg-sõma la tɩ a tɔgɛ la di'ige ba mɛ.
Dee tɩ ba sɔkra yetɩ, la ka de Azozɛfʋ dayʋa la n wãna?
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam põn mina tɩ ya wʋn makɛ makrɛ ẽna bɔ mam yetɩ: ‹Tɩɩm dãana, tɩbɛ fʋ mẽŋa.› La ya wʋn ken yele mam yetɩ: ‹Bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ daan ẽŋɛ Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋam tɩ tõma wõm na, ẽŋɛ bɛla nõo fʋ mẽŋa tẽŋam kalam mẽ.› » Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba ka nannɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa baa ayɩla a mẽŋa tẽŋam.
La de la sɩra tɩ mam yetɩ ya tɩ: Pɔkõpa zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'eli wakatʋm na mɛ, la saaga ka ni yʋʋma atã la wõr-sɩyoobɩ, tɩ kɔm yʋʋn ba bɔna tẽŋa la wuu pʋam.
La Nawẽnnɛ ka tõm A'eli yetɩ a sẽŋɛ pɔkõ-bãma zẽ'am.
A tõm ẽ na pɔkõorɛ n boe Sarɛpɩta n boe Sidõ so'olʋm pʋam na zẽ'am.
La kõnkɔma zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'elize wakatʋm na mɛ, la baa ayɩla ka yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, la Anãamã sɛka n yese Siiri so'olʋm na mã'a n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.» La ban wõm bɛla la, sɛba n boe wẽndeego la pʋam wuu sũure daan yĩige mɛ.
Tɩ ba isge ve'ege Azezi tẽŋa la pʋam yese.
Tẽŋa la boe la tãŋa zuo.
Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka n zãagɛ la tẽŋa la, ba daan boorɩ tɩ ba zã'agɛ ẽ basɛ mɛ tɩ a lui ki.
La Azezi kẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la tẽŋasʋka fõrgɛ.
Bʋraaga tɩ kʋlkã'arga tarɩ ẽ Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la Galile tẽŋa ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Kapɛrnaʋm, tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ daan paagɛ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeem ka zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Tɩ a zãsŋɔ la daan di'ige ba, a yetɔga la n tarɩ pãŋa la ĩyã.
Tɩ bʋraa daan bɔna wẽndeem na tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ, tɩ a tĩi kaasɛ yetɩ: «A'a!
Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra, fõn bẽm yelle n boe la tõma?
Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ sã'am na tõma?
Mam mi fõn de sɛka, fõn de la pʋpeelem dãana n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.» Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: «Go'oge, yese dee basɛ bʋraa la!» Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam, dee yese, la a ka pɔglʋm ẽ.
Tɩ ba wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: «Yetɔga ẽna de la bẽm?
A tarɩ la pãŋa la ke'eŋo, dee tãsra kʋlkã'arsɩ, tɩ ba yɛsra.» Tɩ Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ saagɛ zẽ'e-bãma wuu.
Azezi botɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Tɩ Azezi isge ba wẽndeego la pʋam yese ka kẽ Asimõ yire.
Tɩ Asimõ dɛɛm-pɔka bẽ'era, tɩ a ĩyã ba tʋlgɛ.
Tɩ ba tɔgɛ a yelle bɔ Azezi, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka suure a zuo, dee tãsɛ bã'a la yetɩ a basɛ ẽ.
La ẽn yele la, bã'a la basɛ ẽ mɛ, tɩ a isge tɔtɔ ẽŋɛ ba sãanɔ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bɔna mĩ kẽ'era, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma tɩ bã'asɩ buuri to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba nẽra woo zuo, tɩ ba wuu yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La kʋlkã'arsɩ daan yesrɩ mɛ dee basra nẽrba zozo'e, dee kaasra yetɩ: «Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.» Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ ba, ka basɛ tɩ ba tɔgɛ sɛla sɛla, se'ere n soe la, ba daan bãŋɛ tɩ a de la Krisi n de Fãagra la.
Azezi mõolɩ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azezi yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽra ka boe mĩ.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ɛɛra ẽ.
La ba daan yẽ ẽ mɛ, bɔɔra tɩ ba gu ẽ tɩ a da le yese ba zẽ'am.
La Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Dẽnɩ tɩ mam mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n ãn se'em tẽnsɩ basɛba mẽ pʋam, la de la bɛla ĩyã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm mam.» La a ẽn mõola kõ-yẽlga la Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam mɛ.
Azezi wi a pɔspɔsɩ karẽnbiisi Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi ze la Zenezarɛtɩ mõgrɛ nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ kaagɛ ẽ mikra taaba bɔɔra tɩ ba wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Tɩ a yẽ õornɔ bayi n ze mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ zũn-yõgrɩba sige pɛɛra ba yʋgsɩ dee basɛ.
La õorŋɔ ayɩla daan de la Asimõ bõnɔ.
Tɩ Azezi kẽ õorŋɔ la pʋam, dee yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Mõm õorŋɔ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ nẽŋa fẽe.» La Azezi n yele bɛla la, Asimõ mõm õorŋɔ la mɛ, tɩ a lebe ko'om pʋam fẽe.
Tɩ Azezi zĩ'ire õorŋɔ la pʋam pa'alɛ nẽrba la.
La ẽn pa'alɛ ba ba'asɛ la, tɩ a yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Mõm õorŋɔ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om tɩ ya lobe yʋgsɩ la.» Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, tõma nãmsɛ mɛ yʋ'ʋŋɔ wã wuu dee ka yõkɛ sɛla sɛla.
La fõn yele la ĩyã, tɩ wʋn lobe tɩ yʋgsɩ la.» Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om ka lobe ba yʋgsɩ la, yãŋa yõgɛ zũma ba zo'oge, tɩ ba yʋgsɩ la zɩgra la ba ãasʋm.
Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ ba taaba õorŋɔ ayɩla la pʋam yetɩ, ba wa'am sõŋɛ ba.
La ba taaba la sẽŋɛ mɛ ka sõŋɛ ba, tɩ ba pɩrɛ õornɔ bayi la wuu la zũma, halɩ tɩ ba zɩgra la ba mise.
La Asimõ yʋ'ʋrɛ ayɩla n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ a ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fõrgɛ mam zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana.» Se'ere n soe tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla la, ẽŋa la a taaba la n daan yẽ zũma la tɩ ba yõgɛ se'em na botɩ ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.
La dabeem mẽ n daan kẽ Azebede dayɔɔsɩ Azakɩ la Azã n daan ẽn dɔla la Asimõ tõnna la.
Tɩ Azezi yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Da zoe dabeem, tɩ lan sẽŋɛ zĩna wɛ'ɛsa wuu, fʋ wʋn ɛɛra la nẽrba tɩ ba dɔla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na.» La Azezi n yele bɛla la, ba tarɩ õornɔ la dooge mɛ yãŋa basɛ sɛla woo dee dɔla Azezi.
Azezi botɩ kõnkonne yẽ ĩmã'asʋm La Azezi daan boe la tẽŋa ayẽma pʋam, tɩ bʋraa mẽ bɔna mĩ dɛna kõnkonne, la bã'a la kẽ a ĩyã zo'oge mɛ.
Tɩ a yẽ Azezi ka ka dũma Azezi nẽŋam dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa sose ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fʋ sãn bɔɔra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ĩmã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa.» Tɩ Azezi tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ dee yetɩ: «Mam bɔɔra, yẽ ĩmã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa.» Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ bilam mẽŋa.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Da kãn yele nẽra nẽra, la sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fʋ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɛla tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bɔ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.» La bɛla wuu, Azezi yelle daan malɩn saagɛ la zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e lagsɛ tɩ ba selse a yetɔga la, dee tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La Azezi ẽn sẽnna la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe la pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Azezi botɩ kɔɔrŋɔ isge sẽnna La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi bɔna mĩ pa'ala nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, tɩ Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Galile, la Zude, la Zerizalɛm mẽ zẽa mĩ sɛlsra.
Tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa daan bɔna la Azezi, tɩ a botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ zɛ bʋraa n de kɔɔrŋɔ gã a bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am.
La ba boorɩ tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ kẽ la de-sɛka tɩ Azezi boe mĩ na pʋam, ka bĩŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.
La nẽrba la mike mɛ, tɩ ba ka yẽ folle tarɩ ẽ kẽ.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ ba zɛ kɔɔrŋɔ la zom gɔsgɔ, ka lakɛ gɔsgɔ la bɔbrɛ ayɩla, doose bilam sike ẽ la a bõn-gã'ala la nẽrba la sʋkam bĩŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bɔ ẽŋa sɩra se'em na, yele kɔɔrŋɔ la yetɩ: «M sɩrɛ, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bɔna fʋ zuo.» Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la tẽ'esra yetɩ: «A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne tɔgra pɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ.
Ãne n tã wʋn basɛ nẽra tõon-be'ero taalɛ, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a?» Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya tẽ'esra wãna wã?
Bẽm n de nãana gãnna, mam sãn yele kɔɔrŋɔ la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bɔna a zuo n de nãana, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge sẽnna n de nãana?
Bɛla m wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tarɩ pãŋa dũnia zuo wʋn basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.» A yele bɛla dee yele kɔɔrŋɔ la yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la kule.» Bilam mẽŋa tɩ kɔɔrŋɔ la isge ba wuu nẽŋam dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala la kulla, dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ nẽrba la wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Tɩ zĩna yẽ bõn-yãlma.» Azezi wi Alevi tɩ a dɔla ẽ Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi yese sẽŋɛ ka yẽ lampo-tɔ'ɔsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Alevi, tɩ a zĩ lampo to'osgo deem.
Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Isge dɔla mam.» Tɩ a isge basɛ sɛla woo dee dɔla ẽ.
Tɩ Alevi dʋgɛ dia zo'oge ẽŋɛ kibsa a yire bɔ Azezi, tɩ ẽŋa la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba, la nẽrba zozo'e zẽa dita.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba, la ba lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma yõnna Azezi karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bẽm ĩyã tɩ yãma lagɩm na lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛba n tarɩ ĩmã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba.
Sɛba n bẽ'erɩ n eerɩ tɩba.
Mam ka wa'am dũnia zuo sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ ya la ĩyã, mam wa'am tɩ m yele la tõon-be'ero dõma tɩ ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.» Ba soke Azezi nõorlʋa yelle Tɩ nẽrba la yele Azezi yetɩ: «Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma karẽnbiisi ẽn lʋta nõorɛ mɛ dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi dita dee yũura.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nẽra n di pɔka ẽŋɛ kibsa, tɩ a tadãandõma bɔna mĩ tɩ ba naagɛ la ẽ di kibsa la, yãma wʋn sakɛ tɩ ba lʋ nõorɛ mɛ dee tɩ pɔgdita la ken bɔna ba zẽ'am bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ.
La wakatɛ wʋn wa'am tɩ ba wʋn yese pɔgdita la ba zẽ'am, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ.» Tɩ Azezi le makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Nẽra kãn ãagɛ fu-paalɛ dɩkɛ lige fu-kɛka.
A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, a wʋn sã'am fu-paalɛ la mɛ, la tãn-paalɛ la kãn masɛ la fu-kɛka la.
La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wɔ-kɛgsɩ pʋam.
A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wɔɔsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ.
Bɛla dãam na wʋn ka'agɛ mɛ sã'am, tɩ wɔɔsɩ la mẽ sã'am.
La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wɔ-paalsɩ pʋam.
La nẽra sãn yũ dã-kɛka n kele la, a ka le bɔɔra dã-paalga.
A wʋn yetɩ, dã-kɛka la n ãn sõŋa.»
Vo'osgo daarɛ yelle Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi dɔla vatɔ pʋam tɔlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi kɔ si wẽena ɔbra.
Tɩ Farisi dõma nẽrba basɛba yẽ ban ẽŋɛ bɛla la, yele ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ yãma ẽŋɛ sɛla n sisri tõma vo'osgo daarɛ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kɔm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ Adavidi ẽŋɛ se'em na?
A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bĩŋe bɔ Nawẽnnɛ na obe.
La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma la mã'a.
La Adavidi yʋʋn obe borborɩ bãma mɛ, dee bɔ a nẽrba la tɩ ba obe.» La Azezi ken yele ba mɛ yetɩ: «Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe vo'osgo daarɛ.» Bʋraa nu'ugo n ki, tɩ Azezi botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Vo'osgo daarɛ ayẽma tɩ Azezi kẽ Zifdõma wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Tɩ bʋraa daan bɔna mĩ, tɩ a zʋʋgɔ nu'ugo ki.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la daan bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ nẽra la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Se'ere n soe la, ba daan eerɩ la so-sɛka tɩ ba wʋn yetɩ a sã'am bãma sisgo dõrɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba tẽ'esgɔ la, yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: «Isge ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka.» Tɩ a isge ze'ele.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ m soke ya mɛ bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em?
Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?» Dee bɩsɛ ba wuu kaagɛ, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la.» Tɩ a tẽegɛ a nu'ugo la, tɩ a nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
Tɩ ba sũnsõa yĩige halɩ tɩ ba bãnna ban wʋn ẽŋɛ Azezi se'em.
Azezi looge a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, bɔna bilam pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋŋɔ wuu.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ a wi a karẽnbiisi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am.
Tɩ a looge karẽnbiisi pia la ayi bãma pʋam.
Bãma n de nẽr-sɛba tɩ a wʋn tõm na.
Ba daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la A'ãndre n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbga, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi, la Amatie, la Atoma, la Azakɩ sɛka n de Alfe bia la, la Asimõ sɛka n daan de Zelɔtɩ nẽra ayɩla la, la Azudaasɩ n de Azakɩ bia la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo sɛka n wʋn zãm Azezi la.
La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele la tãŋa la zuo sige zẽ'e-sɛka n naagɛ taaba.
La a karẽnbiisi basɛba zozo'e, la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ zozo'e n yese Zude, la Zerizalɛm, la Tiiri la Sidõ so'olʋm n boe ko-kãtɛ nõorʋm na n lagsɛ bilam.
Ba wa'am tɩ ba selse la Azezi yetɔga, dee tɩ a bɔ ba bã'adõma ĩmã'asʋm.
La nẽrba basɛba n daan boe mĩ tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dɔla ba, tɩ ba daan yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu ɛɛra tɩ ba kalʋm ẽ, se'ere n soe la, pãŋa n yesrɩ a pʋam bɔ'ɔra ba wuu ĩmã'asʋm.
Zu-yẽlga la toogo yelle Tɩ Azezi gorge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Yãma sɛba n de nasdõma la tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ya bõnɔ.
Yãma sɛba kɔm n dõnnɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka di seke.
Yãma sɛba n kaasrɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka la'ara.
Yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba sisri ya, dee bɔkra ya, tʋʋra ya, dee ka nanna ya wʋ ya de la tõon-be'ero dõma, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ĩyã la, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Wakat-sɛka tɩ ba ɩtɩ yãma bɛla la, ẽŋɛ-ya sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn yẽ yɔɔrɔ zo'oge mɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la bɛla.
La yãma sɛba n de bõntatba la wʋn yẽ toogo, yãma n põn yẽ bõn-sõma la ĩyã.
La yãma sɛba n tarɩ sɛla woo lɛɛlɛ wã tɩ la seke la, wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka sẽnna la kɔm.
La yãma sɛba n la'arɩ lɛɛlɛ wã wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya sũure wʋn ka sã'am tɩ ya kaasɛ.
La yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba wuu pẽgrɩ ya la, wʋn yẽ toogo.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma mẽ yʋʋn pẽgrɩ nõtɔ'ɔs-sɛba n de põmpɔrndõma la bɛla.» Nõŋɛ-ya ya bɛ'ɛba Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «La mam yetɩ yãma sɛba n selsrɩ mam wã tɩ, ya nõŋɛ ya bɛ'ɛba, la sɛba n sisri ya la, ya ɩta ba sõŋa.
La ya kã'ara kã'a-sõma bɔ'ɔra sɛba n kã be'em bɔ'ɔra ya la, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ bɔ'ɔra sɛba n ɩtɩ ya be'em na.
Nẽra sãn wẽ fʋ pɛka ayɩla, fʋ basɛ tɩ a wẽ ayẽma la pa'asɛ.
La nẽra sãn fãagɛ fʋ fu-kãtɛ, fʋ basɛ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-pɩka pa'asɛ.
La nẽra sãn sose fʋ sɛla, fʋ bɔ ẽ.
La nẽra sãn dɩkɛ sɛla n de fʋ bõnɔ, fʋ da yetɩ a bɔ fɔ fʋ bõnɔ na.
La yãma n boorɩ tɩ nẽrba ɩta bõn-sɛba bɔ'ɔra ya la, ya mẽ ɩta bɛla bɔ'ɔra ba.
La ya sãn nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ya la mã'a, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?
Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ba mɛ.
La ya sãn ɩta sɛba n ɩtɩ ya sõŋa la mã'a sõŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?
Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma ɩtɩ la bɛla.
La ya sãn pɛŋra sɛba tɩ ya tẽ'esrɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ lebse ya la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?
Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma peŋrɩ tõon-be'ero dõma mɛ dee le tɔ'ɔsra bɛla.
La, la sãn dɛna yãma, nõŋɛ-ya ya bɛ'ɛba, dee ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa.
Peŋe-ya nẽrba dee da tẽ'esra tɩ ba le bɔ ya.
Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya yɔɔrɔ wʋn zo'oge mɛ, la ya wʋn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu kɔma, se'ere n soe la, a ɩtɩ sɛba n ka mi yel-sõnnɛ, la pʋtʋʋl-dõma sõŋa mɛ.
Zɔta-ya nẽrba ninbãalga, wʋ ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ nẽrba ninbãalga se'em na.» Da zɛrgra-ya taaba «Da tɔgra-ya nẽra yelle yetɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn tɔgɛ ya yelle yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ be'em.
Da zɛrgra-ya nẽrba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn zɛrgɛ ya.
Basɛ-ya taaba taalɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn basɛ ya taalɛ.
Bɔ-ya ya taaba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn bɔ ya.
Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya zo'oge wʋ ban dɩkɛ wan-kãtɛ makɛ pɩrɛ sõŋa tɩ la saara.
Bõn-sɛka tɩ yãma dɩkɛ makɛ bɔ ya taaba la, bõn-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ bɔ ya.» Tɩ Azezi daan makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Fʋa tã wʋn ve'ege fʋa mɛ tɩ ba wuu kãn lui boko pʋam?
Karẽnbia ka gãnnɩ a karẽnsãama, la karẽnbia sãn zãsʋm sɛla woo ba'asɛ, a ãn wʋ a karẽnsãama la.
Bẽm tɩ fʋ bɩsra sɔkɔ n boe fʋ sɔbia nifum, dee ka bɩsra dɔɔgɔ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum na?
Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne yɛta fʋ sɔbia yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ fʋ yese sɔkɔ a nifum, dee ka bɩsra dɔɔgɔ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum?
Pʋlibsum dãana, dẽŋɛ yese dɔɔgɔ la fʋ mẽŋa nifum, dee yãŋa tã'agɛ yẽ sõŋa yese sɔkɔ la n boe fʋ sɔbia nifum na.» Tɩa woo la a biɛ «Tɩ-sõŋɔ ka wɔnnɩ biɛ be'ero.
Tɩ-be'ego mẽ ka wɔnnɩ biɛ sõma.
Ba bãŋrɩ tɩɩsɩ wuu la ba biɛ pʋam.
Gõ'osɩ kãn wɔm kẽnkãma, la kẽkɔ mẽ kãn wɔm tã'ama.
Nẽr-sõŋɔ sũure n ãn sõŋa botɩ a tɔgra la bõn-sõma, la nẽr-be'ego sũure n ka ãn sõŋa botɩ a tɔgra la bõn-be'ero.
Se'ere n soe la, bõn-sɛba n boe nẽrsaala sũurum n yesrɩ a nõorʋm.» Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga sakrɛ yelle «Bẽm ĩyã tɩ yãma wi'ira mam tɩ ‹Zuudãana, Zuudãana›, dee ka ɩta mam n yetɩ ya ɩta se'em na?
Nẽr-sɛka woo n sẽm mam zẽ'am, dee sɛlsra mam yetɔga, dee sakra ɩta mam n yele se'em na, mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya ẽŋa dãana n ãn se'em: A ãn wʋ nẽra n boorɩ tɩ a mẽ a yire, tũ paagɛ tãmpĩa, ẽebɛ a yire tãmpĩa la zuo.
Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ yire la, tɩ a ka lui, ẽn mẽ sõŋa la ĩyã.
La nẽr-sɛka n wõnnɩ mam yetɔga, dee ka ɩta mam n yele se'em na, ãn wʋ nẽra n mẽ a yire tẽntõnnɔ zuo, dee ka tũ ẽebɛ.
Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wa wẽ yire la, tɩ a kɔ'ɔn lui saam saam.»
Azezi botɩ Rom sʋda-kɛ'ɛma tõntõnna yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Azezi tɔgɛ bɛla wuu bɔ nẽrba la ba'asɛ, dee sẽŋɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm.
Tɩ Rom sʋda-kɛ'ɛma bɔna mĩ tara a tõntõnna tɩ a nõŋɛ.
Tɩ tõntõnna la bẽ'era dee la a ki.
Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la wõm Azezi yelle, tõm Zifdõma kẽma basɛba a zẽ'am tɩ ba sose ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa botɩ a tõntõnna la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka tĩi belem ẽ yetɩ: «Bʋraa la de la nẽr-sõŋɔ.
A nõŋɛ tõma buuri mɛ, la ẽŋa n mẽ wẽndeego bɔ tõma.
Bɛla ĩyã, mõrgɛ sõŋɛ ẽ.» Tɩ Azezi dɔla ba wɛ'ɛsa ka lɛm yire la, tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la le tõm a sɩrdõma tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, da nãmsɛ fʋ mẽŋa.
Mam ka narɩ tɩ fʋ wa'am mam yire, bɛla ĩyã tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ yetɩ mam mẽŋa ka narɩ tɩ m wa'am fõn zẽ'am.
Wen tɔgɛ yetɔga mã'a, tɩ m tõntõnna la wʋn yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽrba n soe mam, la mam mẽ soe la sʋdaasɩ basɛba.
Mam sãn yele sʋda-sɛka yetɩ: ‹Sẽŋɛ›, a we'esɩ mɛ.
La mam sãn yele ayẽma yetɩ: ‹Wa'am›, a sẽm mɛ.
Mam sãn yele m tõntõnna yetɩ: ‹Ẽŋɛ wãna›, a ɩtɩ mɛ.» Azezi n wõm bɛla la, la daan di'ige ẽ mɛ, tɩ a wẽrgɛ yele nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ mam nãn ka yẽ nẽra n bɔ mam sɩra wʋ bʋra-ẽna wã, baa Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri la pʋam mam ka yẽ.» Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la n tõm sɛba la lebe a yire ka yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tarɩ ĩmã'asʋm.
Azezi botɩ pɔkõorɛ bia vo'oge Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi we'esɩ la tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nayin, tɩ a karẽnbiisi, la nẽrba zozo'e dɔla ẽ.
La Azezi paagɛ tẽŋa la nõorʋm, tʋ'ʋsɛ la nẽrba n zɛɛrɩ budibla n ki wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka laagɛ.
Budibla la ma de la pɔkõorɛ.
La a bia de la ẽŋa mã'a.
Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zozo'e daan kɔlgɛ ẽ dɔla wɛ'ɛsa.
La Zuudãana Azezi n yẽ pɔkõorɛ la, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Da kɛlla.» A yele bɛla dee sẽŋɛ paagɛ kalʋm na sãŋandɛ la, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n zɛɛrɩ kũm na ze'ele, tɩ a yele kũm na yetɩ: «Budib-polle, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge.» Tɩ sɛka n ki la vo'oge isge zĩ'ire, yãŋa tɔgra.
Tɩ Azezi yele a ma la yetɩ: «Fʋ bia n bɛla.» Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba wuu, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔs-kãtɛ n wa'am tõma zẽ'am.» Dee le yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n wa'am tɩ a sõŋɛ a nẽrba.» Tɩ yetɔga la saagɛ Zude so'olʋm, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na wuu, tɩ ba wõm Azezi n ẽŋɛ se'em.
Azã n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam tõm a karẽnbiisi Azezi zẽ'am Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi tɔgɛ bõn-bãma wuu pa'alɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azã wi a karẽnbiisi bayi tõm ba Zuudãana Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ ba ka soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azã sɛka n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n tõm tõma yetɩ, tɩ soke fʋ bɩsɛ, fõn de sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?» Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e tɩ bã'asɩ to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, dee botɩ fɔɔsɩ zozo'e nini yẽta.
Tɩ Azezi lerge sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Azã yãma n yẽ bõn-sɛba, dee wõm se'em na wuu: Fɔɔsɩ nini yẽtɩ mɛ, tɩ kɔɔrnɔ sẽnna, tɩ kõnkɔma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, tɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ kũm vɔ'ɔra, tɩ nasdõma wõnna Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
La nẽr-sɛka n ka lebrɩ poorʋm mam ĩyã tarɩ zu-yẽlga.» Sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na lebe kule mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yãŋa tɔgɛ nẽrba la Azã yelle yetɩ: «Yãma daan sẽŋɛ mõom tɩ ya ka bɩsɛ la bẽm?
Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la mõogɔ tɩ kʋsebgo mĩini bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ.
La bẽm tɩ yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ?
Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la nẽra n yɛ fu-sõma bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ.
Nẽr-sɛba n yɛɛrɩ fu-sõma dee tarɩ bõn-sõma la, kẽ'erɩ la na'adõma yiɛ pʋam.
La yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la bẽm?
Ya sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa bɩɩ?
Ẽe.
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ a de la nẽra n gãnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa.
La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: ‹Mam tõntõnna n wãna tɩ mam tõm tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa malgɛ sore bɔ fɔ.› Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrsaalba tɩ ba dɔgɛ la wuu pʋam, nẽra ka boe n gãnnɩ Azã, la nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na pʋam gãnnɩ Azã mɛ.
La nẽrba la wuu, baa la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba la n wõm Azã yetɔga la, ba basɛ tɩ Azã mise ba ko'om pʋam mɛ.
Bɛla pa'alɩ mɛ tɩ ba sakɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ sɩra.
La Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n zagsɛ tɩ Azã ka mise ba ko'om pʋam na, ba zagsɛ la bõn-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a ẽŋɛ bɔ ba la.» Tɩ Azezi le yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ mam wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ la zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba n ɩtɩ se'em na.
Ba ɩrgɔ wõn na bẽm?
Ba ãn wʋ kɔma n zĩ da'am wi'ira taaba yetɩ: ‹Tõma peebe wɩɩsɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka wa.
Tɩ tõma yõom kʋʋrɛ yõoma, tɩ yãma ka kɛlla.› Se'ere n soe la, Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na wa'am mɛ wa lʋta nõorɛ, dee ka yũura dãam, tɩ ba yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am wa dita dee yũura, tɩ ba yetɩ, a de la dita, la dã-yũura, la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba la tõon-be'ero dõma sɩrɛ.
Nẽr-sɛba n sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm n boorɩ se'em na n mi tɩ a tarɩ yɛm.» Azezi boe Asimõ yire Farisi nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n daan wi Azezi tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di.
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ yire la ka zĩ'ire bɔna mĩ tɩ a di.
La pɔka n boe tẽŋa la pʋam tõnna yalsɩ tõoma.
La pɔka la n wõm tɩ Azezi boe Farisi nẽra la yire dita la, tɩ a tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
Yãŋa ze'ele lɛm Azezi nãma bɔba kɛlla.
Tɩ a nintãm yɛsra tɔgra Azezi nãma zuo.
Tɩ pɔka la suure duuse Azezi nãma la, la a zomto, dee kɔkɛ a nãma la, sõogɛ ba la tɩdarɛ kaam na.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la n wi Azezi la yẽ bɛla, tẽ'esɛ yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ pɔg-ẽna n kalʋm ẽ wã n de nẽr-sɛka, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ tɩ a tõnnɩ la yalsɩ tõoma.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Asimõ, mam tarɩ la sɛla tɩ m yele fo.» Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, yele!» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽra n daan boe tɩ nẽrba bayi tara a sãnnɛ.
Nẽra ayɩla sãnnɛ de la lig-kõba kɔbsnuu.
Tɩ ayẽma la mẽ sãnnɛ dɛna lig-kõba pinuu.
Tɩ ba daan ka tãna wʋn yɔ ẽ a ligri la.
Tɩ a basɛ ligri la bɔ ba.
Bãma bayi la, ãne n wʋn nõŋɛ ligri la dãana gãnna?» Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ sɛka sãnnɛ n zo'oge la.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn lerge se'em na de la sɩra.» Dee gelge bɩsɛ pɔka la, yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ pɔka wã?
Mam n kẽ fõn yire la, fõn ka bɔ mam ko'om tɩ mam peege m nãma.
La pɔka la peege mam nãma mɛ la a nintãm, dee duuse ba la a zomto.
Fõn ka kɔkɛ mam tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ fʋ to'oge mam sõŋa.
La mam n kẽ'em na, pɔka la kɔkɛ mam nãma mɛ ka basɛ.
La fõn ka nã'asɛ mam ẽŋɛ kaam mam zuugo, la a sõogɛ mam nãma mɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ mam yele fʋ yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero n zo'oge la taalɛ mɛ.
Bɛla n soe tɩ a nõŋrɛ la zo'oge.
La nẽr-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ fẽfẽe la, a nõŋrɛ mẽ de la fẽe.» Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele pɔka la yetɩ: «Fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bɔna fʋ zuo.» Tɩ sɛba n daan diti la ẽ na tɔgra la taaba sɔkra yetɩ: «A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ?» Tɩ Azezi yele pɔka la yetɩ: «Fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã n fãagɛ fɔ basɛ.
Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm.»
Pɔgsɩ n dolɩ Azezi Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la dɔla ẽ.
La pɔgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan dolɩ ẽ.
La kʋlkã'arsɩ, la bã'asɩ n daan nãmsrɩ pɔg-bãma, tɩ Azezi botɩ ba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Pɔgsɩ la ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Amaari n yese Magdala, ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopɔɩ daan yese dee basɛ ẽ na.
La ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azanɩ.
Ẽŋa de la Asuza n bɩsrɩ naba A'erɔdɩ yire yelle la pɔga.
La ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Asuzanɩ.
Pɔg-bãna, la pɔgsɩ zozo'e n tarɩ ba mẽŋa lɔgrɔ sõŋra Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la.
Nẽra n yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri makrɛ La nẽrba n ze'ele tẽnsɩ to'oto'ore sẽnna Azezi zẽ'am.
Nẽrba la n daan lagsɛ zo'oge pãɩ la, tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri.
Ẽŋa n boe mĩ lɔbgra la, tɩ bõnbuuri la basɛba lui sore zuo tɩ nẽrba nẽ ba, dee tɩ niinto mẽ wa'am wa di ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui tãmpĩa zuo bule, la mã'asrɛ n ka boe mĩ na ĩyã tɩ ba zẽkɛ ki.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a, tɩ bãma la gõ'osɩ la wuu lagɩm yese, tɩ gõ'osɩ la fʋrɛ ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋɔ zẽ'a yese, wɔm biɛ zo'oge paagɛ kɔbga kɔbga.» Azezi n tɔgɛ bɛla la, dee yetɩ: «Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ, la sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, mam makrɩ la magsa bɔ'ɔra ba.
‹Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsra, dee ka yẽta, ba wʋn wõnna, dee ka bãŋra ba võorɛ.› Makrɛ la võorɛ n wãna: Bõnbuuri la de la Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am wa yese yetɔga la ba sũure pʋam, botɩ ba kãn sakɛ yẽ fãarɛ.
La tãmpĩa la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, dee sakɛ la sũ-yẽlga, la yetɔga la ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam sõŋa.
Ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, tɩ yelle sãn paagɛ ba, tɩ ba basɛ.
La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, tɩ ba yɛm yɔɔra la ba vɔm yelle, tɩ bõntarsõm la dũnia yẽlʋm yɛmleego botɩ ba ka tãna wʋn bɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam.
La zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, dee sakra dɩkra yetɔga la ɩta ba sũure pʋam sõŋa sõŋa, mõrgɛ zɛ kãŋkãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam wʋ bõnbuuri la n wɔm biɛ se'em na.» Mõrgɛ-ya bãŋɛ yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ Azezi le yetɩ: «Nẽra ka yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ lɔkɔ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ ẽ sʋgɛ gɔrgɔ tilum.
A wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo, tɩ a nẽegɛ peelem tɩ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la yẽta.
Bõn-sɛka woo n lile la wʋn lilge mɛ, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn wa puke mɛ tɩ nẽrba bãŋɛ.
Mõrgɛ-ya bãŋɛ yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka n tarɩ sɛla, ba wʋn bɔ ẽ pa'asɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka tarɩ sɛla, bõn-sɛba fẽe tɩ a tẽ'esɛ tɩ a tara la, ba wʋn to'oge ba.» Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ n daan wa'am tɩ ba yẽ ẽ.
La nẽrba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ paagɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba yele Azezi yetɩ: «Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n boe yẽŋa bɔɔra tɩ ba yẽ fɔ.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛba wuu n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, dee sakɛ ɩta lan yele se'em na, n de mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ.» Azezi botɩ kʋsebgo yõkɛ Daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi kẽ õorŋɔ, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ dooge ya mõgrɛ la ke bɔba doone.» Tɩ ba mõnna õorŋɔ la wɛ'ɛsa.
La ban mõnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ gẽem yõkɛ Azezi, tɩ a gĩse.
Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ isge ko'om na zuo vugra, tɩ ko'om kẽ'era õorŋɔ la pʋam, tɩ la lebge pakrɛ bɔ ba.
Tɩ ba paagɛ nẽegɛ Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, karẽnsãama, tõma yetɩ tɩ ki mɛ.» Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo, la ko-mĩ'isi tɩ ba ãna sĩm.
Tɩ kʋsebgo la ko-mĩ'isi la yõkɛ, tɩ la ãna sĩm.
Tɩ a soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya ka bɔ mam sɩra?» Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «Ãne n de ẽna tã'agɛ tãsra kʋsebgo la ko'om, tɩ ba sakra a nõorɛ?» Kʋlkã'arsɩ n dolɩ bʋraaga, tɩ Azezi dige ba La ba paagɛ la Geraza dõma tẽŋa.
Mõgrɛ la boe la tẽn-ẽŋa la Galile tẽŋasʋka.
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋɔ pʋam sige.
Tɩ tẽŋa la bʋraa ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ẽ sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ.
A ka yɛɛrɩ fuugo, halɩ tɩ la yuuge, la a ka kẽ'erɩ yire, a boe la zẽ'e-sɛba tɩ yɔɔrɔ boe mĩ na.
-Nõor-faa tɩ kʋlkã'arga la ẽn girge ẽ.
Tɩ ba gu'ura ẽ, dee ba a nãma, la a nu'usi wuu la bãnsɩ.
Tɩ a kɔ'ɔra bãnsɩ la.
La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la mõom.
La bʋraaga la n yẽ Azezi la, a kaasɛ mɛ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, tĩi tɔgra yetɩ: «Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm boe mam la fõn tẽŋasʋka?
M sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ da nãmsɛ mam.» Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ tɩ a yese dee basɛ bʋraa la, bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa.» Se'ere n soe tɩ a yele bɛla la, kʋlkã'arsɩ la n dolɩ ẽ na zo'oge mɛ.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la sose Azezi yetɩ, a da botɩ ba sẽŋɛ bug-tẽŋa bog-ko'ogo la pʋam.
La kurkurdõma n daan zo'oge bɔna tãŋa zuo ɔbra yɔnnɔ.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ, a bɔ ba nõorɛ tɩ ba kẽ kurkurdõma la.
Tɩ Azezi sakɛ ban yele se'em na.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la.
Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki.
La sɛba n gu'uri kurkurdõma la n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, ba zoe sẽŋɛ la tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ nẽrba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na.
La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a yɛ la futo zẽa Azezi nẽŋam, dee tarɩ yɛm sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ sɛba n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, yele ba lan ẽŋɛ se'em tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ bʋraa la.
Tɩ Geraza tẽŋa nẽrba la wuu belem Azezi yetɩ, a fõrgɛ dee basɛ ba tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n ba kẽ ba.
Tɩ Azezi kẽ'era õorŋɔ la tɩ a fõrgɛ.
Tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, sose Azezi tɩ a basɛ tɩ a doose ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi zagsɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Lebe kule ya yire, ka pa'alɛ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ bɔ fʋ la.» Tɩ a doose tẽŋa la wuu pʋam, mõola pa'ala Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bɔ ẽ na.
Azayirusi pɔyʋa, la pɔka n kalʋm Azezi fuugo yelle Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la ke bɔba.
La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n põn lagsɛ bilam zɛ gu'ura ẽ.
Azezi n daan paagɛ mĩ na, ba to'oge ẽ mɛ sõŋa sõŋa.
La bʋraa ayɩla n boe mĩ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azayirusi, a de la Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana, wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ: «Wa'am mam yire, tɩ mam pɔyʋa n tarɩ yʋʋma pia la ayi n dee la a ki.» Bʋraa la bia de la ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.
Tɩ Azezi dɔla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la mikra ẽ.
La pɔka n daan boe mĩ luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi tɩ la ka gɔ'ɔra.
Tɩ a daan dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu sã'am tɩbdõma zẽ'am, la baa ayɩla ka yãŋɛ botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ a paagɛ Azezi poorʋm, kalʋm Azezi fuugo nõorɛ.
La bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩɩm na ze'ele ka le yɛsra.
Tɩ Azezi soke yetɩ: «Ãne n kalʋm mam?» Tɩ nẽra woo sɩ'ɩsɛ.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, nẽrba wã wuu n lagɩm gilge fõn mikra se'em wã tɩ fõn sɔkra?» Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Nẽra n kalʋm mam, se'ere n soe la, mam bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese mam zẽ'am.» La pɔka la n bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn yãŋɛ sʋgɛ la Azezi la, tɩ a gõgra wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam, yele ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam se'ere n soe tɩ ẽŋa kalʋm ẽ, la ẽŋa n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa se'em.
Tɩ Azezi yele pɔka la yetɩ: «M bia, fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã n botɩ fʋ yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm.» La Azezi n nãn boe mĩ tɔgra la, tɩ nẽra ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ pɔyʋa la ki mɛ, da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama la.» La Azezi n wõm bɛla la, tɩ a yele Azayirusi yetɩ: «Da zoe dabeem, wen bɔ mam sɩra, tɩ fʋ pɔyʋa la wʋn yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.» Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ a yire, la a ka botɩ nẽra nẽra doose ẽ kẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la bia la sɔ, la a ma mã'a.
La nẽrba la wuu daan kellɩ mɛ fabla bia la ĩyã.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Da kaasra-ya, bia la ka ki, a gĩsri mɛ.» Tɩ ba la'ara Azezi, ban mi tɩ bia la ki mɛ na ĩyã.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ bia la nu'ugo, tĩi tɔgɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Bia, isge.» Tɩ bia la vɔm leme, tɩ a isge bilam mẽŋa.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya bia la dia tɩ a di.» Tɩ la daan di'ige bia la sɔ, la a ma.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la lagsɛ mɛ, bɔ ba pãŋa, la nõorɛ tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Dee tõm ba yetɩ ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La a yele ba yetɩ: «Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sẽŋɛ.
Da dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ, bɩɩ tãmpɔkɔ, bɩɩ dia, bɩɩ ligri.
Da dɩkɛ ya futo bayi bayi.
La yi-sɛka tɩ ya paagɛ tɩ ba to'oge ya, bɔna-ya yi-ẽŋa pʋam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
La zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka to'oge ya, yese-ya tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam, dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnɔ basɛ.
Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa.» Azezi n yele bɛla la, karẽnbiisi la yese mɛ sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ wuu pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽta ĩmã'asʋm.
A'erɔdɩ boorɩ tɩ a bãŋɛ Azezi n de nẽr-sɛka Galile Naba A'erɔdɩ n daan wõm bõn-sɛba wuu n ɩtɩ la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba basɛba n daan yele ẽ tɩ Azezi de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli n le wa'am dũnia zuo, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ayẽma n vo'oge.
Tɩ A'erɔdɩ yetɩ: «Mam daan botɩ ba wike Azã zuugo mɛ, dee tɩ ãne n de ẽna wã tɩ mam wõm a yelle wãna wã?» La a daan boorɩ tɩ a yẽ Azezi mɛ.
Azezi bɔ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ dia Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ a daan tõm na, lebe mɛ ka tɔgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu.
Tɩ Azezi botɩ ba doose la ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Betisayida.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la bãŋɛ ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'am na, babsɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a to'oge ba, tɔgɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle bɔ ba, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La wẽnnɛ n daan boe mĩ tɩ a kẽ, tɩ karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am a zẽ'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Botɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n lɛm na ka ɛ dia, la gã'a-zẽ'a, se'ere n soe la, tɩn boe zẽ'e-sɛka wã de la mõom.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma mẽŋa bɔ ba dia tɩ ba di.» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi mã'a, sãn dagna tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka da dia wa'am wa bɔ nẽr-bãna wuu.» La bʋraasɩ n daan boe mĩ de wʋ tʋsanuu.
Tɩ Azezi yele karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba la welse zĩ'ire pinu-nu.» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la botɩ nẽrba la wuu zĩ'ire bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuum pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ dia la ĩyã, dee fiise borborɩ la zũma la bɔ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtɔ pia la ayi.
Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ Azezi de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi daan boe la kẽnkɛrŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la bɔna a zẽ'am, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Nẽrba basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli, tɩ basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ayẽma n vo'oge.» Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Dee yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: «Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na.» Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra, dee yetɩ: «Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e.
Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ.» Azezi doosgo yelle Azezi yele bɛla dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgɔ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dɔ-puurŋa dɔla mam.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vɔm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vɔm mam ĩyã, a wʋn yẽ vɔm.
Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorɔ de la bẽm?
Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ĩyã, la mam yetɔga la ĩyã, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ la ẽ wakat-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn leme wa'am la m na'am pãŋa, la Nawẽnnɛ, la a malɛkadõma na'am pãŋa la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm.» Azezi nẽŋa teere Yetɔg-bãma poorʋm, la daan ẽŋɛ wʋ dabsa anii, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã doose ẽ zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ.
La ẽn boe mĩ pʋ'ʋsra la, tɩ a nẽŋa teege, tɩ a futo pelge yẽgra.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi darɛ zɛ tɔgra la ẽ.
Ba de la Amoyisi, la A'eli n puke ba mẽŋa nẽegɛ la Nawẽnnɛ na'am peelem tɔgra la Azezi, ẽŋa n wʋn ki Zerizalɛm se'em tɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ a wa'am tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ yelle.
La gẽem n daan tarɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la a taaba la tɩ ba gĩse, yãŋa nẽegɛ yẽ Azezi n yẽgrɩ, tɩ nẽrba bayi la zɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ nẽrba bayi la daan bɔna mĩ tɩ ba fõrgɛ, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ.
Basɛ tɩ tɩ tĩ põnsɩ batã, ayɩla bɔ fõn, ayɩla bɔ Amoyisi, la ayɩla bɔ A'eli.» A daan wen tɔgɛ mɛ, a ka mi ẽn tɔgrɩ se'em na.
La ẽn daan boe mĩ tɔgra bɛla la, tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm.
La sawatɛ la n lile ba la, dabeem n yõkɛ karẽnbiisi la.
Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: «Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam looge.
Selse-ya ẽ.» La kõa la n tɔgɛ la, ba yẽ la Azezi mã'a n ze.
Tɩ ba daan sĩna wakat-ẽŋa ka yele nẽra nẽra bãma n yẽ sɛla la.
Kʋlkã'arga n tarɩ bia, tɩ Azezi botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Tɩ beere daan wiige, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sige, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ daan tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
La bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la pʋam tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, mam belnɩ fʋ mɛ, bɩsɛ m bia wã.
A de la mam bi-yẽŋa, la kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a botɩ a kaasra mɛ, dee luta kinki'ire, tɩ nõtõorʋm yɛsra a nõorʋm.
Kʋlkã'arga la ẽn nãmsɛ ẽ zo'oge mɛ, pɔglʋm ẽ dee basɛ ẽ.
Bɛla tɩ mam belem fʋ karẽnbiisi yetɩ, ba dige ẽ tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ.» Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bɔ'ɔrɩ mam sɩra, la ya ka ɩtɩ sõŋa.
Mam wʋn mã'agɛ m mẽŋa la yãma yuuge paagɛ la wakat-kãna?» A yele bɛla dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Tarɩ bia la wa'am.» La bia la n paarɩ Azezi zẽ'am na, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ tɩ a gõgra.
Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a basɛ bia la.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ bia la, tɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ ẽ lebse a sɔ.
La nẽrba la wuu n yẽ Nawẽnnɛ pãn-kãtɛ la, la di'ige ba mɛ.
Azezi tɔgɛ a kũm yelle Nẽrba la wuu daan ken ze la yɛrɩ la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Azezi ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Selse-ya yetɔg-ẽna tɩ mam yetɩ m tɔgɛ wã sõŋa: Ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ la nẽrsaalba nu'usum.» La ba daan ka bãŋɛ a yetɔga la võorɛ.
Yetɔga la daan sʋgɛ mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ bãŋɛ a võorɛ, dee zɔta dabeem ka soke ẽ.
Ãne n wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am?
Azezi karẽnbiisi la daan wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba, bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ bãma pʋam nẽr-sɛka n wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yõkɛ bia ze'ele lɛm a mẽŋa, dee yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge bi-pɩka n ãn wʋ ẽna mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã, a to'oge la mam, la sɛka n mẽ to'oge mam, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na.
Nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka ya zẽ'am na, ẽŋa n de nẽr-kãtɛ.» Nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri yãma, a de la ya nẽra Tɩ Azã yele Azezi yetɩ: «Zuudãana, tõma yẽ la bʋraa n digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ ba yɛsra, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ĩyã, tɩ tõma gu ẽ yetɩ a basɛ.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Da gu-ya ẽ, nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri yãma, a de la ya nẽra.» Samaari tẽŋa nẽrba ka bɔ Azezi sɩra Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azezi daan wʋn zẽkɛ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire la n daan lɛm, tɩ a kɔ'ɔn yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ ẽŋa sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm.
A daan tõm na nẽrba yetɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋam.
Tɩ nẽrba la daan dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Samaari tẽn-pɩka pʋam tɩ ba mãasna sɛla woo dee gu'ura ẽ.
Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zagsɛ tɩ bãma kãn to'oge ẽ, ẽn we'esɩ Zerizalɛm na ĩyã.
La a karẽnbiisi Azakɩ la Azã n bãŋɛ bɛla la, tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ wi bugum tɩ ba ze'ele saazuum wa di ba mɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ Azezi wẽrgɛ, gi ba [yetɩ: «Yãma ka mi sɩ-sɛka n tarɩ ya la.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ a sã'am nẽrba vɔm, a wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ ba mɛ.»] Tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa tẽŋa ayẽma.
Azezi doosgo yelle Ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bʋraaga yele Azezi yetɩ: «Mam wʋn dɔla fɔ sẽnna zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sẽnna.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Pɩɩna tarɩ yogro mɛ, tɩ niinto mẽ tara tʋgrɔ, la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka tarɩ zẽ'a wʋn gã'arɛ vo'ose.» Dee le yele bʋraa ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: «Doose mam.» Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ m sɔ dee wa'am wa dɔla fɔ.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Basɛ tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am na laagɛ ba kũm.
Dee tɩ fõn sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la.» Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, mam wʋn doose fo, la basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka keese m yir-dõma.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛka n gʋrɛ nii-kũure kɔɔra dee bɩsra poorʋm, ka tã wʋn tõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm tõoma.»
Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi pisyopɔɩ la ayi tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi looge la karẽnbiisi basɛba pisyopɔɩ la ayi tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi tɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋa sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba, la zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ ẽŋa mẽŋa wʋn sẽŋɛ la.
A yele ba yetɩ: «Va'am na bõnkɔɔla lagsgɔ zo'oge mɛ, la tõntõnɩba n wʋn lagsɛ bõnkɔɔla la pɔ'ɔrɩ mɛ.
Bɛla ĩyã sose-ya va'am na dãana tɩ a tõm tõntõnɩba pa'asɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ bõnkɔɔla la.» Dee yãŋa yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya, yãma ãn wʋ piisi tɩ mam tõm saasaadõma tẽŋasʋka.
Da dɩkɛ-ya pʋtmãanɛ, bɩɩ tãmpɔkɔ, la da dɩkɛ-ya tagra pa'asɛ, da ze'ele-ya sore bɔ nẽra gã'a.
La ya sãn yetɩ ya kẽ yire pʋam, ya dẽŋɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ yire la dõma yetɩ: ‹Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sũ-mã'asʋm.› Nẽra sãn bɔna mĩ bɔɔra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bɔna la ẽ.
La nẽra sãn ka bɔna mĩ bɔɔra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn leme ya mẽŋa zẽ'am.
Da lɔsna-ya yiɛ, bɔna-ya yire ayɩla pʋam, yũura dee dita bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bɔ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tõntõnna to'oge a yɔɔrɔ.
Ya sãn paagɛ tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ba to'oge ya, di-ya bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bɔ ya la, la ya botɩ tẽn-ẽŋa bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, dee yele nẽrba la yetɩ: ‹Wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.› La tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ya kẽ tɩ ba ka to'oge ya, ya yese sore dee yele tẽŋa la nẽrba wuu yetɩ: ‹Tõma pɩɩsrɩ la ya tẽŋa tẽntõnnɔ n tabɛ tõma nãma la, tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa.
La bãŋɛ-ya tɩ wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.› Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, Sodom nẽrba kãn ba yẽ toogo wʋ tẽn-ẽŋa nẽrba n wʋn yẽ toogo se'em na.
Korazẽ dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo!
Betisayida dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo!
Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba n tõm ya tẽnsɩ pʋam na, daan sãn tõm nɩ na Tiiri, la Sidõ tẽnsɩ pʋam, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm, yɛ bɔra futo ẽŋɛ tãmpɛglʋm ẽŋɛ ba zuto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
La sarɩyadia daarɛ, la wʋn dɛna toogo bɔ yãma gãnna Tiiri, la Sidõ dõma.
La yãma Kapɛrnaʋm dõma, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ ya wʋn zẽkɛ mɛ ka paagɛ saazuum bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ, ya wʋn sige mɛ ka paagɛ bug-tẽŋa.» La Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Sɛka n selsrɩ ya yetɔga, a selsrɩ la mam yetɔga, la sɛka n zagsɛ ya, a zagsɛ la mam.
La sɛka n zagsɛ mam, a zagsɛ la sɛka n tõm mam na.» La karẽnbiisi pisyopɔɩ la ayi la sẽŋɛ mɛ dee leme wa'am la sũ-yẽlga wa yetɩ: «Zuudãana, baa la kʋlkã'arsɩ sakrɩ tõma nõorɛ mɛ, ban zotɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ la ĩyã.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yẽ la Asũtãana n ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa wʋ saaga n yãkɛ la.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ mam bɔ ya pãŋa mɛ tɩ ya nẽ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, la nãnsɩ, dee yãŋɛ Asũtãana la a pãŋa wuu, la sɛla sɛla ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ya be'em.
La da ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga kʋlkã'arsɩ n sakrɩ ya nõorɛ la ĩyã, ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga ya yʋ'ʋra n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire vɔm gõŋɔ pʋam na ĩyã.» Azezi ɩtɩ sũ-yẽlga Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa botɩ Azezi sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yetɩ: «Mam Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n de saazuum la tẽŋa wã Zuudãana, mam pẽgrɩ fɔ, se'ere n soe la, fõn sʋgɛ bõn-bãna wã mɛ tɩ yɛm dõma la bãŋrɩba ka mina, dee pa'alɛ nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kɔm-pɩgsɩ la.
Ẽe, mam Sɔ, la de la fõn boorɩ bɛla la ĩyã.» «Mam Sɔ dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ la mam nu'usum.
La nẽra ka mi mam n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la n de sɛka, sãn dagna mam Sɔ la, la nẽra mẽ ka mi mam Sɔ la n de se'em, sãn dagna mam n de a Dayʋa la, la sɛba tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ na.» Azezi yele bɛla dee wẽrgɛ la a karẽnbiisi la bɔba, yele bãma mã'a yetɩ: «Yãma sɛba n yẽtɩ sɛla tɩ ya yẽtɩ wã, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba, la na'adõma zozo'e yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ yãma n yẽ sɛla la mɛ, la ba ka yẽ, ba yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba wõm sɛla tɩ yãma wõm na mɛ, la ba ka wõm.» Samaari nẽra n sõŋɛ a tadãana makrɛ Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama isge tɩ a di Azezi yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ gõŋɔ la pʋam yetɩ bẽm?
Fõn karẽŋrɩ ẽ na, a yetɩ bẽm?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «La yetɩ: Nõŋɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, dee nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ yele sõŋa.
Ẽŋɛ bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ vɔm na.» La ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ a bɔ a mẽŋa bʋʋrɔ la, tɩ a soke Azezi yetɩ: «Ãne n de mam tadãana?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽra n daan yese Zerizalɛm wɛ Zeriko, tɩ fãarba yõkɛ ẽ fã a lɔgrɔ wuu, dee wẽ ẽ tɩ a dee la a ki, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽema ayɩla dɔla so-ẽŋa tɔlla, yẽ ẽ, lɔkɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Leviti nẽra mẽ wa'am tɔlla, yẽ ẽ, bʋrgɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
La Samaari nẽra n mẽ daan dolɩ so-ẽŋa tɔlla yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a paagɛ a zẽ'am dɩkɛ dãam peege a nõtɔ la, ẽŋɛ kaam ĩmĩ vile.
Yãŋa yõkɛ ẽ bã a bõŋa zuo, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ sãama yire ka bɩsɛ a yelle.
Tɩ beere wiige tɩ a dɩkɛ lig-kõba bayi bɔ nẽr-sɛka n bɩsrɩ sãama yire yelle la, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Bɩsra a yelle, ligri la sãn pɔ'ɔgɛ, mam sãn leme, mam wʋn yɔ fɔ.› » Azezi tɔgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm dee soke ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽrba batã wã, fõn tẽ'esɛ tɩ ãne n de nẽra la tɩ fãarba yõkɛ la tadãana?» Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama la lerge yetɩ: «Sɛka n zoe a ninbãalga sõŋɛ ẽ na.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ mẽ ka ẽŋɛ bɛla.» Amartɩ la Amaari yelle Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ ka kẽ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam.
Tɩ pɔka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amartɩ bɔna tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam to'oge ẽ a yire.
Amartɩ tarɩ la yɩbga tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari.
Tɩ Amaari zẽa Zuudãana Azezi nãma bɔba sɛlsra a yetɔga.
La Amartɩ tõoma yelle n daan mõ'ogɛ a nini, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: «Mam Zuudãana, mam yɩbga la n basɛ tɩ mam m yɩla mã'a tõnna la, fõn yetɩ bẽm?
Yele ẽ tɩ a wa'am wa sõŋɛ ma.» Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Amartɩ, Amartɩ, fõn botɩ fʋ yɛm n yɔɔra la yɛla zozo'e yelle.
La bõnɔ ayɩla mã'a n de yel-kãŋkãŋɛ.
Amaari looge la bõn-sõŋɔ, la nẽra nẽra kãn tã'agɛ to'oge bõn-ẽŋa a zẽ'am.»
Azezi pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi ba wʋn pʋ'ʋsra se'em Azezi daan boe la zẽ'a ayɩla pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
La ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, pa'alɛ tɔ tõma n wʋn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ se'em, wʋ Azã n pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi se'em na.» Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra, ya yetɩ: ‹Tõma Sɔ, botɩ fʋ yʋ'ʋrɛ yẽta pẽka, wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka, bɔ'ɔra tɔ daarɛ woo la a dia.
Basɛ tɩ tõon-be'ero taalɛ, tɩ tõma mẽ basrɩ sɛba n ẽŋɛ tõma be'em taalɛ mɛ.
Da basɛ tɩ yelle paagɛ tɔ tɩ tɩ lui.› » Dee le yele ba yetɩ: «Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, yãma nẽr-sɛka sãn tara sɩrɛ, tɩ a wa'am a zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋɔ wa sose ẽ yetɩ: ‹M sɩrɛ, bɔ ma borborɩ batã, mam sɩrɛ n ze'ele sore wa'am, tɩ mam ka tara sɛla wʋn bɔ ẽ tɩ a di.› Tɩ a sɩrɛ la bɔna deem dee lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Da dãam mam, mam yʋ m zanõrɛ mɛ, tɩ mam la m kɔma gã, mam kãn yãŋɛ isge bɔ fɔ fõn boorɩ sɛla la.› Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa a sãn põn kãn isge bɔ ẽ sɛla ban de sɩtɔ la ĩyã, a wʋn isge bɔ ẽ ẽn boorɩ sɛla la mɛ, ẽn bʋlɛ ẽ na ĩyã.
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ya sose Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn bɔ ya, ya ɛ, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ, ya wẽ kʋlɩŋa, tɩ a wʋn yo'oge bɔ ya.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n sosrɩ Nawẽnnɛ, a wʋn bɔ ẽ.
La nẽr-sɛka n eerɩ, wʋn yẽ.
La nẽr-sɛka n wẽ'erɩ kʋlɩŋa, ba wʋn yo'oge bɔ ẽ.
Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a bia wʋn sose ẽ zũfo, tɩ a dɩkɛ bõnsɛla bɔ ẽ?
Bɩɩ a sãn sose ẽ zelle, tɩ a dɩkɛ nãŋa bɔ ẽ?
Yãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma la sãn mina tɩ ya bɔ ya kɔma bõn-sõma, Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Sɔ n boe saazuum n ãn sõŋa la wʋn bɔ nẽr-sɛba n sosrɩ ẽ a Sɩa la gãnna.» Azezi pãŋa gãnnɩ Asũtãana La Azezi daan dige la kʋlkã'arga n tarɩ bʋraa tɩ a dɛna muko, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la daan yese, dee tɩ bʋraa la n de muko la yãŋa tã'agɛ tɔgra, tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la.
Tɩ nẽrba la basɛba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Ẽn digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la, la de la Abelzebuli n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra ba.» Tɩ nẽrba basɛba bɔɔra tɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a tõm tõon-yãlma n pa'alɛ tɩ a pãŋa la ze'etɩ la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: «So'olʋm sɛka woo nẽrba n welge wẽrgɛ zɛbra la taaba, so'olʋm na wʋn sã'am mɛ.
La so'olʋm ẽŋa yiɛ mẽ wʋn lui mɛ.
La Asũtãana sãn welge zɛbra la a mẽŋa, a so'olʋm na kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele.
Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la ĩyã tɩ mam yele bɛla.
Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la, yãma nẽrba tarɩ la ãn pãŋa digri kʋlkã'arsɩ?
Bɛla, ya nẽrba la mẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka tarɩ bʋʋrɔ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa tɩ mam tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am mɛ wa dita na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.
Pãŋa dãana sãn mãasʋm sõŋa la a bʋdaan-lɔgrɔ gu'ura a yire, sɛla kãn ẽŋɛ a bõntarsõm.
La nẽra n tarɩ pãŋa gãnna ẽ sãn wa'am wa zɛbɛ yãŋɛ ẽ, a wʋn fãagɛ la a zɛbrɛ lɔg-sɛba tɩ a te'ege la yiɛn, dee yãŋa vaagɛ a yire lɔgrɔ la pʋɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka n ka boe la mam, sisri mam mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka lagɩm na mam lagsra, a wɩrgrɩ mɛ.» Kʋlkã'arga n yese dee leme makrɛ Azezi le yetɩ: «Kʋlkã'arga sãn yese dee basɛ nẽra, a sẽŋɛ la pɔgẽntɩɩsɩ pʋam ka ɛɛra zẽ'a tɩ a vo'ose, la a sãn ɛ zẽ'a koŋe, a yetɩ mɛ tɩ: ‹Mam wʋn lebe la m yi-sɛka tɩ m yese dee basɛ la pʋam.› La a sãn lebe ka yẽ tɩ a pɩɩsɛ mɛ malgɛ ãna sõŋa, a wʋn lebe mɛ ka tarɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopɔɩ n de wẽensɩ gãnna ẽŋa mẽŋa wa'am, tɩ ba kẽ lagɩm bɔna mĩ.
Bɛla, nẽr-ẽŋa toogo yãŋa wʋn gãnna a kʋrʋm toogo la mɛ.» Nẽr-sɛba n sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga tarɩ zu-yẽlga Azezi n tɔgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ pɔka ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Pɔg-sɛka n dɔgɛ fɔ, tɩ fʋ mõgɛ a bĩ'isum na, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.» Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, dee sakra ɩta lan yele se'em na, n tõn tarɩ zu-yẽlga.» Nẽrba boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ la bõn-yãlma Nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am zo'oge, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba de la nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ.
Ba eerɩ la bõn-yãlma n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma ayẽma, sãn dagna bõn-yãlma sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa Azonaasɩ la.
Bõn-sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Azonaasɩ la, pa'alɛ Niniivi dõma la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ de la sɛka n pa'alɩ zamãan-ẽna dõma Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa.
Sarɩyadia daarɛ, na-pɔka la n yʋʋn yese wẽntulle gɔbga bɔba la wʋn isge mɛ zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma ba tõon-be'ero la ĩyã.
Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am wa selse naba Asalomõ yɛm yetɔga la, la sɛka n gãnnɩ Asalomõ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka sɛlsra ẽ.
Sarɩyadia daarɛ, Niniivi dõma mẽ wʋn isge zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma mɛ ba tõon-be'ero la ĩyã.
Se'ere n soe la, Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga bɔ ba la, ba yʋʋn teege yɛm mɛ basɛ tõon-be'ero.
La sɛka n gãnnɩ Azonaasɩ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka teege yɛm.» Peelem yelle «Nẽra kãn yõ fɩtla sʋgɛ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgɔ vuge ẽ, a wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo tɩ a nẽegɛ bɔ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la.
Fʋ nini n nẽerɩ peelem bɔ'ɔra fʋ ĩyã wʋ fɩtla la, bɛla fʋ nini sãn ãna sõŋa, fʋ ĩyã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ.
La fʋ nini sãn ka ãna sõŋa, fʋ ĩyã wuu boe la lika pʋam.
Bɛla ĩyã, guuse tɩ bõn-sɛka n de peelem fʋ pʋam na, da dɛna lika.
La fʋ ĩyã wuu sãn tara peelem sõŋa, tɩ baa bɔbrɛ ayɩla ka tara lika, fʋ ĩyã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ wʋ fɩtla n tarɩ peelem nẽera bɔ'ɔra nẽrba se'em na.» Azezi zɛrgɛ Farisi dõma la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma Azezi n daan tɔgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ Farisi nẽra ayɩla wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka kẽ zĩ'ire bɔna mĩ tɩ a di.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la yẽ tɩ Azezi ka peege nu'usi wʋ ban ɩtɩ ba sisgo se'em na, dee yetɩ a di, tɩ la di'ige ẽ.
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Yãma Farisi dõma peerɩ ya wama la ya laasɩ pɔa mɛ, la yãma mẽŋa pʋam pɩrɛ la dẽgrɔ n de fãaga la pʋtʋʋlgɔ.
Ya de la geto!
La dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ poorʋm na, n ken ẽŋɛ pʋam na?
Dɩkɛ-ya yan tarɩ sɛla la bɔ nasdõma la ya sũure wuu, tɩ sɛla woo wʋn ãna sõŋa bɔ ya.
Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo.
Se'ere n soe la, yãma bɔ'ɔrɩ Nawẽnnɛ zẽvõorɔ buuri wuu pia pʋrɛ mɛ, baa ba sãn ãna pɩka pɩka, la ya ka ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, la ya ka nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ.
La de la bõn-bãna tɩ ya wʋn dẽŋɛ ɩta, dee yãŋa ɩta sɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ la pa'asɛ.
Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo.
Se'ere n soe la, yãma eerɩ la zẽ'esɩ nẽŋa tɩ ya zĩ'ire wẽndeto pʋam, dee bɔɔra tɩ ba nã'asra ya da'asɩ pʋam.
Ya wʋn yẽ toogo.
Se'ere n soe la, ya ãn wʋ yɔɔrɔ n naagɛ la tẽŋa tɩ nẽrba nẽera ba zuto tɔlla, dee ka mina tɩ yɔɔrɔ n boe mĩ.» Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fʋ sãn tɔgra bɛla fʋ po pɔ'ɔra la tõma wuu.» Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Yãma lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma mẽ wʋn yẽ toogo.
Se'ere n soe la, yãma n botɩ nẽrba la ɩta se'em na, ãn wʋ ze-tɩbsa tɩ ya zelgrɩ nẽrba la, la yãma mẽŋa ka boorɩ tɩ ya kalʋm ba la ya nu'ubiire.
Ya wʋn yẽ toogo.
Se'ere n soe la, yãma mẽtɩ la yɔɔrɔ bɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la.
La yãma yaabdõma n yʋʋn kʋ ba.
La yãma n mẽtɩ sɛba tɩ ya yaabdõma kʋ la yɔɔrɔ la, la pa'alɛ tɩ ya sakɛ tɩ ban yʋʋn tõm se'em na ãn sõŋa mɛ.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ yɛm na yʋʋn yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn tõm nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba, la Tõntõnɩba bɔ ba, la ba wʋn kʋ basɛba, dee nãmsɛ basɛba.› Bɛla Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sɩbgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma wʋ la de la bãma n kʋ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la halɩ dũnia pĩ'iluŋo, wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã, lan pɔsɛ la Abɛlɩ kʋa, halɩ wa paagɛ Azakari tɩ ba kʋ kãabgɔ bĩmbĩnne, la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'e-sõŋɔ tẽŋasʋka la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ tõon-be'ero bãma wuu taalɛ boe la zamãan-ẽna nẽrba zuo.
Yãma lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la wʋn yẽ toogo.
Se'ere n soe la, yãma n gu'uri nẽrba tɩ ba ka bãŋra Nawẽnnɛ sɩra.
Yãma mẽŋa ka sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra la, dee mẽ gu'ura nẽr-sɛba n boorɩ tɩ ba sakɛ la.» La Azezi n ze'ele bilam fõrgɛ la, tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la Farisi dõma sũure ba isge la ẽ.
Tɩ ba bɔɔra tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽ, sɔkra ẽ sokrɩsɩ zozo'e bɔɔra tɩ a tɔgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ.
Da dɛna-ya pʋlibsum dõma Wakat-ẽŋa nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n lagsɛ zo'oge mikra taaba, nẽera taaba nãma, tɩ Azezi dẽŋɛ yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Guuse ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma pʋlibsum na n ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ n botɩ dãam wuu kɛlla la.
Bõn-sɛka woo n lile wʋn lilge, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn puke.
Bɛla, bõn-sɛka woo tɩ ya tɔgɛ lika pʋam, ba wʋn tɔgɛ ẽ na peelem pʋam tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm, la bõn-sɛka tɩ ya waasʋm deem na, ba wʋn zom na gɔsgɔ mõolɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm.» La masɛ tɩ ya zɔta la Nawẽnnɛ «M sɩrdõma, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da zɔta dabeem la sɛba n kʋʋrɩ ĩyã mã'a, dee ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla pa'asɛ la.
Mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya lan masɛ tɩ ya zɔta sɛka.
Zɔta-ya Nawẽnnɛ n tã wʋn kʋ, dee tara pãŋa wʋn kẽ'esɛ ya bug-tẽŋa la.
Asɩra, zɔta-ya Nawẽnnɛ.
Ba ka koosrɩ mõom niinto banuu la lig-kõba bayi mã'a?
La Nawẽnnɛ ka yĩnni baa ayɩla yelle.
La baa yãma zuugo zomto, Nawẽnnɛ mi ba wuu kãllɛ mɛ.
Bɛla ĩyã, da zɔta-ya dabeem, tɩ yãma tarɩ yõorɔ gãnna niinto zozo'e mɛ.» Sɛka n sakrɩ Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn sõŋɛ ẽ mɛ «La mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ze'ele nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa de la mam nẽra, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam yetɩ a de la mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n sɩ'ɩsɛ nẽrba nẽŋam tɩ ẽŋa dagɩ mam nẽra, mam mẽ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam tɩ a dagɩ mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n tɔgɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la be'em, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ, la nẽr-sɛka woo n pɔ'ɔgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Ba sãn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeto pʋam, bɩɩ na'adõma nẽŋam, bɩɩ kɛ'ɛndõma nẽŋam tɩ ba di ya sarɩya, da fabla-ya yan wʋn lerge se'em, bɩɩ yan wʋn tɔgɛ se'em to'oge ya mẽŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn pa'alɛ ya wakat-ẽŋa yan wʋn tɔgɛ se'em.» Bõntarsa n ka tarɩ yɛm makrɛ Azezi n tɔgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ nẽra ayɩla n boe nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la pʋam yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, yele m kẽema tɩ a dɩkɛ tõma sɔ n ki dee bõn-sɛba la, pʋɩ bɔ ma m bõnɔ.» Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Ãne n bɔ mam nõorɛ tɩ m dɛna ya sarɩyadita, bɩɩ m pʋta ya bõntarsõm bɔ'ɔra ya?» Dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: «Guusra-ya ya mẽŋa, da ɛɛra bõntarsõm zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ nẽra n tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge ĩyã tɩ a tarɩ yõvore.» A yele bɛla, dee makɛ la makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tɩ a vatɔ bõnkɔɔla mãalɛ sõŋa, tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: ‹Zẽ'a ka boe tɩ m wʋn sũm m bõnkɔɔla la.
Bɛla ĩyã, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?› Yãŋa yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: ‹Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em.
Mam wʋn wõrɛ m bã la mɛ, malgɛ mẽ bã-kãra, sũm m bõnkɔɔla, la m sɛla woo.
Dee yele m sũurum yetɩ: M tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge, la wʋn seke ma paagɛ yʋʋma zozo'e.
Bɛla m wʋn vo'ose mɛ di dee yũ, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.› Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Gergo wã, yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna wã m wʋn to'oge fʋ vɔm na.
La ãne n wʋn sɔna bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ bĩŋe la?› » La Azezi le yetɩ: «La de la bɛla la nẽr-sɛka woo n lagsrɩ bõntarsõm bĩŋra a mẽŋa ĩyã, dee ka tara sɛla sɛla Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.» Nawẽnnɛ n bɩsrɩ tɩ yelle Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bɛla ĩyã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da fabla ya vɔm yelle, ya wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ ya wʋn yɛ fu-sɛba la yelle.
Vɔm yelle gãnnɩ dia mɛ, tɩ ĩyã yelle mẽ gãnna futo.
Bɩsɛ-ya gõorɔ, ba ka bʋtɩ, ba ka lagsrɩ bõnkɔɔla, la ba ka tarɩ bãarɛ bɩɩ dia bĩŋre zẽ'a, la Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ'ɔrɩ ba dia.
La yãma ka tarɩ yõorɔ gãnna bõn-ẽgla zo'oge sɩra?
Ãne n boe ya pʋam n tã wʋn pa'asɛ a vɔm woglʋm fẽfẽe ẽn fablɩ la ĩyã?
La yãma sãn ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ bɛla n de bõn-pɩka, bẽm ĩyã tɩ yãma fabla bõn-sɛba n weege la yelle?
Bɩsɛ-ya mõ-puuro n ãn sõŋa se'em, ba ka tõnnɩ, ba mẽ ka wʋgrɩ futo.
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa naba Asalomõ na'am n yʋʋn tarɩ pãŋa la, a yʋʋn ka tã'agɛ yɛ fuugo n ãn sõŋa wʋ mõ-puugo ayɩla.
La Nawẽnnɛ sãn botɩ mõorɔ n boe zĩna dee tɩ ba wʋn yõ ba bugum beere ãna sõŋa bɛla, a kãn bɩsɛ ya yelle sõŋa gãnna bɛla mɛ bɩɩ?
Bẽm tɩ yãma ka bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra zo'oge?
Da basɛ-ya tɩ yan wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ yan wʋn yũ sɛla yelle pakɛ ya.
La de la nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n eerɩ bõn-bãma wuu.
La yãma Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ mi tɩ yãma boorɩ bõn-bãma wuu mɛ.
Ɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na gãnna wuu, tɩ a wʋn bɔ ya bõn-bãma pa'asɛ.» Bõntarsõm n ka sã'anɩ «M nẽrba, ya ka zo'oge, la da zɔta-ya dabeem, se'ere n soe la, la paagɛ ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm mɛ tɩ a yetɩ a bɔ ya a so'olʋm.
Koose-ya yãma n tarɩ sɛla la dɩkɛ ligri la bɔ nasdõma.
Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya eerɩ la bõntarsõm n ka sã'anɩ.
Ɛ-ya bõntarsõm tɩ ba bɔna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ wuu, bilam tɩ nayigba kãn tã'agɛ zũ, tɩ bõn-mõgla mẽ kãn tã'agɛ sã'am ba.
Se'ere n soe la, ya bõntarsõm n boe zẽ'a na, ya pʋtẽ'era mẽ boe la bilam.» Mãasʋm-ya gu'ura Azezi le yetɩ: «Mãasʋm-ya lʋ ya sagãna ya sɩɩsɩ tɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ tõm, dee yõ ya fɩtladõma, ãna wʋ nẽrba n gu'uri ba zuudãana n wʋn ze'ele pɔgdire kibsa wa'am, tɩ a sãn wa'am wa wi, tɩ ba yo'oge yaŋa tɔtɔ bɔ ẽ.
Tõntõn-sɛba tɩ ba zuudãana wʋn paam tɩ ba ze gu'ura ẽ, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a wʋn basɛ tɩ ba zĩ'ire, tɩ zuudãana la mẽŋa mãasʋm wa pʋɩ ba dia.
A sãn wa'am sõnsʋa, bɩɩ bewiine, wa yẽ tɩ ba ken gu'ura ẽ, ba tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
