Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ yidãana sãn mina wakat-sɛka tɩ nayiga wʋn wa zũ ẽ, a wʋn gu'ura a yire mɛ kãn basɛ tɩ nayiga la kẽ zũ ẽ.
Bɛla, yãma mẽ mãasʋm zɛ sõŋa, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽm na wakat-sɛka tɩ yãma ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na.» Tõntõnna masɛ mɛ tɩ a ɩta a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em na Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fõn makɛ makrɛ ẽna wã la tõma mã'a bɩɩ, nẽrba wuu?» Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Ãne n de tõntõn-sõŋɔ n tarɩ yɛm?
La de la ẽŋa tɩ a zuudãana wʋn yetɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle, bɔ'ɔra a tõntõnɩba dia wʋ lan masɛ, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Zuudãana la sãn leme wa yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tõm wʋ ẽŋa n yele se'em na, tõntõnna la tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a zuudãana la wʋn dɩkɛ ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu bɔ ẽ mɛ tɩ a bɩsra.
La tõntõnna la sãn tẽ'esɛ yetɩ, ẽŋa zuudãana la yuuri mɛ ka kulna, yãŋa wẽ'era tõntõn-bʋraasɩ, la tõntõn-pɔgsɩ, dita, dee yũura bugra, a zuudãana la wʋn kulum na daar-sɛka tɩ a ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am, la wakat-sɛka tɩ a ka mi, wa di'ige ẽ.
La a wʋn dige ẽ mɛ botɩ a lagɩm na sɛba n ka bɔ ẽŋa sɩra la yẽ sɩbgrɛ.
Tõntõn-sɛka n mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ka mãasʋm bɩɩ ka tõm ẽn boorɩ se'em na, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ mɛ zozo'e.
La tõntõn-sɛka n ka mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ba wẽ ẽ, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ na fẽe.
Sɛka tɩ ba bɔ ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ yɛla zozo'e yelle mɛ, la sɛka tɩ ba gu'ule ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ halɩ yɛla zozo'e yelle gãnna mɛ.» Nẽr-sɛba n ka dolɩ Azezi wʋn welge mɛ la sɛba n dolɩ Azezi «Mam wa'am tɩ m tʋʋrɛ la bugum dũnia wã zuo, la mam boorɩ nɩ mɛ zozo'e tɩ bugum na põn darɛ dita.
La dẽnɩ tɩ mam yẽ nãmsgɔ zozo'e wʋ mam mise la ko'om pʋam na, la a yelle la wʋn nãmsɛ mam mɛ halɩ tɩ la wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ.
Ya tẽ'esɛ tɩ mam wa'am tɩ m botɩ nẽrba nõorɛ n dɛna ayɩla dũnia zuo bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ, mam yetɩ ya tɩ mam tarɩ la welgre wa'am.
La, lan pɔsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, nẽrba banuu sãn bɔna yire ayɩla pʋam, nẽrba batã wʋn welge mɛ sisra nẽrba bayi la, tɩ nẽrba bayi la mẽ sisra nẽrba batã la.
La sɔ wʋn sise a dayʋa, tɩ dayʋa mẽ sise a sɔ.
La ma wʋn sise a pɔyʋa, tɩ pɔyʋa mẽ sise a ma.
La dayʋa pɔga wʋn sise a sɩra ma, tɩ sɩra ma mẽ sise a dayʋa pɔga.» Bãŋɛ-ya bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã võorɛ bɔkɛ Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la yetɩ: «Ya sãn yẽ tɩ wara sobge bɔbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tɔtɔ tɩ saaga wʋn ni mɛ, tɩ a sɩrɩ ni.
La ya sãn le yẽ tɩ kʋsebgo vugri bɔbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tɩ wɔlgɔ lɛm mɛ, tɩ wɔlgɔ wʋn sɩrɩ paagɛ.
Pʋlibsum dõma wã!
Yãma bɩsrɩ mɛ mina tẽŋa, la saazuum yɛla n ãn se'em.
La bẽm tɩ yãma ka mina bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã võorɛ bɔkɛ?» Malgɛ fʋ yɛla la Nawẽnnɛ «Bẽm tɩ ya mẽŋa ka tẽ'esɛ bãŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ya wʋn ẽŋɛ bɔkɛ?
Fʋ sãn tara yelle la nẽra, tɩ a tarɩ fʋ wɛ'ɛsa sarɩyadia zẽ'am, mõrgɛ tɩ ya mãalɛ yelle la sore, tɩ a da dɩkɛ fʋ bɔ sarɩyadita, tɩ a tɔgɛ fʋ yetɔga la dɩkɛ fʋ bɔ gu'ura, tɩ a kẽ'esɛ fɔ yʋ'a deem.
Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ fʋ kãn yẽ sore yese yʋ'a deem na, halɩ tɩ fʋ wʋn wa yɔ fʋ sãnnɛ na wuu ba'asɛ.»
Teege-ya yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero La wakat-ẽŋa nẽrba basɛba n wa'am wa tɔgɛ pa'alɛ Azezi, gɔmna Apilatɩ n daan botɩ ba kʋ Galile nẽrba basɛba wakat-sɛka tɩ ba boe mĩ kãabra bɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ ba zɩɩm yese gaam na kãabgɔ la zɩɩm.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ Galile nẽr-bãma n daan yẽ nãmsgɔ ẽŋa la, bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Galile dõma basɛba la bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla.
La nẽrba pia la anii tɩ de-tʋgma yʋʋn lui kʋ ba Silo tẽŋa la, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Zerizalɛm nẽrba basɛba la bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla.» Kẽnkãŋa n ka wɔnnɩ makrɛ Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ẽna wã yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n tarɩ kẽnkãŋa n sele a va'am pʋam, yãŋa wa'am tɩ a bɩsɛ a sãn tara biɛ, ka yẽ sɛla sɛla.
Tɩ a yele va'am na gu'ura yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma atã n wãna tɩ mam sẽnnɩ dee ka yẽta biɛ kẽnkãŋa wã zuo.
Sɛ ẽ basɛ, tɩ a yẽrɛ la zẽ'a.› Tɩ gu'ura la lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana, basɛ ẽ yʋʋn-ẽna mã'a, tɩ mam wʋn kɔ gilge a tille, ẽŋɛ bugulgo basɛ ẽ, la yʋʋnɛ sãn kaagɛ tɩ a wɔm, la ãn sõŋa, la a sãn ken ka wɔm, fʋ yãŋa sɛ ẽ basɛ.› » Azezi botɩ pɔka yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ Azezi daan boe la Zifdõma wẽndeem vo'osgo daarɛ zãsna nẽrba, tɩ pɔka ayɩla bɔna mĩ tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ botɩ a dɛna kobgo paagɛ yʋʋma pia la anii, yũre ka tãna wʋn dɔ'ɔgɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ pɔka la, wi ẽ yetɩ: «Pɔka, fʋ yẽ yolsgo, fʋ bã'aga la basɛ fɔ.» Dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ pɔka la zuo, tɩ bã'aga la basɛ pɔka la bilam mẽŋa, tɩ a tã'agɛ dɔ'ɔra, yãŋa pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ wẽndeego la naba sũure isge la Azezi, ẽŋa n botɩ pɔka la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la ĩyã.
Tɩ a yele nẽrba la yetɩ: «Dabsa ayoobɩ n boe tɩ ya tãna wʋn tõm.
Wa'am-ya dabs-bãma pʋam wa tɩbɛ ya mẽŋa, dee da sẽnna vo'osgo daarɛ tɩbra ya mẽŋa.» Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Pʋlibsum dõma wã!
Yãma nẽra woo ka lorgrɩ a lɔlga, bɩɩ a bõŋa sẽnna yũula ko'om vo'osgo daarɛ mɛ bɩɩ?
Tɩ pɔg-ẽna wã n de Abraham yɩɩŋa tɩ Asũtãana lʋ ẽ yʋʋma pia la anii wã, la ka narɩ tɩ mam lorge ẽ vo'osgo daarɛ?» La ẽŋa n yele bɛla la, tɩ yãnnɛ yõkɛ a bɛ'ɛba la wuu, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm la a tõon-yãlma sɛba wuu tɩ a ẽŋɛ la.
Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wõn na bẽm?
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wõn na bẽm?
La mam wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la ẽ?
A ãn wʋ sɔ'ɔrɔ biire tɩ nẽra bʋrɛ a va'am pʋam, tɩ a bɩ lebge tɩ-kãtɛ.
Tɩ niinto sẽnna tɛ'ɛra ba tʋgrɔ a wila zuo.» La a le yetɩ: «Mam wʋn le dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm?
A ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ tɩ pɔka dɩkɛ gaam na borborɩ zom la-kãra batã wẽ, tɩ dãbɩllɛ la botɩ ba wuu uke.» Nẽrba n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm Azezi daan we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm dɔla tẽn-kãra la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam zãsna nẽrba.
Tɩ nẽra soke ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, nẽrba fẽe mã'a n wʋn yẽ fãarɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nargɛ-ya pãŋa doose zanõrɛ n ãn mika kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, tɩ mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn wa ɛɛra mɛ tɩ ba kẽ, la ba kãn yãŋɛ.
La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, yidãana wʋn isge yʋ yaŋa la mɛ, la ya sãn weege yẽŋa, ya wʋn wẽ'era mɛ kɔkɔ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana, yo'oge tɩ tɩ kẽ.› La a wʋn lerge ya yetɩ: ‹Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a.› La ya wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Dagɩ tõma la fõn n daan lagɩm dita, dee yũura, tɩ fʋ sẽnna tõma tẽŋam zãsna nẽrba?› La a wʋn le lerge ya yetɩ: ‹Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a, fõrgɛ ya mam zẽ'am, yãma de la tõon-be'ero dõma.› La ya wʋn ka yẽ Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakɔbɩ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba wuu, tɩ ba boe Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, la yãma wʋn weege la yẽŋa kɛlla dee dɩkɛ ya nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
La nẽrba wʋn yese dapɔ-bɔba, la zanõ-bɔba, la zʋʋgɔ bɔba, la gɔbga bɔba wa'am wa zĩ'ire Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam di.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba basɛba n de poorʋm dõma wʋn lebge nẽŋam dõma, tɩ basɛba n mẽ de nẽŋam dõma wʋn wa lebge poorʋm dõma.» Azezi sũure sã'am mɛ Zerizalɛm dõma ĩyã La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: «Basɛ kalam dee sẽŋɛ zẽ'a ayẽma, tɩ Naba A'erɔdɩ eerɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ a kʋ.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele yɛm be'ero dãana la yetɩ: ‹Zĩna la beesã, mam wʋn dige kʋlkã'arsɩ mɛ tɩ ba yese, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, la dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ mam wʋn ba'asɛ m tõoma la wuu.› La dẽnɩ tɩ mam sẽŋɛ m sẽnnɛ na zĩna, la beesã, la dabsa atã daarɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ki zẽ'a ayẽma, sãn dagna Zerizalɛm pʋam.
Zerizalɛm nẽrba, Zerizalɛm nẽrba, yãma kʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba, dee lɔbra sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm ba ya zẽ'am la kuga kʋʋra.
Nõorɛ faa tɩ mam boorɩ tɩ m lagsɛ ya wʋ nõ-yã'aŋa n lagsrɩ a kɔma ũna a kempagsɩ pʋam se'em na, tɩ ya ka bɔɔra.
Bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ya tẽŋa bɔ ya, tɩ a lebge daboto.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya kãn le yẽ mam, halɩ tɩ ya wʋn wa yetɩ: ‹Pẽgɛ-ya sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.› »
Azezi botɩ bʋraaga yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ Vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ Farisi dõma naba ayɩla yire tɩ ba di.
Tɩ nẽrba la n boe mĩ na bɩsra ẽn wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em.
La bʋraaga ayɩla n boe mĩ tɩ ĩ-fʋʋsŋɔ bã'aga tara ẽ, tɩ a zɛ Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi soke lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la yetɩ: «Sore boe tɩ nẽra botɩ nẽrba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, sore ka boe?» Tɩ ba sĩna.
Tɩ Azezi botɩ bʋraaga la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, basɛ ẽ tɩ a kule.
Dee soke ba yetɩ: «Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a dayʋa, bɩɩ a lɔlga wʋn lui lʋa pʋam vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kãn zoe tɔtɔ sẽŋɛ ka yaagɛ ẽ?» Tɩ ba makɛ tɩ ba lerge ẽ koŋe.
Dɛna-ya sik-m-mẽŋa dõma Tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba wi tɩ ba wa'am wa di la n loosrɩ zẽ'e-sõma zĩ'ita, tɩ a makɛ makrɛ yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ pɔgdire kibsa wi fo, da kãn sẽŋɛ ka zĩ'ire zẽ'e-sõŋɔ, tã tɩ a mẽ wi la nẽra n gãnnɩ fõn.
Tɩ sɛka n wi ya wuu la, da wa'am wa yele fʋ yetɩ: ‹Isge, dee tɩ ẽna zĩ'ire.› Tɩ fʋ yãŋa isge sẽŋɛ ka zĩ'ire poorʋm poorʋm la yãnnɛ.
Nẽra sãn wi fo, sẽŋɛ ka zĩ'ire poorʋm, tɩ sɛka n wi fʋ la sãn wa'am yẽ fɔ, a wʋn yetɩ: ‹M sɩrɛ, wa'am wa zĩ'ire nẽŋam.› Bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ nã'asgɔ nẽr-sɛba tɩ fʋ zĩ la ba la zẽ'am.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ.» La Azezi yele sɛka n wi ẽ na yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wʋntɛɛŋa, bɩɩ yʋ'ʋŋɔ wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am wa di, da wi'ira fʋ sɩrdõma, bɩɩ fʋ sɔbiisi, bɩɩ fʋ nẽrba, bɩɩ fʋ sawiiba n de bõntatba, se'ere n soe la, ba mẽ wʋn wa ẽŋɛ bɛla daar-sɛka mɛ wi fo lebse bɛla sãnnɛ.
Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am di, wi nasdõma, la kɔɔrnɔ, la wɔbsɩ, la fɔɔsɩ.
Fʋ sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, fʋ wʋn tara zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ba kãn yãŋɛ ẽŋɛ lebse fo.
Bɛla, wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ a yɛm na vo'oge la, fʋ wʋn yẽ yɔɔrɔ.» Kibs-kãtɛ makrɛ La nẽrba la n lagsɛ zẽa dia zẽ'a la Azezi la, ba wõm ẽn yele se'em na mɛ, tɩ nẽra ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn po di dia Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam na tarɩ zu-yẽlga.» Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bɔ ẽ yetɩ: «Bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe, ẽŋɛ dia zozo'e, wi nẽrba zozo'e tɩ ba wa'am wa di.
Tɩ dia la wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽrba la tɩ ẽŋa yetɩ: ‹Wa'am-ya tɩ mam mãasʋm ba'asɛ mɛ gu'ura ya.› Tɩ ba nẽra woo yɛta lan pakɛ ẽŋa se'em, tɩ ẽŋa sɔsra sugri.
Pɔspɔsɩ dãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Mam da la va'am, tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ lan ãn se'em, bɛla tɩ mam sɔsra ẽ sugri.› Tɩ ayɩla yetɩ: ‹Mam da la nii-kɔɔrsɩ pia bɔɔra tɩ m makɛ ba bayi bayi kɔ bɩsɛ, bɛla tɩ mam sɔsra ẽ sugri.› Tɩ ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: ‹Mam di la pɔg-sãana, bɛla tɩ mam kãn yãŋɛ wa'am.› Tɩ tõntõnna la lebe ka tɔgɛ bɛla bɔ a zuudãana la.
Tɩ a zuudãana la sũure yĩige, tɩ a yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: ‹Yese tɔtɔ sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la sorɔɔrɔ zuto ka tarɩ nasdõma, la kɔɔrnɔ, la fɔɔsɩ, la wɔbsɩ wa'am tɩ ba di.› Tɩ tõntõnna la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ a zuudãana la n yele se'em na, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M zuudãana, fõn yetɩ mam ẽŋɛ se'em na, mam ẽŋɛ mɛ, la zẽ'a ken dee mɛ.› Tɩ zuudãana la le yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: ‹Yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ sorɔ-pɩgsɩ la wuu zuo, ka mõrgɛ tarɩ nẽrba la wa'am tɩ ba kẽ tɩ mam yire pɩrɛ.› La mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ba tɩ ba wa'am, tɩ ba zagsɛ la, ba nẽra nẽra kãn le malɩn di mam dia la.» Azezi karẽnbia n masɛ tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em Azezi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ dɔla ẽ, tɩ a gelge yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn yetɩ a doose mam dee ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a sɔ, la a ma, la a pɔga, la a kɔma, la a sɔbiisi, la a tãpa, bɩɩ a sãn ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a mẽŋa vɔm, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
La sɛka woo n ka sakɛ nãmsgɔ wʋ nẽra n zɛɛrɩ a kũm dɔ-puurŋa dɔla mam, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
Ya mi tɩ nẽra sãn bɔna ya pʋam bɔɔra tɩ a mẽ de-tʋgma, a wʋn dẽŋɛ zĩ'ire mɛ geele bɩsɛ, ẽn tarɩ se'em na wʋn seke tɩ a yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, bɩɩ la kãn seke?
La sãn dagna bɛla, a sãn ẽebɛ ẽbrɛ dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, sɛba wuu n yẽ bɛla la wʋn la ẽ mɛ yetɩ: ‹Nẽr-ẽna ẽebɛ la deego, dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ.› Bɩɩ naba sãn wɛ'ɛsa tɩ a zɛbɛ la a na-tadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dẽŋɛ tẽ'esɛ bɩsɛ, ẽŋa n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspia la, a wʋn tã'agɛ zɛbɛ la na-sɛka n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspisyi, bɩɩ a kãn tã'agɛ?
La a sãn bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn tã'agɛ, naba ayẽma la n ken zãagɛ la, a wʋn dẽŋɛ tõm na a tõntõnɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ naba la zẽ'am ka soke ẽ bɩsɛ, bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ zɛbrɛ la ba'asɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, yãma nẽr-sɛka woo n ka basrɩ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ a tarɩ la, ka tã wʋn dɛna mam karẽnbia.
Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la a sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm?
A ka le tara yõorɔ la tẽŋa, la a ka tã wʋn dɛna bugulgo mẽ, ba lobrɩ ẽ basra mɛ.
Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.»
Pesgo, la lagfɔ n bɔɩ makrɛ Lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e n daan sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am tɩ ba selse a yetɔga.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la yõnna yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna wã to'orɩ la tõon-be'ero dõma, dee dita la ba.» Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ wã soke ba yetɩ: «Bʋra-kãna n boe ya pʋam tara piisi kɔbga, tɩ ayɩla sãn bɔɩ, tɩ a kãn lagsɛ piisi piswɛɩ la awɛɩ la basɛ dũnsẽkam, dee sẽŋɛ ka ɛ ayẽma n bɔɩ la halɩ yãŋa yẽ ẽ?
La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn yõkɛ ẽ mɛ buke la sũ-yẽlga.
La a sãn kule yire, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: ‹Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m pesgo la n bɔɩ la mɛ.› Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ yire pʋam la bɛla gãnna nẽr-sõma piswɛɩ la awɛɩ n ka eerɩ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
Bɩɩ, pɔg-kãna n boe wʋn tara lig-kõba pia, tɩ ayɩla sãn bɔɩ, tɩ a kãn yõ fɩtla pɩɩsɛ deego la ɛ lagfɔ la sõŋa halɩ wa yẽ ẽ?
La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: ‹Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m lagfɔ la n bɔɩ la mɛ.› Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma zẽ'am na bɛla.» Budibla n basɛ a sɔ yire, la a kẽema makrɛ Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Bʋraa n daan boe tara a dayɔɔsɩ bayi.
Tɩ yɩbga la yele a sɔ yetɩ: ‹M sɔ, pʋɩ fʋ bõntarsõm na bɔ mam m bõnɔ.› Tɩ a sɔ pʋɩ a bõntarsõm na bɔ ba.
Tɩ la ẽŋɛ dabsa fẽe, tɩ yɩbga la lagsɛ a bõntarsõm na wuu yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ, ka tõm tõon-yooro sã'am ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu.
La ẽn sã'am a bõntarsõm na wuu ba'asɛ la, kɔm kãtɛ n wa'am tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ a ka le tara sɛla wʋn di.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la nẽra ayɩla zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ a tõnna.
Tɩ nẽra la dɩkɛ ẽ botɩ a sẽŋɛ mõom ka gu'ura a kurkurdõma.
Tɩ a kɔm dõnna tɩ a bɔɔra tɩ a di kurkuri dia.
Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a sũurum yetɩ: ‹Mam sɔ tarɩ tõntõnɩba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba dita tɩgra dee basra, dee tɩ mam bɔna kalam kiira la kɔm.› Yãŋa yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn lebe kule la m sɔ yire ka yele ẽ yetɩ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em, mam ka le masɛ tɩ ba wi mam tɩ fʋ bia.
Ɩta mam wʋ fʋ tõntõnɩba la ayɩla.› Dee isge kulla a sɔ yire.
La ẽn nãn boe zãazãarɛ la, tɩ a sɔ la yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a zoe tʋ'ʋsɛ kɔkɛ ẽ, mõbgɛ ẽ.
Tɩ bia la yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M sɔ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em.
Mam ka masɛ tɩ ba le wi'ira mam tɩ fʋ bia.› Tɩ a sɔ la yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ: ‹Sẽŋɛ-ya tɔtɔ ka tarɩ fu-sɛka n ãn sõŋa gãnna la wa'am wa yɛ ẽ, dee dɩkɛ nutʋa pire a nu'ubiire, dee dɩkɛ tagra pire ẽ.
La ya yõkɛ lɔl-polle n nõbɛ wa'am wa kʋ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ dia di, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
Se'ere n soe la, mam bia wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge.
A daan bɔɩ mɛ, tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.› Tɩ ba yãŋa ɩta sũ-yẽlga.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a dayɔ-kẽema la boe la va'am.
La ẽn lebe kulna wa lɛm yire la, a wõm na duursi tɩ ba wẽ'erɩ wa'ara.
Tɩ a wi a sɔ tõntõnna ayɩla soke ẽ yetɩ: ‹Bẽm n ẽŋɛ?› Tɩ tõntõnna la lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Fʋ yɩbga la n wa'am, tɩ fʋ sɔ kʋ lɔl-polle n nõbɛ, ẽŋa n yẽ fʋ yɩbga la tɩ a tarɩ ĩmã'asʋm na ĩyã.› Tɩ kẽema la sũure yĩige halɩ.
Tɩ a zagsɛ tɩ ẽŋa kãn kẽ yire.
Tɩ a sɔ yese belem ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa kẽ.
Tɩ a lerge a sɔ la yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma zozo'e tɩ mam tõnnɩ fʋ tõoma, dee ka zagsɛ fʋ nõorɛ baa daarɛ ayɩla, la fõn ka bɔ mam bulla baa daarɛ ayɩla tɩ m kʋ tɩ mam la m sɩrdõma ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
La fʋ bi-ẽna wã n dɩkɛ fʋ bõntarsõm sẽŋɛ ka tõm yalsɩ tõoma sã'am ba wuu dee kulum wã, fʋ kʋ la lɔl-polle bɔ ẽ.› Tɩ a sɔ lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹M bia, fõn boe la mam zẽ'am daarɛ woo.
La mam n tarɩ sɛla wuu la de la fõn bõnɔ.
La, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ yɩbga wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge.
A daan bɔɩ mɛ.
Tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.› »
Tõntõnna n de yɛm dãana makrɛ Tɩ Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tara tõntõnna tɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle.
Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele bõntarsa la yetɩ, tõntõnna la sã'anɩ a bõntarsõm na mɛ.
Tɩ zuudãana la wi a tõntõnna la yetɩ: ‹Bẽm tɩ ba tɔgra fõn yelle tɩ mam wõnna wãna?
Geele pa'alɛ ma fõn ẽŋɛ mam bõntarsõm na se'em.
Fʋ kãn le bɩsra mam yire yelle.› Tɩ tõntõnna la yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: ‹Mam zuudãana la yetɩ a dige mam a tõoma la pʋam mɛ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?
Kʋa?
Mam ka tarɩ pãŋa wʋn kɔ.
La yãnnɛ n wʋn tara mam la sosgo.
Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a sãn wa dige ma, m tara sɩrdõma n wʋn to'oge mam ba yiɛ sõŋa.› Tɩ a wi a zuudãana sãnditba ayɩla ayɩla, soke pɔspɔsɩ dãana la yetɩ: ‹Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ la wãne?› Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: ‹Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na kaam dugl-kãra kɔbga.› Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋɔ tɔtɔ zĩ'ire gʋlsɛ yetɩ, kaam dugl-kãra pinuu.› Dee soke ayẽma yetɩ: ‹Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ na wãne?› Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: ‹Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na mui bɔra kɔbga.› Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋɔ gʋlsɛ yetɩ pinii.› Baa la tõntõnna wã ɩrgɔ n ka doose sore la, a zuudãana pẽgɛ ẽ mɛ, ẽn tõm na yɛm na ĩyã.
Dũni-ẽna wã dõma tarɩ la yɛm tõnna la taaba gãnna nẽr-sɛba n bãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ peelem.
Bɛla ĩyã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya dɩkɛ dũnia bõntarsõm yõgɛ sɩrdõma, tɩ dũnia bõntarsõm na sãn wa ba'asɛ, ba wʋn to'oge ya tɩ ya bɔna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ n ka ba'asrɩ.» Bõntarsõm sɩra sɩra «Nẽr-sɛka woo n de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ de la sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam.
La sɛka n ka de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ ka de sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam.
Bɛla, ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma dũnia wã bõntarsõm pʋam, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõntarsõm sɩra sɩra gu'ule ya?
La ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma la bõn-sɛba n dagɩ ya mẽŋa bõnɔ, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõnɔ bɔ ya tɩ la dɛna ya mẽŋa bõnɔ?
Tõntõnna ka tã wʋn sakɛ zuudãandõma bayi.
A wʋn sise ayɩla mɛ, dee nõŋɛ ayɩla, bɩɩ a wʋn nanna ayɩla la mɛ, dee pɔ'ɔra ayɩla la.
Bɛla, yãma ka tã wʋn sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Zuudãana, dee botɩ bõntarsõm mẽ dɛna ya zuudãana.» Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ, la a so'olʋm yelle Farisi dõma n nõŋɛ ligri la n wõm bɛla la, ba la'arɩ Azezi mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma pa'alɩ ya mẽŋa nẽrba nẽŋam wʋ ya de la nẽr-sõma.
La Nawẽnnɛ mi ya pʋtẽ'era n ãn se'em mɛ.
Bõn-sɛka tɩ nẽrsaalba pẽgrɩ la, de la bõn-dẽgrɔ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
Amoyisi lɔɔ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n yʋʋn pa'alɩ nẽrba ban wʋn ãna se'em, ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Azã wa'am na.
Lan pɔsɛ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga mɛ, tɩ nẽra woo nargra pãŋa tɩ a kẽ.
La, la de la nãana tɩ saazuum la dũnia tole gãnna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ la bõn-pɩka ayɩla bɔɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n basɛ a pɔga, dee le di pɔka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pɔga, la sɛka woo n di pɔka tɩ a sɩra basɛ mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em.» Bõntarsa, la nasa Alazaarɩ makrɛ Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Bõntarsa n daan boe, yɛɛra futo n ba ãna sõŋa, dee tara sɛla woo daarɛ woo tɩ la seke.
Tɩ nasa ayɩla mẽ daan bɔna, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Alazaarɩ, tɩ a ĩyã wuu tara nõtɔ.
A daan ẽn gã la bõntarsa la zanõrʋm, bɔɔra tɩ a di bõntarsa la n diti tɩ di-zõra luta la.
Tɩ baasɩ sẽnna lɛɛla a nõtɔ la.
Tɩ Alazaarɩ wa ki.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire Abraham zẽ'am.
Tɩ bõntarsa la mẽ wa ki, tɩ ba laagɛ ẽ.
Tɩ bõntarsa la daan bɔna bug-tẽŋa nãmsra, yãŋa gorge yẽ Abraham halɩ zẽ'a n zãagɛ, tɩ Alazaarɩ zẽa a sakʋkɔ.
Tɩ bõntarsa la wi Abraham yetɩ: ‹M sɔ Abraham, zoe m ninbãalga, dee tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'ubiire tẽ'egɛ ko'om mã'alɛ m zɩlɩŋa, se'ere n soe la, mam boe la bugum pʋam nãmsra.› Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M bia, tẽegɛ tɩ fõn daan boe dũnia zuo wakat-sɛka la, fõn daan tarɩ bõn-sõma mɛ, dee tɩ Alazaarɩ yẽta toogo.
La lɛɛlɛ wã, a sũure mã'agɛ mɛ, dee tɩ fõn yãŋa nãmsra.
La bõn-sɛka n pa'asɛ, bog-ko'ogo n beŋe tõma la yãma, tɩ nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a ze'ele kalam sẽŋɛ yãma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ.
La nẽra mẽ sãn bɔɔra tɩ a ze'ele yãma zẽ'am wa'am tõma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ.› Tɩ a lerge Abraham yetɩ: ‹M sɔ Abraham, la sãn dɛna bɛla, mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ mam sɔ yire, tɩ mam tarɩ la sɔbiisi banuu, a sẽŋɛ ka kã'an ba, tɩ ba mẽ da wa'am nãmsgɔ zẽ'a wã.› Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Ba tarɩ Amoyisi la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n gʋlsɛ gõn-sɛba la mɛ.
La masɛ tɩ ba sakɛ la gõn-bãma yetɔga.› Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹M sɔ, ayɛɩ, nẽra sãn vo'oge lebe sẽŋɛ ba zẽ'am, ba wʋn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.› Tɩ Abraham lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Ba sãn kãn sakɛ Amoyisi, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la nõorɛ, baa nẽra n ki sãn vo'oge lebe, ba kãn sakɛ.› »
Tɩ da botɩ nẽra basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, la tɩ basɛ taaba tõon-be'ero taalɛ Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «La ka tã tɩ bõn-sɛba n pã'asrɩ nẽrba tɩ ba basra Nawẽnnɛ sore la ka wa'am.
La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn botɩ bõn-bãma wa'am na wʋn yẽ toogo.
Ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam, n sõɩ ẽŋa n wʋn botɩ bi-pɩka ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore.
Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa.
Fʋ sɔbia sãn tõm be'em, fʋ kã'an ẽ.
La a sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero la, fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ.
La a sãn ẽŋɛ fʋ be'em nõorɛ ayopɔɩ daarɛ ayɩla, dee leme fʋ zẽ'am nõorɛ ayopɔɩ wa yetɩ: ‹Mam tõm na be'em, bɔ mam sugri›, dẽnɩ tɩ fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ.» Tɩ bɔ Azezi sɩra Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Botɩ tɩ bɔ fɔ sɩra zo'oge.» Tɩ Zuudãana la yele ba yetɩ: «Ya sãn bɔ mam sɩra fẽe wʋ sɔ'ɔrɔ biire la, ya tã wʋn yele kẽnkãŋa wã tɩ a võogɛ sẽŋɛ ka sele mõgrɛ pʋam ke, la a wʋn sakɛ ya nõorɛ mɛ.» Tõntõnna masɛ mɛ tɩ a tõm a tõonɛ «Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, nẽra sãn bɔna yãma pʋam tara tõntõnna tɩ a kɔɔra, bɩɩ gu'ura a dũnsi, tɩ tõntõnna la sãn ze'ele va'am wa'am, a wʋn yele ẽ mɛ yetɩ, wa'am wa di bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ, a wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Dʋgɛ m dia, dee teege fuugo yɛ, tarɩ dia la wa'am wa bɔ ma tɩ m di.
M sãn di dee yũ ba'asɛ, tɩ fʋ mẽ yãŋa di dee yũ.› La zuudãana la n yele tõntõnna la tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, zuudãana la kãn pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ya tɩ ya ẽŋɛ la, ya yetɩ: ‹Tõma wen dɛna la tõntõnɩba, tõma ka narɩ pʋ'ʋsgɔ, se'ere n soe la, la de la tɩ tõoma, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ tõm.› » Azezi botɩ kõnkɔma pia yẽ ĩmã'asʋm Azezi daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm dɔla Samaari la Galile tẽŋasʋka, paagɛ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam, tɩ kõnkɔma pia tʋ'ʋsra ẽ, ze'ele kẽnkɛrŋa kaasra yetɩ: «Zuudãana Azezi, zoe tɩ ninbãalga.» La ẽn yẽ ba la, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya kãabgɔ kẽma la zẽ'am tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ ya ĩyã la n ãn se'em.» La ban sẽnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bã'asɩ la basɛ ba, tɩ ba ãna sõŋa.
La ba nẽra ayɩla n yẽ tɩ a kõnkɔm na basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a lɛbra Azezi zẽ'am dee tɔgra ke'enke'em pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ, sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
A daan de la Samaari nẽra.
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «La dagɩ bãma pia n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm?
Tɩ bawɛɩ la bɔna la bɛ?
Bẽm tɩ ẽna n de sãana la mã'a n leme wa'am tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ?» Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn bɔ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ fãarɛ, isge sẽŋɛ.» Nawẽnnɛ n diti na'am se'em Farisi dõma soke Azezi mɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba sʋkam.
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ sãn wa dita na'am, la ka de sɛla tɩ nẽrba tã wʋn yẽ la nini.
La nẽra kãn yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam›, bɩɩ ‹a boe la ke›.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ boe la ya tẽŋasʋka dita na'am.» La Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ya wʋn bɔɔra tɩ ya yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la, baa la sãn dɛna daarɛ ayɩla, la ya kãn yẽ ẽ.
La nẽrba wʋn yele ya yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke›, bɩɩ ‹bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam.› Da kãn sẽŋɛ-ya, da doose-ya ba.
Se'ere n soe la, daar-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme na, la wʋn ãna wʋ saaga n ẽn yãkɛ saazuum tɩ la nẽegɛ zẽ'a wuu se'em na.
La, lan dẽŋɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a nãmsɛ zozo'e tɩ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma zagsɛ ẽ.
Wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am na, la wʋn ãna wʋ Anoe wakatɛ tɩ la yʋʋn ãn se'em na.
Nẽrba yʋʋn diti mɛ, dee yũura, tɩ bʋraasɩ dita pɔgba, tɩ pɔgsɩ mẽ ɛlla sɩrba, tɩ la wa paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Anoe kẽ õorŋ-kãtɛ la pʋam, dee tɩ ko'om yãŋa wa'am wa pɩrɛ zẽ'a wuu libe nẽrba wuu tɩ ba ki.
La mẽ wʋn ãna wʋ Alotɩ wakatɛ n yʋʋn ãn se'em na.
Ba yʋʋn diti mɛ, dee yũura, dee da'ara, dee kɔɔsra, dee bʋta, dee mẽta, ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ Alotɩ fõrgɛ Sodom tẽŋa la, dee tɩ bugum n diti kidibre ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa kʋ ba wuu.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo daarɛ la mẽ wʋn di'ige ba la bɛla.
Daar-ẽŋa, nẽr-sɛka n boe gɔsgɔ dee tɩ a lɔgrɔ bɔna deego pʋam, a da sige bɔɔra tɩ a ze'ele dɩkɛ ba zoe.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe a va'am, da lebe kule.
Tẽegɛ-ya lan yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Alotɩ pɔga se'em na.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vɔm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vɔm, a wʋn yẽ ẽ.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrba bayi sãn gã sõŋɔ ayɩla pʋam yʋ'ʋŋɔ, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
La pɔgsɩ bayi sãn bɔna nẽerʋm nẽena, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
[Bʋraasɩ bayi sãn bɔna va'am, ba wʋn dɩkɛ ayɩla, dee basɛ ayẽma.
]» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la soke Azezi yetɩ: «Zuudãana, bõn-ẽna wʋn ẽŋɛ la bɛ?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «Zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ bõn-kɩ'ɩsɩ boe la, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zõa lagsrɩ taaba.»
Pɔkõorɛ, la sarɩyadita makrɛ Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba sɔsra Nawẽnnɛ wakatɛ wuu da basɛ, yele ba yetɩ: «Sarɩyadita n daan boe tẽŋa ayɩla ka zɔta Nawẽnnɛ, dee ka nanna nẽrba.
Tɩ pɔkõorɛ mẽ bɔna tẽŋa la pʋam sẽnna a zẽ'am wakatɛ wuu yɛta ẽ tɩ: ‹Sõŋɛ ma tɩ m yẽ bʋʋrɔ m bɛ zẽ'am.› La pɔkõorɛ la sẽŋɛ ka sose ẽ na nõor-faa, tɩ sarɩyadita la ka sõŋɛ ẽ.
La pɔkõorɛ la ẽn ken sẽnna sɔsra ẽ na, sarɩyadita la wa yele a pʋtẽ'erʋm mɛ yetɩ: ‹Baa mam ka zotɩ Nawẽnnɛ, dee ka nanna nẽrba la, pɔkõ-ẽna n sẽnnɩ dãana mam se'em wã, mam wʋn isge mɛ sõŋɛ ẽ.
La sãn dagna bɛla, a wʋn sẽnna mɛ nãmsra mam, a kãn basɛ.› » Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi le yetɩ: «Bɩsɛ-ya sarɩyadita la n de nẽr-be'ego la n yele se'em.
La sãn dɛna bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ kãn sõŋɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la n sosrɩ ẽ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋɔ la, bɔ ba bʋʋrɔ gãnna bɛla?
A wʋn yuuge mɛ dee sõŋɛ ba bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ a wʋn wa sõŋɛ ba mɛ tɔtɔ.
La Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sãn wa leme dũnia zuo, a wʋn yẽ nẽrba n bɔ ẽ sɩra mɛ bɩɩ?» Farisi nẽra, la lampo-tɔ'ɔsa makrɛ Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ayẽma bɔ nẽr-sɛba n tẽ'esrɩ tɩ bãma de la nẽr-sõma nẽ'esra nẽrba basɛba la, yetɩ: «Bʋraasɩ bayi n sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na tɩ ba ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, ayɩla de la Farisi nẽra, tɩ ayẽma dɛna lampo-tɔ'ɔsa.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la zɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsra a sũurum yetɩ: ‹Nawẽnnɛ, mam pʋ'ʋsrɩ fʋ, mam n ka wõn na nẽrba basɛba la n ãn se'em na, n de nayigba, bɩɩ nẽr-be'ero, bɩɩ nẽrba n tõnnɩ yalsɩ, la mam n ka wõn na lampo-tɔ'ɔs-ẽna wã la ĩyã.
Dabsa ayopɔɩ woo pʋam, mam lʋtɩ nõorɛ la bʋyi, la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ mam yẽtɩ la, pia pʋam woo mam loorɩ ayɩla bɔ'ɔra fõn mɛ.› La lampo-tɔ'ɔsa la ze'ele la kẽnkɛrŋa põn ka gorge a nẽŋa saazuum, dee wẽ nupʋ'ʋgɔ yetɩ: ‹Nawẽnnɛ, zoe m ninbãalga, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana.› » Azezi yele bɛla dee yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ bʋra-ẽna wã n kule la, a yelle masɛ mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, dee tɩ Farisi nẽra la yelle ka masɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ.» Tɩ ãna wʋ kɔm-pɩgsɩ tɩ tɩ tã'agɛ kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm Nẽrba basɛba n daan tarɩ kɔm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto.
La a karẽnbiisi la n yẽ bɛla la, ba zɛbɛ nẽrba la mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya kɔma la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kɔma wã bõnɔ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɔna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» Bõntarsa yelle Zifdõma nẽrzuo ayɩla n daan soke Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋɔ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ?» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fõn wi mam tɩ nẽr-sõŋɔ?
Nẽra ka boe n ãn sõŋa, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Fõn mi Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na: ‹Da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pɔga, da kʋ nẽra, da zũ, da tɔgɛ põmpɔrŋɔ kaseto, nanna fʋ sɔ la fʋ ma.› » Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «Halɩ mam bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm tɩ mam põn sakra bõn-bãma wuu.» Azezi n wõm ẽn yele bɛla la, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sɛla ayɩla n deege dɛna fʋ ẽŋɛ: Koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ ligri la pʋɩ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dɔla mam.» La bʋraa la n wõm bɛla la, tɩ a sũure ba sã'am, se'ere n soe la, a daan ba dɛna la bõntarsa.
Azezi n yẽ tɩ a sũure sã'am bɛla la, tɩ a yetɩ: «La tɔ mɛ bɔ bõntatba tɩ ba kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupĩim yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» Tɩ sɛba n wõm bɛla la yele yetɩ: «La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?» Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Bõn-sɛka tɩ nẽrsaalba ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ la, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma basɛ tõma n tarɩ sɛla mɛ dee dɔla fõn.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a yire, bɩɩ a pɔga, bɩɩ a sɔbiisi, bɩɩ a sɔ la a ma, bɩɩ a kɔma, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na ĩyã, a wʋn to'oge zo'oge gãnna ẽn basɛ sɛla la dũnia wã zuo, dee wʋn yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ wakat-sɛka n sẽm na.» Azezi le tɔgɛ a kũm, la a vo'ore yelle Azezi daan tarɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la mɛ yese kẽnkɛrŋa, ka yele ba yetɩ: «Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba yʋʋn gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la yelle la, wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ mɛ.
Ba wʋn yõkɛ ẽ mɛ ka ẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum, tɩ ba la ẽ, yaalɛ ẽ, tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mĩ ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa, dee kʋ ẽ.
La dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge.» La ba ka bãŋɛ ẽn yele se'em na võorɛ baa fẽe, yetɔga la daan sʋgɛ mɛ, tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ bãŋɛ yetɔga la võorɛ n boorɩ tɩ la yele se'em.
Azezi botɩ fʋa yẽta Azezi daan we'esɩ ka lɛm na Zeriko, tɩ fʋa zẽa sore kẽnkɛrŋa sɔsra, wõm nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la n tollɩ la dãmnɛ, soke yetɩ: «Bẽm ẽŋɛ?» Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra la n tollɩ.» Tɩ a tĩi tɔgra yetɩ: «Adavidi yɩɩŋa Azezi, zoe m ninbãalga.» Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe a nẽŋam na tãsɛ ẽ yetɩ a sĩna.
Tɩ a malɩn tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga.» Tɩ Azezi ze'ele, yetɩ ba tarɩ ẽ wa'am.
La ẽn lɛm Azezi la, tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bɔ fɔ?» Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, mam boorɩ tɩ m le yẽta mɛ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Le yẽta, fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã n botɩ fʋ yẽ laafɛ.» Bilam mẽŋa tɩ a le yẽta dɔla Azezi pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ nẽrba la wuu n yẽ bɛla la, mẽ nã'asra Nawẽnnɛ.
Azezi la Azase yelle Azezi daan dolɩ la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam tɔlla, tɩ bʋraa bɔna mĩ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azase.
A de la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba naba, dee dɛna bõntarsa.
A daan boorɩ tɩ a bãŋɛ la Azezi n de nẽr-sɛka.
A de la nẽr-gɩlga, la nẽrba la n zo'oge la ĩyã, a ka tã wʋn yẽ Azezi.
Tɩ a zoe tole nẽŋam sẽŋɛ Azezi n we zẽ'am bɔba la ka zom kẽnkãŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ Azezi.
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ zẽ'e-ẽŋa, gorge bɩsɛ kẽnkãŋa la zuo yẽ ẽ, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azase, sige tɔtɔ, se'ere n soe la, dẽnɩ tɩ mam gã'arɛ fõn yire zĩna.» Tɩ Azase sige tɔtɔ, to'oge ẽ sẽŋɛ a yire la sũ-yẽlga.
La nẽrba la n yẽ bɛla la, ba wuu yõnnɩ mɛ yetɩ: «A sẽŋɛ ka kẽ tɩ a bɔna la tõon-be'ero dãana la yire.» Tɩ Azase zɛ Azezi nẽŋam, yele ẽ yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, mam wʋn dɩkɛ m bõntarsõm pʋsʋka pʋɩ bɔ nasdõma.
La mam sãn pã'asɛ nẽrba to'oge ba sɛla, mam wʋn lebse bɔ ba nõor-anaasɩ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zĩna yi-ẽna dõma yẽ fãarɛ, se'ere n soe la, ẽna mẽ sɩrɩ de la Abraham yɩɩŋa.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am dũnia zuo tɩ a ɛ la nẽr-sɛba n bɔɩ la, fãagɛ ba.» Nabia, la a tõntõnɩba makrɛ Nẽrba la n daan selsrɩ Azezi yetɔga la, tɩ a makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba, se'ere n soe la, a daan lɛm na Zerizalɛm, tɩ nẽrba la tẽ'esra tɩ wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba wʋn yẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ diti na'am ba tẽŋasʋka.
Bɛla tɩ a makɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Nabia n yʋʋn yetɩ a sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ ka di na'am leme wa'am.
Ẽn yʋʋn yetɩ a sẽŋɛ la, a wi la a tõntõnɩba pia bɔ ba sãlma lag-kõbrɛ ayɩla ayɩla, yele ba yetɩ: ‹Dɩkɛ-ya ligri la lɛɛbra, tɩ m sẽŋɛ dee leme wa'am.› La a so'olʋm na nẽrba nifo kẽ ẽ mɛ, tɩ ẽn fõrgɛ la, tɩ ba tõm tõntõnɩba tɩ ba babsɛ ẽ ka yetɩ, bãma ka boorɩ tɩ a dɛna bãma naba.
La baa la bɛla a di na'am na mɛ, lebe kule ka basɛ tɩ ba wi tõntõn-sɛba tɩ a daan bɔ ba ligri la, tɩ ba wa'am tɩ a soke ba bãŋɛ, nẽra woo n leebe yẽ yõorɔ se'em.
Tɩ pɔspɔsɩ dãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M zuudãana, mam dɩkɛ fʋ sãlma lag-kõbrɛ la leebe yẽ la yõorɔ sãlma lig-kõba pia pa'asɛ.› Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Fʋ ẽŋɛ sõŋa, fʋ de la tõntõn-sõŋɔ!
Fõn ẽŋɛ sɩra la bõnɔ fẽe la ĩyã, fʋ wʋn sɔna tẽnsɩ pia bɩsra.› Tɩ bʋyi dãana la mẽ wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M zuudãana, mam dɩkɛ fʋ sãlma lagfɔ la leebe yẽ la yõorɔ sãlma lig-kõba banuu pa'asɛ.› Tɩ a yele ẽ mẽ yetɩ: ‹Fõn wʋn sɔna tẽnsɩ banuu bɩsra.› Tɩ ayẽma mẽ wa'am wa yetɩ: ‹M zuudãana, fʋ lagfɔ la n wãna, mam vile ẽ na tãnnɛ sʋgɛ, mam zotɩ fõn mɛ, se'ere n soe la, fõn de la nẽra yelle n tɔɩ.
Fõn to'orɩ la bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ mẽŋa ka tõm na yõorɔ, dee lagsra bõnkɔɔl-sɛba tɩ fõn ka bʋrɛ.› Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Fʋ de la tõntõn-be'ego, mam wʋn dɩkɛ la fʋ nõorɛ yetɔga la di fʋ sarɩya.
Fõn mi tɩ mam de la nẽra yelle n tɔɩ, tɔ'ɔra bõn-sɛba tɩ mam ka tõm na yõorɔ, dee lagsra bõnkɔɔl-sɛba tɩ mam ka bʋrɛ la, bẽm ĩyã tɩ fʋ ka tarɩ m ligri la ka bĩŋe bãnkɩ pʋam, tɩ m sãn leme wa'am tɩ m to'oge m ligri la, la yõorɔ?› Dee yele sɛba n boe bilam na yetɩ: ‹To'oge-ya lagfɔ la bɔ sɛka n tarɩ ligri pia la.› Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana, a põn tarɩ la ligri pia.› Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: ‹Mam yetɩ ya tɩ sɛka woo n tarɩ, a wʋn to'oge pa'asɛ.
La sɛka woo n ka tarɩ, a wʋn koŋe sɛla fẽe tɩ a tarɩ la.
La sãn dɛna mam bɛ'ɛba la n ka boorɩ tɩ mam di na'am na, tarɩ-ya ba wa'am wa kʋ ba mam nẽŋam.› » Azezi kẽ'erɩ Zerizalɛm la na'am La Azezi n daan tɔgɛ bɛla ba'asɛ la, a tole la nẽrba la nẽŋa tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm.
La ẽn daan sẽŋɛ ka lɛm Betɩfaazɩ, la Betani n boe Oliivi tãŋa zẽ'am na, a tõm na a karẽnbiisi bayi yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽn-sɛka n boe nẽŋa la pʋam.
Ya sãn paagɛ mĩ, ya wʋn yẽ bõn-biire tɩ ba lʋ ze'ele, tɩ nẽra nẽra nãn ka bã ẽ.
Ya lorge ẽ tarɩ wa'am.
La nẽra sãn soke ya yetɩ: ‹Wãne tɩ ya lɔrgra ẽ?›, ya lerge yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ.› » La ẽŋa n tõm sɛba la sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ, yẽ sɛla woo wʋ ẽn yele ba se'em na.
Tɩ ba lorge bõn-biire la, tɩ bõŋa la dõma soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya lɔrgra bõŋa la?» Tɩ ba lerge ba yetɩ: «Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ.» Tɩ ba tarɩ bõŋa la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, ka dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ Azezi bã.
La ẽn daan we la, nẽrba la yɛrgɛ la ba futo sore la zuo.
Ẽn daan lɛm Zerizalɛm na, a dolɩ la Oliivi tãŋa sore la sigra, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu n de a karẽnbiisi la ɩta sũ-yẽlga zẽkɛ ba kõosɩ pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ ke'enke'em, a tõon-yãlma tɩ ba yẽ la ĩyã, yɛta tɩ: «Pẽgɛ-ya na-sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.
Sũ-mã'asʋm boe la Nawẽnnɛ yire, nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum.» La Farisi dõma basɛba n boe nẽrba la pʋam yele Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tãsɛ fʋ karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba sĩna.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ba sãn sĩna, kuga wʋn kaasɛ tagurga.» Azezi kellɩ Zerizalɛm nẽrba ĩyã Azezi n daan lɛm Zerizalɛm yẽ tẽŋa la, a kellɩ mɛ tẽŋa la nẽrba ĩyã, yetɩ: «Ya sãn mi ni zĩna wã bõn-sɛka n wʋn bɔ ya sũ-mã'asʋm, la wʋn ãn nɩ sõŋa!
La, la sʋgɛ mɛ, tɩ ya nini ka yẽta ẽ.
La wakatɛ sẽm mɛ, tɩ ya bɛ'ɛba wʋn wa'am wa mẽ lalga gilge ya tẽŋa wã wuu gu, tɩ ya nẽrba kãn tã'agɛ yese.
Ba wʋn sã'am tẽŋa la wuu mɛ, dee kʋ yãma sɛba wuu n boe a pʋam na.
Ba wʋn sã'am ẽ saam saam mɛ, tɩ kugre kãn weege a tadãana zuo.
Bõn-bãna n wʋn ẽŋɛ la, de la yan ka bãŋɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ ya la ĩyã.» Azezi dige leebdõma Wẽnde-kãtʋm na Azezi n tɔgɛ bɛla ba'asɛ la, a kẽ la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra sɛba n koosrɩ la tɩ ba yɛsra, dee yele ba yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: ‹Mam deego wã wʋn dɛna la pʋ'ʋsgɔ deego.› La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgɔ zẽ'a.» La daarɛ woo a boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la nẽrzuto daan ɛɛra sore tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
La ba ka mi ba wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu daan ãn na sɛlɩ sɛlsra a yetɔga la.
Ãne n bɔ Azezi nõorɛ tɩ a tõnna?
Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na zãsna nẽrba, dee mõola kõ-yẽlga la bɔ'ɔra ba.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Yele to, fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna, bɩɩ ãne n bɔ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam mẽ wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla tɩ ya lerge ma: Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba?» Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: «Tɩ sãn yetɩ la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ĩyã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
La tɩ sãn yetɩ la de la nẽrsaalba, nẽrba la wuu wʋn lobe tɩ la kuga kʋ, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la sakɛ tɩ Azã daan de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa.» Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma ka mi sɛka n tõm ẽ.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɛla, mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ la zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãna wã.» Nẽrba n bɩsrɩ va'am makrɛ Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ ẽna bɔ nẽrba la yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n daan kɔ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, dɩkɛ va'am na bɔ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra, dee sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ ka yuuge.
Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna tɩ a sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am ka to'oge a pʋrɛ wa'am wa bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na wẽ ẽ, dee botɩ a lebe kule zãŋa.
Tɩ a le tõm a tõntõnna ayɩla ba zẽ'am, tɩ ba wẽ ẽ, dee yaalɛ ẽ, botɩ a mẽ lebe kule zãŋa.
Tɩ a le malɩn tõm ayɩla bʋtã pʋam, tɩ ba wẽ ẽ pɔglʋm, dee dige ẽ va'am na pʋam.
Tɩ va'am na dãana la tẽ'esɛ yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?
M yãŋa wʋn tõm na m mẽŋa bi-nõŋrɛ, tã tɩ ba wʋn nã'asɛ ẽŋa.› La sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na n yẽ va'am na dãana mẽŋa dayʋa la, tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: ‹Ẽna n wʋn wa sɔɔgɛ sɔna a sɔ bõntarsõm na, basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnɔ.› Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ ve'ege yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka kʋ ẽ.
Bɛla, va'am na dãana yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽr-bãna la wãne?
A wʋn wa'am wa kʋ nẽrba la mɛ, dee to'oge va'am na bɔ nẽrba basɛba tɩ ba bɩsra.» La nẽrba la n wõm bɛla la, ba yetɩ: «La kãn ẽŋɛ bɛla baa fẽfẽe.» Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba, dee yetɩ: «La bɛla võorɛ de la bẽm tɩ ba gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ: ‹Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la, lebge la kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa›?
La nẽr-sɛka n lui kug-ẽŋa zuo, a wʋn kɔ kɔ mɛ, la kugre la sãn lui nẽr-sɛka zuo, a wʋn mẽrgɛ ẽ mɛ.» Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la ɛɛra sore wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, ba bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ la de la bãma ĩyã tɩ a makɛ makrɛ la.
La ba zotɩ la nẽrba la.
Lampo yʋa yelle Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la pigra Azezi.
Bɛla tɩ ba tõm nẽrba n ãn wʋ ba de la nẽr-sõma la tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka bẽrɛ Azezi la yetɔga, tɩ a sãn tɔgɛ tuuge, tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ gɔmna n soe nõorɛ nu'usum.
Tɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ ka soke Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn tɔgrɩ se'em na, la fõn zãsnɩ se'em na masɛ mɛ, la fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba, dee zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla sɩra sɩra.
Bɛla, lɔɔ la bɔ sore tɩ tɩ yɔ lampo bɔ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, a ka bɔ sore?» Tɩ a bãŋɛ ba yɛmkẽgsɩga la, yele ba yetɩ: «Tarɩ-ya lagfɔ ayɩla wa'am.» Tɩ ba tarɩ wa'am.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «La de la Rom na-keko la.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee mẽ bɔ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka.» Azezi n daan tɔgɛ se'em nẽrba la nẽŋam na, ba ka tã'agɛ yõkɛ ẽ, a lergre la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba sĩna.
Kũm vo'ore yelle Saduse dõma n daan yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ: ‹Sɛka sɔbia sãn tara pɔga, ki dee tɩ a ka tara bia, a di a pɔkõorɛ la dɔgɛ kɔma bɔ sɛka n ki la.› La bʋraasɩ bayopɔɩ n daan boe dɛna sɔbiisi, tɩ pɔspɔsɩ dãana la di pɔga tɩ a ka dɔgɛ, dee tɩ a ki, tɩ bʋyi dãana la mẽ di pɔkõorɛ la ki, dee tɩ a ka dɔgɛ.
Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla.
La bãma bayopɔɩ la wuu lagɩm di pɔkõorɛ la mɛ ki, tɩ ba nẽra nẽra ka dɔgɛ bia.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pɔka la mẽ ki.
Bɛla, bãma bayopɔɩ la wuu n di pɔka la, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, ãne n wʋn sɔna pɔka la?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Dũni-ẽna nẽrba diti pɔgsɩ mɛ dee ɛlla sɩrba, la nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ tɩ ba masɛ tɩ ba vo'oge kẽ dũnia sɛka n sẽm pʋam na ka diti pɔgba, la ba ka ellɩ sɩrba.
La ba ka tã wʋn le ki, se'ere n soe la, ba ãn wʋ malɛkadõma la.
Ba de la Nawẽnnɛ kɔma, ban vo'oge dee basɛ kũm na ĩyã.
La Amoyisi yʋʋn põn pa'alɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ki la wʋn vo'oge mɛ, zẽ'e-sɛka n tɔgrɩ tũntuugo n diti bugum yelle la, Amoyisi yetɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n de Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakɔbɩ Nawẽnnɛ.
Bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ bãma vɔa mɛ, se'ere n soe la, Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la nẽr-sɛba n vɔa Nawẽnnɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am nẽrba la wuu vɔa mɛ, baa la sɛba n ki la.» Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma basɛba lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fʋ tɔgɛ sõŋa.» La ba daan ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sɛla sɛla.
Krisi de la naba Adavidi Zuudãana Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Wãne tɩ ba yetɩ Krisi de la Adavidi yɩɩŋa?
Dee tɩ Adavidi yʋʋn põn dẽŋɛ yele yõoma gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ, zĩ'ire m zʋʋgɔ bɔba, halɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba la tɩ ba bɔna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.› La Adavidi mẽŋa sãn wi ẽ yetɩ ‹Zuudãana›, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?» Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi tɩ ba guuse da ãna wʋ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma La nẽrba la wuu n selsrɩ Azezi la, tɩ a yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Guuse ya mẽŋa la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n eerɩ gilgra la fu-wogro, bɔɔra tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra nã'asra ba da'asʋm, dee bɔɔra nã'asgɔ zẽ'esɩ wẽndeto pʋam, la dia zẽ'esʋm tɩ ba zẽa la.
Ba to'osrɩ la sɛla wuu tɩ pɔkõpa tarɩ, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ba.
Ba wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu.»
Pɔkõorɛ bɔ'a yelle Azezi daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, bɩsɛ yẽ bõntatba n tarɩ ba bɔ'a ɩta ligri daka pʋam, dee yẽ pɔkõorɛ n de nasa n ẽŋɛ lig-kõb-pɩgsɩ bayi mã'a.
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ pɔkõorɛ ẽna n de nasa la ẽŋɛ zo'oge gãnna ba wuu mɛ.
Bãma wuu looge la bõntarsõm sɛba tɩ ba tarɩ zo'oge la pʋam wa'am wa ẽŋɛ mĩ.
La ẽŋa n de nasa la, dɩkɛ la a dia ligri wuu wa ẽŋɛ mĩ.» Dũnia ba'asgɔ nãmsgɔ, la Zerizalɛm sã'aŋɔ yelle La nẽrba basɛba n daan tɔgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la yelle yetɩ, ba dɩkɛ la kug-sõma mẽ ẽ, dee dɩkɛ bɔ'a tɩ ba bɔ Nawẽnnɛ malgɛ ẽ, tɩ a ãna sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ba wʋn lʋbɛ bõn-sɛba tɩ ya yẽtɩ wã wuu saam saam, tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo.» Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ la dabʋrɛ?
La bẽm wʋn pa'alɛ tõma tɩ tɩ bãŋɛ tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Guuse-ya tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: ‹Mam n de Krisi›, bɩɩ ba wʋn yetɩ: ‹Wakatɛ lɛm mɛ.› Da doose-ya nẽr-bãma.
La ya sãn wõm zɛbrɛ, la tẽn-dãmŋɔ yɛla, da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ya, dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma dẽŋɛ ẽŋɛ, la, la nãn ka de dũnia ba'asgɔ.» Dee yele ba yetɩ: «Buuri ayɩla wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla dõma isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma, la tẽŋa wʋn tĩi mĩim mɛ, la kɔm, la bã'a-loŋrɩsɩ n wʋn wa'am zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, la yel-kãra n kẽ'esrɩ nẽrba dabeem, la bõn-yãlma n wʋn ẽŋɛ saazuum.
La, lan dẽŋɛ bõn-bãna wã n wʋn ẽŋɛ, ba wʋn yõgɛ ya mɛ, nãmsɛ ya, tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ ka sãm ba wẽndetʋm sarɩyaditba zẽ'am, tɩ ba yʋ ya, la ba wʋn botɩ ya ze'ele na'adõma, la gɔmnadõma nẽŋam mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã.
La wʋn doose la bɛla tɩ ya yẽ folle tɔgɛ mam yelle pa'alɛ ba.
Bɛla, ẽŋɛ ya sũurum tɩ la dagɩ ya fabla yan wʋn lerge se'em po'oge ya mẽŋa.
Mam mẽŋa wʋn bɔ ya yɛm tɩ ya tɔgɛ tɩ ya bɛ'ɛba kãn yãŋɛ lerge sɩ'ɩsɛ ya yetɔga.
Baa la ya sɔdõma, la ya madõma, la ya sɔbiisi, la ya sɩrdõma wʋn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ ka bɔ, tɩ ba kʋ ya nẽrba basɛba.
Nẽrba wuu wʋn sise ya mam ĩyã.
La ya zomto baa ayɩla kãn bɔɩ.
Ya sãn ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ, ya wʋn yẽ vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
Ya sãn wa yẽ tɩ sʋdaasɩ gilgri Zerizalɛm, ya bãŋɛ tɩ a sã'aŋɔ lɛm mɛ.
Bɛla, nẽr-sɛba n boe Zude tẽŋa zoe zom tãnsɩ zuto, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe Zerizalɛm pʋam na yese zoe, la sɛba n boe vatʋm na da kẽ tẽŋa pʋam.
Dabsa bãma de la tõon-be'ero sɩbgrɛ dabsa tɩ bõn-sɛba wuu n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam na wʋn ẽŋɛ.
Wakat-ẽŋa, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bɔ pɔg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa, la sɛba n tarɩ bilɛɛsɩ tɩ ba mõgra la.
Se'ere n soe la, nãmsgɔ kãtɛ n wʋn wa'am tẽŋa wã pʋam, la Nawẽnnɛ sũure wʋn yĩige mɛ la tẽŋa wã nẽrba.
Ba wʋn kʋ basɛba mɛ la sʋkɔbrɔ, la ba wʋn yõgɛ basɛba mɛ tarɩ sẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ tẽnsʋm ka ẽŋɛ yamsɩ.
Bu-zãŋsɩ wʋn sã'am Zerizalɛm mɛ, halɩ tɩ ba wakatɛ wʋn wa ba'asɛ.» Azezi n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo «Bõn-yãlma n wʋn ẽŋɛ wẽntulle, la wõrga, la wõrbiɛ pʋam.
La dũnia nẽrba buuri wuu wʋn fabla mɛ zɛ yɛrɩ, ko-kãtɛ ko-mĩ'isi n wʋn tĩi wẽ'era ɩta voole la ĩyã.
La nẽrba wʋn tẽ'esra la bõn-sɛka n wʋn ẽŋɛ dũnia wuu zuo la, tɩ dabeem wʋn botɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ tɩ ba yɛm bɔɩ, se'ere n soe la, bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mĩim mɛ.
Wakat-ẽŋa ba wʋn yẽ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la boe wara pʋam sẽna la pãn-kãtɛ, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ.
La ya sãn yẽ tɩ bõn-bãna pɔsɛ ɩta, gorge-ya bɩsɛ saazuum, tɩ ya fãarɛ lɛm mɛ.» Azezi makɛ la makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Bɩsɛ-ya kẽnkãŋa, la tɩɩsɩ wuu.
Ya sãn yẽ tɩ ba võorɔ pusra, ya mẽŋa mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn yẽ tɩ bõn-bãna ɩta, ya bãŋɛ tɩ wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ɩta mɛ dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetɔga la kãn malɩn tole.
Guuse ya mẽŋa tɩ ya yɛm da yɔɔra la di tɩgɛ, la dã-yũure, la dũni-ẽna vɔm yɛla, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lemŋo daarɛ da wa di'ige ya wʋ bẽrgɔ la.
Se'ere n soe la, daarɛ ẽŋa wʋn wa di'ige nẽrba wuu n boe tẽn-gõŋɔ wã zuo mɛ.
Bɛla, da gĩsra-ya, pʋ'ʋsra-ya Nawẽnnɛ wakatɛ wuu, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ pãŋa tã'agɛ põsɛ bõn-sɛba wuu n wʋn wa ẽŋɛ la, dee tã'agɛ ze'ele Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nẽŋam.» Azezi daan ẽn zãsna la nẽrba Wẽnde-kãtʋm na wʋntɛɛŋa, tɩ yʋ'ʋŋɔ tɩ a ẽn yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ ka gã'arɛ Oliivi tãŋa la zuo.
La nẽrba wuu lagsrɩ la a zẽ'am Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ sɛlsra a yetɔga.
Azudaasɩ boorɩ tɩ a botɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma yõkɛ Azezi Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Zɔɔg-basɛ la daan dee la fẽe la a paagɛ.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la ɛɛra bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ Azezi, dee zɔta nẽrba la dabeem.
Tɩ Asũtãana kẽ Azudaasɩ tɩ ba wi'iri Iskariyo n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla sũurum.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la gu'urba nẽŋadõma zẽ'am, ka yele ba ẽŋa n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
Tɩ ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ ba yetɩ bãma wʋn bɔ ẽ ligri, tɩ Azudaasɩ sakɛ, ɛɛra sore tɩ a botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la da bãŋɛ.
Azezi diti Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la a karẽnbiisi Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la daarɛ tɩ ba kʋʋrɩ pebilsi dita Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la n daan paagɛ.
Tɩ Azezi tõm Apɩyɛɛrɩ la Azã yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya ka mãasʋm kibsa la dia tɩ tɩ wa'am wa di.» Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bɛ tɩ tɩ wʋn sẽŋɛ ka mãasʋm?» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Selse-ya, ya sãn ka kẽ'era tẽŋa la pʋam, ya wʋn tʋ'ʋsɛ bʋraaga n tʋ yoore la ko'om, ya doose ẽ kẽ yi-sɛka tɩ a wʋn kẽ la pʋam.
La ya sãn kẽ, ya yele yidãana la yetɩ: ‹Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, de-sɛka tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la wʋn di Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la boe la bɛ?› A wʋn pa'alɛ ya de-kãtɛ n boe ayẽma zuo, tɩ lɔgrɔ wuu bɔna mĩ.
Mãasʋm-ya bilam gu'ura to.» Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ sɛla woo wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, tɩ ba mãasʋm Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la.
Tɩ wakatɛ la paagɛ, tɩ Azezi zĩ'ire la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ ba di.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Mam ba bɔɔra mɛ la m sũure wuu tɩ mam na yãma di Zɔɔg-basɛ kibs-ẽna wã dee tɩ m yãŋa nãmsɛ.
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, mam kãn le di Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa halɩ tɩ a võorɛ wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.» Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yetɩ: «To'oge-ya bãna wã pʋɩ taaba yũ.
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ lɛɛlɛ wã kɔ'ɔn wɛ'ɛsa wuu, mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã halɩ ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn wa'am wa dita na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.» Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bɔ ba yetɩ: «Ẽna de la mam ĩyã tɩ mam dɩkɛ bɔ yãma ĩyã.
Ɩta-ya wãna tẽra mam yelle.» La ban di kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a dɩkɛ la bõn-yũula yetɩ: «Bõn-yũul-bãna pa'alɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bĩŋe la nõor-paalga, mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ bɔ yãma la ĩyã.
La bɩsɛ-ya, sɛka n yetɩ a botɩ ba yõkɛ mam na lagɩm na mam kalam dita.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ Nawẽnnɛ n boorɩ tɩ la ẽŋɛ se'em na.
La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na wʋn yẽ toogo.» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sɔkra taaba tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽr-sɛka n de ẽ bãma pʋam n yetɩ a ẽŋɛ bɛla.
Ãne n gãnnɩ?
Karẽnbiisi la daan wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ bãma pʋam nẽr-sɛka n masɛ tɩ a dɛna nẽr-keko gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Dũni-ẽna na'adõma soe nẽrba la pãŋa, la sɛba n tarɩ ke'eŋo la botɩ nẽrba wi'ira ba tɩ: ‹Sõm-ɩtba›.
La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla.
Sɛka n de nẽr-keko yãma pʋam, a ãna wʋ bõn-pɩka la, la sɛka n de nẽŋadãana ãna wʋ tõntõnna.
La ãne n de nẽr-keko gãnna, sɛka n zĩ dita la bɩɩ, sɛka n tõnnɩ bɔ'ɔra ẽ na?
La dagɩ sɛka n zĩ dita la?
La mam boe ya pʋam wʋ tõntõnna la.
Yãma de la nẽrba n mõrgɛ weege bɔna la mam, yel-sɛba n paagɛ mam na pʋam.
Bɛla mam wʋn bɔ ya so'olʋm, wʋ mam Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ mam so'olʋm se'em na, tɩ ya wʋn wa zĩ'ire mam so'olʋm pʋam dita dee yũura la mam, dee zĩ'ire na'am bĩmbĩna zuto di Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma buuri pia la ayi la sarɩya.» Azezi yetɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ ẽŋa La Azezi yele Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asimõ, Asimõ, bãŋɛ tɩ Asũtãana sose la sore tɩ a makɛ ya bɩsɛ, wʋ nẽra n yeele si yɛsra urgo la.
La mam pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ mɛ bɔ fɔ, tɩ fõn bɔ mam sɩra la, fʋ da basɛ.
La fʋ sãn wa leme wa dɔla mam, fʋ bɔ fʋ sɔbiisi la bʋraanɛ tɩ ba ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, mam sakɛ mɛ tɩ m kẽ yʋ'a deem la fõn, bɩɩ m ki la fõn.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Apɩyɛɛrɩ, mam yetɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ yʋ'ʋŋɔ ẽna wã, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ la nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam, dee tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kaasɛ.» Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi tɩ ba mãasʋm tɩ nãmsgɔ n wʋn wa'am La Azezi soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Mam n daan tõm yãma tɩ ya sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, tɩ yãma ka dɩkɛ pʋtmãanɛ, la tãmpɔkɔ, la tagra la, sɛla daan pɔ'ɔgɛ ya mɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Ayɛɩ.» Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Lɛɛlɛ wã, la ka le dɛna bɛla.
Sɛka n tarɩ pʋtmãanɛ, a dɩkɛ, la sɛka n mẽ tarɩ tãmpɔkɔ, a dɩkɛ.
La sɛka n ka tarɩ sʋkɔbgɔ, a koose a fuugo da sʋkɔbgɔ.
Se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ: ‹Ba dɩkɛ ẽ naagɛ la tõon-be'ero dõma›.
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ la de la mam tɩ bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ.
Asɩra, bõn-sɛka n gʋlsɛ tɔgra mam yelle la, yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ.» Tɩ ba yetɩ: «Zuudãana, bɩsɛ sʋkɔbrɔ bayi n wãna.» Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ la seke ya.» Azezi pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ Oliivi tãŋam Tɩ Azezi yese sẽŋɛ Oliivi tãŋam wʋ ẽŋa ẽn ɩta se'em na, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la doose ẽ.
La ẽn paagɛ mĩ na, a yele ba yetɩ: «Pʋ'ʋsɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui.» Dee basɛ ba sẽŋɛ zãagɛ fẽe masɛ wʋ nẽra n wʋn lobe kugre se'em, ka ka dũma tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «M Sɔ, fʋ sãn bɔɔra, basɛ tɩ nãmsgɔ ẽna tole dee basɛ ma.
La, da kãn ẽŋɛ mam n boorɩ se'em, ẽŋɛ fõn boorɩ se'em.» [ Tɩ malɛka ze'ele saazuum wa'am wa pa'asɛ ẽ pãŋa.
Tɩ Azezi sũure ba sã'am halɩ, tɩ a malɩn tĩi pʋ'ʋsra tɩ a mõrgrɛ tɔgra tẽŋa wʋ zɩɩm na.]
Ẽn daan pʋ'ʋsɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a lebe ka paagɛ a karẽnbiisi la zẽ'am, tɩ ba gĩsri mɛ, ba sũure n sã'am ĩyã, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ yãma gĩsra?
Isge-ya pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui.» Ba yõkɛ Azezi Azezi n daan ken tɔgra la, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e sẽnna paana.
Tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla bɔna ba nẽŋa, sẽŋɛ lɛm Azezi tɩ a kɔkɛ ẽ, pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azudaasɩ, fõn yetɩ fʋ kɔkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mɛ botɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ?» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la n ze a zẽ'a, yẽ lan yetɩ la ẽŋɛ se'em na yetɩ: «Zuudãana, tɩ dɩkɛ tɩ sʋkɔbrɔ la zɛbɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla dɩkɛ a sʋkɔbgɔ sɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna zʋʋgɔ tʋbrɛ fiige.
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya bɛla.» Dee kalʋm bʋraaga la tʋbrɛ la, tɩ a lebe tablɛ.
Dee yele kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la Wẽnde-kãtɛ la gu'urba nẽŋadõma, la kẽma n yetɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ la sʋkɔbrɔ, la dasa sẽna tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la?
Mam daan boe la ya lɛ mɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo, tɩ ya ka yõkɛ mam.
La wakat-ẽna wã ya tã wʋn ẽŋɛ yan boorɩ se'em, se'ere n soe la, la de la lika pãŋa dãana wakatɛ.» Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ tɩ ẽŋa ka mi Azezi La ba yõkɛ Azezi mɛ tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana yire, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ bɔna zãazãarɛ li'isra dɔla.
La ba tʋʋrɛ la bugum yire la zẽnzaka tẽŋasʋka lagsɛ zẽa, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ mẽ lagɩm na ba zẽa.
Tɩ tõntõn-pɔka ayɩla yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ n zĩ bugum na zẽ'am, bɩsra ẽ zĩi dee yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna mẽ dolɩ la Azezi.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ yetɩ: «Pɔka, mam ka mi ẽ.» Tɩ la le ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ nẽra ayẽma le yẽ ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn mẽ de la ba nẽra ayɩla.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Bʋraaga, mam dagɩ ba nẽra.» Tɩ la le ẽŋɛ fẽe masɛ wʋ karf-ayɩla, tɩ nẽra ayɩla le yetɩ: «Asɩra, bʋra-ẽna ẽn dɔla ẽ mɛ, a mẽ de la Galile nẽra.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Bʋraaga, mam ka bãŋɛ fõn tɔgɛ se'em na võorɛ.» La ẽn ken bɔna mĩ tɔgra la, tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kɔ'ɔn kaasɛ.
Tɩ Zuudãana la gelge bɩsɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ Zuudãana n yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ mam nõorɛ atã mɛ zĩna, dee tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kaasɛ la.» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yese yẽŋa ka kɛlla la sũ-sã'aŋɔ zozo'e.
Ba la Azezi mɛ, dee wẽ ẽ Bʋra-sɛba n gu'uri Azezi la daan la ẽ mɛ, dee wẽ ẽ, dɩkɛ fuugo vile a nẽŋa wẽ ẽ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bãŋɛ pa'alɛ tɔ sɛka n wẽ fɔ.» La ba tʋ ẽ na tʋʋrɛ basɛba zozo'e pa'asɛ.
Ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Zifdõma sarɩyaditba zẽ'am La beere n daan wiige, tɩ Zifdõma kẽma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma wuu lagsɛ tɩ ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ba sarɩyadia zẽ'am, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bĩŋe nõorɛ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na, fʋ yele to.» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam sãn yele ya, ya kãn sakɛ, la mam sãn soke ya sokre, ya mẽ kãn lerge mam.
La lɛɛlɛ wã kɔ'ɔn wɛ'ɛsa wuu, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn zĩ'ire Nawẽnnɛ n de pãn-kãtɛ dãana la zʋʋgɔ.» Tɩ ba wuu soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bɛla fõn sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Yãma n yele se'em na, mam de la bɛla.» Tɩ ba yetɩ: «Tɩ le ɛɛra la bẽm kaset-dõma?
Tõma mẽŋa wõm a nõorɛ yetɔga mɛ.»
Ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ gɔmna Apilatɩ zẽ'am Tɩ ba wuu tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka dõrɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma yẽ bʋra-ẽna tɩ a boe mĩ dãmna la tɩ tẽŋa wã dee yetɩ ba da yɔɔra lampo bɔ'ɔra Rom na-keko, dee ken yetɩ ẽŋa de la Krisi, ẽŋa de la naba.» Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La de la fõn yele se'em na.» Tɩ Apilatɩ yele kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la, la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la yetɩ: «Mam ka yẽ bʋraaga wã yel-sɛka n wʋn botɩ tɩ di a sarɩya.» Tɩ ba sĩna dee bʋla yetɩ: «A zãsŋɔ la tɩ a pɔsɛ zãsʋm Galile la Zude wa paam kalam na, tarɩ la dãmŋɔ sẽna nẽrba pʋam.» Ba tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ A'erɔdɩ zẽ'am Apilatɩ n wõm bɛla la, a soke mɛ tɩ a bãŋɛ, bʋra-ẽna sãn dɛna Galile nẽra.
La ẽn bãŋɛ tɩ a ze'ele la Galile n de naba A'erɔdɩ so'olʋm pʋam na, tɩ a botɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka bɔ naba A'erɔdɩ.
A'erɔdɩ mẽ daan boe la Zerizalɛm wakat-ẽŋa.
La A'erɔdɩ n yẽ Azezi la, a sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm mɛ halɩ, se'ere n soe la, a wõm Azezi yelle tɩ la yuuge mɛ, tɩ a bɔɔra tɩ a yẽ ẽ.
A tarɩ pʋtẽ'erɛ tɩ a wʋn tõm na tõon-yãlma tɩ a yẽ.
A'erɔdɩ daan soke Azezi la sokrɩsɩ zozo'e, tɩ a ka lerge ẽ.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n boe mĩ na dõrɛ ẽ zozo'e yetɩ, a tõm na be'em.
Tɩ A'erɔdɩ la a sʋdaasɩ yaalɛ ẽ, dɩkɛ fu-sõŋɔ yɛ ẽ, tɩ ba la ẽ, dee tarɩ ẽ lebe ka bɔ Apilatɩ.
Daar-ẽŋa, A'erɔdɩ la Apilatɩ n de bɛ'ɛba la taaba la, lebge la sɩtɔ.
Apilatɩ di Azezi sarɩya tɩ ba kʋ ẽ Tɩ Apilatɩ wi kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la nẽrba wuu yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ bʋra-ẽna wa'am wa bɔ mam yetɩ a tarɩ la dãmŋɔ sẽna nẽrba pʋam.
La mam n soke ẽ yãma nẽŋam kalam wã, mam ka yẽ a yel-sɛka n botɩ yãma dõrɛ ẽ na.
La A'erɔdɩ mẽ ka yẽ a yelle, bɛla tɩ a tarɩ ẽ leme wa'am wa bɔ tõma.
Bʋraaga wã ka tõm be'em n masɛ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
Mam wʋn botɩ ba wẽ ẽ mɛ la ka'asa dee basɛ ẽ tɩ a fõrgɛ.» [ Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa wakatɛ woo dẽnɩ tɩ Apilatɩ yese sɛba n boe yʋ'a deem nẽra ayɩla basɛ.]
Tɩ ba wuu kɔ'ɔn lagɩm tãsra yetɩ: «Kʋ bʋra-ẽna, dee yese Abarabasɩ bɔ tɔ.» Abarabasɩ daan dãmɛ na tẽŋa, kʋ nẽra, tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ yʋ.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le tɔgra la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la bɔɔra tɩ a basɛ Azezi.
Tɩ ba zagsɛ, dee kaasra yetɩ: «Ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo, ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.» Tɩ Apilatɩ le yele ba nõor-atã pʋam yetɩ: «Bẽm be'em tɩ a tõm?
Mam ka yẽ yel-sɛka tɩ a tõm tɩ la masɛ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
Mam wʋn botɩ ba wẽ ẽ na ka'asa dee basɛ ẽ.» Tɩ ba ken kaasra ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.» Tɩ ba kaasga la zo'oge gãŋɛ.
Tɩ Apilatɩ sakɛ ẽŋɛ ban boorɩ se'em na, yese bʋra-sɛka n daan dãmɛ tẽŋa kʋ nẽra la basɛ, ẽŋa tɩ nẽrba la boorɩ tɩ a basɛ, dee dɩkɛ Azezi bɔ sʋdaasɩ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ ẽ nẽrba la n boorɩ se'em na.
Ba ka Azezi dɔ-puurŋa zuo Ban tarɩ Azezi wɛ'ɛsa la, ba tʋ'ʋsɛ la Sirɛnɩ tẽŋa bʋraaga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele va'am lɛmna, tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ botɩ a to'oge dɔ-puurŋa la buke dɔla Azezi poore.
La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n dolɩ ẽ, tɩ pɔgsɩ kɛlla fabla wẽ'era nupʋ'ʋrɔ a ĩyã.
Tɩ Azezi wẽrgɛ ba bɔba yele ba yetɩ: «Zerizalɛm pɔgsɩ, da kɛlla-ya mam ĩyã, kɛlla-ya ya mẽŋa la ya kɔma ĩyã.
Se'ere n soe la, dabsa sẽna tɩ ba wʋn yetɩ: ‹Pɔg-kõndɔgrɩba, la sɛba n ka dɔgɛ, sɛba tɩ kɔma ka mõgɛ ba bĩ'isum tarɩ zu-yẽlga.› La nẽrba wʋn wa yele tãnsɩ tɩ ba lui dĩ ba, dee yele kũnkũma yetɩ, ba lile ba.
Se'ere n soe la, ba sãn ɩta dɔ-mã'asa wãna, la wʋn ẽŋɛ dɔ-kɛ'ɛsɩ la wãne?» La ba tarɩ la tõon-be'ero dõma bayi sẽŋɛ tɩ ba lagɩm ba la Azezi kʋ.
La ba paagɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Zuwaŋrɛ, bilam tɩ ba ka Azezi dɔ-puurŋa zuo, dee ka tõon-be'ero dõma bayi la dɔ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a zʋʋgɔ bɔba, ayɩla a gɔbga bɔba.
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «M Sɔ, basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ, tɩ ba ka mi ban ɩtɩ sɛla.» Tɩ ba dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ taaba, pɔsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge fu-sɛka.
La nẽrba la ze la bilam bɩsra ẽ, tɩ Zifdõma kẽma la la'ara ẽ yetɩ: «A fãagɛ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, a sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la, a fãagɛ a mẽŋa.» Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la mẽ la'ara ẽ, lɛm dɩkɛ dã-mĩ'isgo bɔ ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn dɛna Zifdõma naba, fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa.» La ba gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgɔ lablɛ a zuum yetɩ: «Ẽna wã de la Zifdõma naba la.» Tɩ tõon-be'ero dõma la n boe dɔ-puursi zuto la ayɩla tʋ Azezi yetɩ: «Dagɩ fõn de Krisi la?
Fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa dee fãagɛ tõma.» Tɩ ayẽma la tãsɛ a tadãana la yetɩ: «Fõn ka zotɩ Nawẽnnɛ?
Ba wʋn kʋ tõma wuu mɛ.
La sãn dɛna tõma, tõma n tõm tõon-be'ero la, la masɛ mɛ tɩ ba kʋ tõma, la nẽr-ẽna wã ka ẽŋɛ sɛla n de be'em.» Dee yele Azezi yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, fʋ tẽegɛ m yelle.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zĩna nõo fʋ wʋn bɔna la mam Nawẽnnɛ yire.» Azezi kũm -La daan de wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika, tɩ wʋntɛɛŋa ka le yẽkɛ halɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
Tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka.
Tɩ Azezi tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «M Sɔ, mam basrɩ m sɩa la fõn nu'usum.» A yele la bɛla dee ki.
Tɩ Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, nã'asra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Asɩra, bʋraaga wã de la nẽr-sõŋɔ.» La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu n wa'am tɩ ba bɩsɛ lan wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em na, yẽ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na mɛ.
Tɩ ba lebe kulla, dee wẽ'era nupʋ'ʋrɔ.
La nẽr-sɛba wuu n mi Azezi, la pɔg-sɛba n doose ẽ halɩ Galile wa'am na, ze la kẽnkɛrŋa bɩsra lan ɩtɩ se'em na.
Azezi laarɛ Bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n daan de Azozɛfʋ.
A de la Arimate tẽŋa nẽra, dee dɛna Zifdõma sarɩyaditba nẽra ayɩla.
A de la nẽr-sõŋɔ tɩ a ɩrgɔ wuu masɛ, la a daan gu'uri mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.
La ba sarɩyaditba la n daan looge yɛm tɩ ba ẽŋɛ se'em na, a daan ka sakɛ.
Azezi n ki la, ẽŋa n sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose Azezi kũm na, tɩ Apilatɩ sakɛ.
Tɩ a sike kũm na vile ẽ na tãnnɛ tarɩ ka bĩŋe yɔɔgɔ tɩ ba tũ tãmpĩa ĩyã nãn ka laagɛ nẽra mĩ pʋam.
La de la daar-ẽŋa tɩ Zifdõma mãasnɩ ba vo'osgo daarɛ.
Wẽnnɛ sãn kẽ tɩ ba vo'osgo daarɛ wʋn pɔsɛ.
Tɩ pɔg-sɛba n doose Azezi Galile wa'am na, doose Azozɛfʋ sẽŋɛ ka yẽ yɔɔgɔ la, dee yẽ ban bĩŋe Azezi kũm na se'em, dee lebe kule ka mãasʋm tɩdarɛ kaam buuri to'oto'ore tɩ ba tarɩ wa ẽŋɛ kũm na.
La vo'osgo daarɛ la ba vo'ose wʋ Amoyisi lɔɔ la n bɔ nõorɛ se'em na.
Azezi vo'ore Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ tɩ pɔgsɩ la isge dɩkɛ kaam na tɩ ba mãasʋm na tarɩ sẽŋɛ yɔɔm na.
Ban paagɛ la, ba yẽ tɩ kugre la tɩ ba dɩkɛ lige yɔɔgɔ nõorɛ la bilge mɛ gã kẽnkɛrŋa.
Tɩ ba kẽ yɔɔgɔ la pʋam bɩsɛ ka yẽ Zuudãana Azezi kũm na.
Tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, bilam mẽŋa tɩ ba yẽ bʋraasɩ bayi n ze lɛm ba, yɛ futo tɩ ba yẽgra.
Tɩ pɔgsɩ la palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba suure ba zuto tẽŋa.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ la soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ yãma ɛɛra nẽr-sɛka n vɔɩ sɛba n ki zẽ'am?
A ka boe kalam.
A vo'oge mɛ.
Tẽegɛ-ya ẽŋa n daan nãn boe Galile dee yele ya se'em na, a yetɩ, ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mɛ tarɩ ka bɔ tõon-be'ero dõma, tɩ ba ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo, la dabsa atã daarɛ, a wʋn vo'oge mɛ.» Tɩ ba yãŋa tẽegɛ a yetɔga la, ze'ele yɔɔm na lebe kule ka yele a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la, la nẽrba basɛba la wuu lan ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu.
Ba daan de la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azanɩ, la Azakɩ ma Amaari, la pɔgsɩ basɛba, bãma n daan tɔgɛ yel-bãna bɔ Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la.
La ba daan tẽ'esɛ tɩ pɔgsɩ la n yele ba se'em na ka tarɩ võorɛ, tɩ ba ka sakɛ tɩ la de sɩra.
La Apɩyɛɛrɩ isge mɛ zoe sẽŋɛ yɔɔm na ka veese bɩsɛ, yẽ tãna la mã'a, lebe kule ka zɛ yɛrɩ bõn-sɛba n ẽŋɛ la ĩyã.
Karẽnbiisi tʋ'ʋsɛ Azezi Emayusi sore zuo Daar-ẽŋa mẽŋa tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi bayi wɛ'ɛsa tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Emayusi.
Bilam na Zerizalɛm zãagɛ masɛ wʋ kilomẽtrɩ pia la ayɩla.
Ba daan tɔgrɩ la taaba bõn-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ la yelle.
La ban daan sõsrɩ la taaba la, tɩ Azezi lɛm ba, tɩ ba lagɩm sẽnna.
La ba yɛm lige mɛ, tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma sẽnna dee tɔgra la taaba?» Tɩ ba ze'ele zũŋe ba nẽnsɩ.
Tɩ ba nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Akleopasɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn mã'a n boe Zerizalɛm ka bãŋɛ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ dabsa wã pʋam?» Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm ẽŋɛ?» Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la, a de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa n tarɩ pãŋa a tõoma la a yetɔga pʋam, Nawẽnnɛ la nẽrba wuu nifum.
Tɩ tõma kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma botɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ, di a sarɩya yetɩ ba kʋ ẽ, tɩ ba ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo, tɩ a ki.
La tõma daan tarɩ pʋtẽ'erɛ tɩ la de la ẽŋa n wʋn fãagɛ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma la.
La zĩna de la dabsa atã n wãna tɩ yel-ẽna wã ẽŋɛ.
La tõma pɔgsɩ basɛba n botɩ tõma palẽŋa ẽkɛ.
Ba isge la bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ sẽŋɛ yɔɔm na, leme wa yele tõma yetɩ bãma ka yẽ kũm na, bãma yẽ la malɛkadõma, tɩ ba yele bãma yetɩ a vo'oge mɛ.
Tɩ tõma nẽrba basɛba mẽ sẽŋɛ yɔɔm na, ka yẽ tɩ la sɩrɩ ãn wʋ pɔgsɩ la n yele se'em na.
La ba ka yẽ Azezi.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Yɛm-ka-like dõma, bẽm tɩ ya ka bɔ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n yʋʋn yele se'em na wuu sɩra tɔtɔ?
La ka masɛ nɩ tɩ Krisi nãmsɛ la bõn-bãna wuu, dee yãŋa di a na'am na?» Tɩ a yãŋa pa'alɛ ba bõn-sɛba wuu n gʋlsɛ tɔgra ẽŋa yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõnnɔ la pʋam, a pɔsɛ pa'alɛ la Amoyisi, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la wuu n gʋlsɛ la võorɛ n de se'em.
La ban daan sẽŋɛ ka lɛm tẽn-sɛka tɩ ba we la, a ẽŋɛ wʋ a boorɩ tɩ a tole mɛ na.
Tɩ ba sose ẽ yetɩ: «Doose tõma kẽ gã'arɛ, se'ere n soe la, wẽnnɛ kẽ mɛ, zẽ'a boe mĩ sɔbra mɛ.» Tɩ a sakɛ doose ba kẽ.
La ba daan zĩ'ire mɛ tɩ ba di, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bɔ ba.
Tɩ ba yɛm yãŋa like, tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽŋa n de nẽr-sɛka.
Tɩ a bɔɩ ba nẽŋam bilam mẽŋa.
Tɩ ba yɛta taaba yetɩ: «Ẽŋa n tɔgɛ yetɔga la pa'alɛ tõma, dee tɔgra yel-sɛba n boe Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam pa'ala tõma sore zuo la, tõma sũure ka ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm zo'oge sɩra?» Tɩ ba isge wakat-ẽŋa lebe Zerizalɛm ka yẽ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la, la sɛba n boe ba zẽ'am na tɩ ba lagsɛ taaba mɛ.
Tɩ ba yele ba yetɩ: «Tɩ Zuudãana la sɩrɩ vo'oge mɛ, Asimõ yẽ ẽ mɛ.» Tɩ nẽrba bayi la mẽ yele ba bõn-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sore la zuo, la ẽŋa n fiisri borborɩ la, bãma n bãŋɛ ẽ se'em.
Azezi puke a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi Ban boe mĩ tɔgra bɛla la, tɩ Azezi darɛ wa'am wa zɛ ba tẽŋasʋka, yele ba yetɩ: «Sũ-mã'asʋm bɔna la ya.» Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ ba, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma yẽ la ki-isgne.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ya tẽ'esra pʋtẽ'era bʋyi bʋyi?
Bɩsɛ-ya mam nu'usi, la mam nãma, la de la mam.
Sa'abɛ-ya mam bɩsɛ, ki-isgne ka tarɩ nẽnnɔ, la kõba, wʋ yãma n yẽ mam n tarɩ se'em wã.» A tɔgɛ bɛla dee pa'alɛ ba la a nu'usi, la a nãma.
Ba sũure n ãn yẽlʋm dee tɩ la di'ige ba, tɩ ba ken ka bɔ sɩra, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ sɛla wʋn di kalam mɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ ba dɩkɛ zũn-sẽ'enɛ bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ a to'oge obe ba nifum bilam.
Bɛla poorʋm, a yele ba yetɩ: «Mam n daan ken bɔna la yãma la, mam n yele ya bõn-sɛba la n wãna.
Mam daan yele ya yetɩ: Dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-sɛba wuu n gʋlsɛ mam yelle Amoyisi lɔɔ gõnnɔ pʋam, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba gõnnɔ pʋam, la yõoma gõnnɔ pʋam na ẽŋɛ.» Tɩ Azezi like ba yɛm tɩ ba bãŋɛ bõn-sɛba n boe Nawẽnnɛ gõnnɔ pʋam na võorɛ, yele ba yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ yetɩ, Krisi la wʋn nãmsɛ mɛ ki, la dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ.
Ẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã tɩ ba wʋn pɔsɛ Zerizalɛm mõolɛ bɔ buuri wuu yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Yãma n de bõn-bãma wuu kaset-dõma wʋn pa'alɛ nẽrba wuu.
La mam wʋn tõm sɛka tɩ mam Sɔ daan bĩŋe nõorɛ bɔ ya la, tɩ a wa'am wa bɔna la ya.
Bɔna-ya Zerizalɛm gu'ura halɩ tɩ a ze'ele saazuum wa'am wa bɔ ya pãŋa.» Azezi zom Nawẽnnɛ yire Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi tarɩ ba mɛ tẽŋa la pʋam yese sẽŋɛ ka lɛm Betani, zẽkɛ a nu'usi saazuum kã kã'a-sõma bɔ ba.
Ẽŋa n boe mĩ kã'ara kã'a-sõma bɔ'ɔra ba la, a basɛ ba mɛ dee zom Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ ẽ, dee lebe Zerizalɛm la sũ-yẽlga zozo'e.
Ba daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa Azezi-krisi n de Yetɔga n bɔ'ɔrɩ nẽrsaalba vɔm Pĩ'iluŋo wakatɛ, Yetɔga la põn bɔna mɛ.
La Yetɔga la yʋʋn boe la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
Ẽŋa la Nawẽnnɛ de la bʋyɩla.
A põn bɔna la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am pĩ'iluŋo wakatɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ la ẽŋa n yʋʋn nãam sɛla woo.
Sɛla sɛla ka boe tɩ Nawẽnnɛ la ẽŋa ka nãam.
Ẽŋa n de vɔm dãana.
La de la ẽŋa n botɩ nẽrsaalba yẽta peelem.
Peelem na nẽegɛ lika pʋam mɛ, la lika ka yãŋɛ kĩŋe ẽ.
Nawẽnnɛ daan tõm na nẽra ayɩla, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azã.
A wa'am tɩ a tɔgɛ la peelem na yelle pa'alɛ nẽrba tɩ ba wuu wʋn tã'agɛ bɔ ẽ sɩra.
Azã mẽŋa dagɩ peelem na, la a wa'am tɩ a tɔgɛ la sɛka n de peelem na yelle pa'alɛ nẽrba.
Sɛka n de peelem sɩra sɩra la, ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am wa'am dũnia zuo.
Ẽŋa n nẽegɛ tɩ nẽrsaalba wuu yẽta peelem.
Sɛka n de peelem na daan wa bɔna la dũnia zuo.
Nawẽnnɛ la ẽŋa n yʋʋn nãam dũnia.
Baa la bɛla, nẽrsaalba ka boorɩ tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ.
A daan wa'am na a mẽŋa tẽŋa pʋam, la a nẽrba la ka to'oge ẽ.
La sɛba wuu n to'oge ẽ bɔ ẽ sɩra la, a bɔ ba nõorɛ mɛ tɩ ba lebge Nawẽnnɛ kɔma.
Ba ka lebge Nawẽnnɛ kɔma wʋ nẽrsaalba n dɔgrɩ se'em na, la ka de ĩyã n boorɩ se'em, bɩɩ nẽrsaala n boorɩ se'em.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ mẽŋa n botɩ ba lebge a kɔma.
Sɛka n de Yetɔga la daan lebge la nẽrsaala, kẽ'era tõma tẽŋasʋka.
Tõma yẽ a na'am pãŋa mɛ, na'am pãŋa n de Nawẽnnɛ Bi-yẽŋa n ze'ele a Sɔ zẽ'am na'am pãŋa.
La Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ, la a sɩra wuu boe la a zẽ'am.
La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ Azã daan tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Ẽna n de sɛka tɩ mam põn tɔgɛ a yelle yetɩ, nẽra ayẽma n boe mam poorʋm sẽna, ẽŋa gãnnɩ mam mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a dẽŋɛ mam mɛ bɔna.» Ẽŋa n botɩ tõma wuu yẽta yel-sõnnɛ woo yel-sõnnɛ, ẽn ba tara Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ na ĩyã.
Nawẽnnɛ bɔ a lɔɔ la Amoyisi, tɩ a bɔ tõma.
La, la sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ, la a sɩra la, la doose la Azezi-krisi tɩ a bɔ tõma.
Nẽra nẽra nãn ka yẽ Nawẽnnɛ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ Bi-yẽŋa la n boe la ẽ lɛ n botɩ tõma bãŋɛ ẽ, ẽŋa la Nawẽnnɛ de la bʋyɩla.
Azã bɔ Azezi kaseto Azã n daan bɔ kaseto se'em n wãna: Zifdõma nẽŋadõma sɛba n kẽ'erɩ Zerizalɛm na daan tõm na ba kãabgɔ kẽma, la Leviti dõma tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azã zẽ'am, ka soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la ãne?» Tɩ Azã tɔgɛ ba vẽelga yetɩ: «Mam dagɩ Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na.» Tɩ ba le soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la ãne?
Fõn de la A'eli bɩɩ?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam dagɩ A'eli.» Tɩ ba le soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa la n yetɩ a wa'am na bɩɩ?» Tɩ a yetɩ: «Ayɛɩ.» Tɩ ba le soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bɛla fõn de la ãne?
Tɩ tɩ tarɩ fõn lerge se'em na, sẽŋɛ ka tɔgɛ pa'alɛ sɛba n tõm tõma la.
Fõn mẽŋa yetɩ fõn de la ãne?» Ban soke ẽ bɛla la, tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam de la sɛka n mõolɛ weem tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: ‹Malgɛ-ya sore tɩ a dɛna tẽntẽa bɔ Zuudãana la› », wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn põn yele se'em na.
Nẽr-sɛba n daan sẽŋɛ Azã zẽ'am na, Farisi dõma n daan tõm ba.
Tɩ ba daan soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn sãn dagna Krisi la, bɩɩ A'eli, bɩɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa la, bẽm tɩ fõn misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam?» Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ: «La sãn dɛna mam, mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la nẽra ayɩla n boe ya tẽŋasʋka tɩ ya ka mina ẽ.
Ẽŋa wa bɔna la mam poorʋm, la mam ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra.» Bõn-bãna wuu daan ẽŋɛ la Betani, Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa la doone, zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ Azã daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na.
Azã pa'alɛ tɩ Azezi n de Nawẽnnɛ Pebila Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azã yẽ Azezi n sẽm a zẽ'am.
Tɩ a yetɩ: «Bɩsɛ-ya, ẽna n de Nawẽnnɛ Pebila n yesrɩ nẽrsaalba tõon-be'ero basra.
La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ mam daan yele yetɩ: ‹Nẽra n wa bɔna mam poorʋm dɛna nẽr-keko gãnna mam na, se'ere n soe la, a dẽŋɛ mam mɛ bɔna.› Mam daan ka mi ẽn de sɛka, la mam wa'am wa misra la nẽrba ko'om pʋam, tɩ m botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma bãŋɛ ẽ.» Azã le tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Mam yẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire sigra ãna wʋ na'adawenne, wa zoole a zuo.
La mam daan ka mi ẽ, la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm mam tɩ m mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, yele mam tɩ: ‹Fʋ sãn wa yẽ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n sige zoole sɛka zuo la, la de la ẽŋa n misri nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pʋam.› La mam yẽ ẽ mɛ, bɔ kaseto yetɩ, ẽŋa n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la.» Azezi pɔspɔsɩ karẽnbiisi Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azã daan le zɛ bilam la a karẽnbiisi bayi, yẽ Azezi n sẽnnɩ, tɩ a yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ Pebila la n wãna.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi bayi la wõm ẽn yele se'em na, isge dɔla Azezi.
Tɩ Azezi gelge yẽ ban dolɩ ẽ, soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma eerɩ la bẽm?» Tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: «Rabi, fõn kẽ'erɩ la bɛ?» (Rabi võorɛ de la karẽnsãama.)
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Wa'am-ya tɩ ya wʋn yẽ.» Tɩ ba doose sẽŋɛ ka yẽ ẽn kẽ'erɩ zẽ'a na, daan weege bɔna a zẽ'am daar-ẽŋa, la daan de wʋ wẽngɛlŋa karf-anaasɩ.
Nẽrba bayi la n wõm Azã n tɔgɛ Azezi yelle se'em doose ẽ na, ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la A'ãndre, a de la Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbga.
Tɩ A'ãndre dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka yẽ a kẽema Asimõ-pɩyɛɛrɩ, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma yẽ Mesi la.
La boorɩ tɩ la yetɩ Krisi.» (A võorɛ de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge.)
Tɩ a daan tarɩ Asimõ sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ ẽ, dee yetɩ: «Fõn de la Azã bia Asimõ.
Ba wʋn wi'ira fʋ tɩ Asefasɩ, bɩɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ.» (A võorɛ de la tãmpĩa.)
Azezi wi Afilipi, la Anatanayɛlɩ Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azezi bɔɔra tɩ a sẽŋɛ Galile, yẽ Afilipi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Dɔla mam.» Afilipi ze'ele la Betisayida tẽŋa, A'ãndre la Apɩyɛɛrɩ mẽ ze'ele la bilam.
Tɩ Afilipi sẽŋɛ ka yẽ Anatanayɛlɩ, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma yẽ sɛka tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ a yelle lɔɔ gõnnɔ pʋam, tɩ a yelle ken gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba gõnnɔ pʋam na.
A de la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ tẽŋa, Azozɛfʋ dayʋa.» Tɩ Anatanayɛlɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bõn-sõŋɔ tã wʋn ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ?» Tɩ Afilipi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Yi wa'am wa bɩsɛ.» Tɩ Azezi yẽ Anatanayɛlɩ n sẽm a zẽ'am, tɩ a tɔgɛ a yelle yetɩ: «Ẽna de la Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽra sɩra sɩra n ka tarɩ yelle.» Tɩ Anatanayɛlɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne mina mam?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn boe kẽnkãŋa la tẽŋa, lan dẽŋɛ Afilipi n wʋn wi fʋ la, mam yẽ fʋ mɛ.» Tɩ Anatanayɛlɩ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, la Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Mam n yele fõn tɩ mam yẽ fõn boe kẽnkãŋa tẽŋa la ĩyã, tɩ fʋ bɔ mam sɩra?
Fʋ wʋn yẽ bõn-kãra n gãnnɩ bõn-bãna.» Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire n yo'oge, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma zɔnna dee sigra Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la zuo.»
Pɔgdire kibsa n boe Kana tẽŋa La dabsa atã daarɛ, pɔgdire kibsa n daan boe Kana, Galile so'olʋm pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi ma daan bɔna mĩ.
Tɩ ba mẽ wi Azezi la a karẽnbiisi, tɩ ba wa'am kibsa la.
Tɩ dãam daan pɔ'ɔgɛ, tɩ Azezi ma yele ẽ yetɩ: «Dãam na pɔ'ɔgɛ mɛ.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «M ma, dagɩ fõn wʋn yele mam, mam n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em.
Mam wakatɛ nãn ka paagɛ.» Tɩ Azezi ma la yele tõntõnɩba la yetɩ: «Ẽŋa n yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ se'em wuu, ya ẽŋɛ.» La kuga dʋgrɔ bayoobɩ n daan boe mĩ tɩ Zifdõma daan tara pɛɛra ba mẽŋa wʋ ba sisgo n yetɩ ba ɩta se'em na.
Ko'om lɩtrɩ pinii bɩɩ kɔbga n daan pɩtɩ dʋkɔ ayɩla.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Ãgɛ-ya ko'om pɩrɛ dʋgrɔ la.» Tɩ ba ãgɛ pɩrɛ ba.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Kãbgɛ-ya tarɩ ka bɔ sɛka n bɩsrɩ dia yelle la.» Tɩ ba kãbgɛ tarɩ ka bɔ ẽ.
La sɛka n bɩsrɩ dia la yelle la n leme ko'om na, ba lebge la dãam, tɩ a ka mina ban ze'ele zẽ'a.
La tõntõnɩba la n ãgɛ ko'om na mi mɛ.
Tɩ sɛka n bɩsrɩ dia la yelle la wi pɔgdita la, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽra woo ẽn dẽŋɛ bɔ la dã-sõma, tɩ ba sãn wa yũ tɩgɛ, tɩ ba yãŋa bɔ'ɔra dã-sɛba n ka ba ãna sõŋa la.
La fõn dɩkɛ la dã-sõma ze'ele bɔ'ɔra poorʋm.» Ẽna n de Azezi pɔspɔsɩ tõon-yãlma tɩ a ẽŋɛ.
A ẽŋɛ ẽ na Kana Galile so'olʋm pʋam, pa'alɛ a na'am pãŋa, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la bɔ ẽ sɩra.
Bɛla poorʋm, ẽŋa la a ma, la a yɩbsɩ, la a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm.
Ba kẽ bilam na dabsa fẽe.
Azezi dige leebdõma Wẽnde-kãtʋm La Zifdõma Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa daarɛ n daan lɛm, tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm, ka kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam yẽ nẽrba n koosrɩ niigi, la piisi, la na'adawɛma, la lig-tɛɛrba n zĩ mĩ.
Tɩ a dɩkɛ mĩ'isi ẽŋɛ ka'asrɛ dige ba, la niigi, la piisi la wuu Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam tɩ ba yese, dee zã'agɛ lig-tɛɛrba la taablɩdõma lʋbɛ, tɩ ba ligri la ka'asɛ.
Dee yele sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma la yetɩ: «Tarɩ-ya ba yese.
Da dɩkɛ-ya mam Sɔ deego la ẽŋɛ leebgo zẽ'a.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la tẽegɛ tɩ la gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ, fõn deego la nõŋlʋm tɩ mam tarɩ la, wʋn di mam wʋ bugum na.» Tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma soke ẽ yetɩ: «Tõon-yãlma kãna tɩ fõn wʋn ẽŋɛ pa'alɛ tõma tɩ fõn tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ wãna?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Sã'am-ya Wẽnde-kãtɛ wã, tɩ mam wʋn le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam.» Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Ba dɩkɛ la yʋʋma pinaasɩ la ayoobɩ mẽ Wẽnde-ẽna wã, tɩ fõn yetɩ, fõn wʋn mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam?» La Azezi n tɔgrɩ Wẽndeego yelle la, la de la a mẽŋa ĩyã yelle tɩ a tɔgrɩ.
La Azezi n daan wa ki dee vo'oge la, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la tẽegɛ tɩ a daan yele la wãna, tɩ ba bɔ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ yetɔga, la Azezi n daan yele se'em na sɩra.
Azezi mi nẽrsaala woo tagsgɔ La Azezi n daan boe Zerizalɛm Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la, nẽrba zozo'e n daan yẽ tɩ a tõnnɩ tõon-yãlma, tɩ ba bɔ ẽ sɩra.
La Azezi daan ka dɩkɛ a sũure wuu pa'alɛ ba, se'ere n soe la, a mi ba wuu mɛ.
A ka eerɩ tɩ nẽra tɔgɛ nẽrsaalba yelle bɔ ẽ, se'ere n soe la, a mi bõn-sɛka n boe nẽrsaalba sũure pʋam mɛ.
Azezi la Anikodɛm Bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe Farisi dõma pʋam tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Anikodɛm.
A daan de la Zifdõma nẽŋadãana.
Bʋra-ẽŋa daan wa'am na Azezi zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋɔ wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tõm fõn tɩ fʋ dɛna karẽnsãama, se'ere n soe la, nẽra ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-yãlma wʋ fõn ɩtɩ se'em wã wuu, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ n boe la a dãana.» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn ka yẽ dɔg-paalga, a ka tã wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm.» Tɩ Anikodɛm soke ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽra n kʋrgɛ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ ba le tã'agɛ dɔgɛ ẽ paalga?
A wʋn le tã'agɛ mɛ kẽ a ma pʋʋrʋm tɩ ba le dɔgɛ ẽ bɩɩ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn ka dɔgɛ la ko'om, la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, a ka tã wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
Nẽrsaala n dɔgɛ sɛka la de la nẽrsaala, la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n dɔgɛ sɛka la tarɩ la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa vɔm.
Da basɛ tɩ la di'ige fo, mam n yetɩ: Dẽnɩ tɩ ba le dɔgɛ ya la ĩyã.
Kʋsebgo vugri la ẽn boorɩ zẽ'a, tɩ fʋ wõnna a dãmnɛ, dee ka mina ẽn ze'ele zẽ'a sẽna, la ẽn we'esɩ zẽ'a.
Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n dɔgɛ sɛka la ãna bɛla.» Tɩ Anikodɛm le soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne ẽŋɛ?» Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de Ɩsrayɛlɩ karẽnsãam-kɛ'ɛma dee ken ka mina bõn-ẽna?
Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra sɩra, tɩ tõma tɔgrɩ la sɛla tɩ tõma mi, dee yɛta sɛla tɩ tõma yẽ.
La ya ka sakɛ tõma yetɔga la.
Mam sãn tɔgɛ dũnia wã yɛla pa'alɛ ya, tɩ ya ka sakɛ, mam sãn tɔgɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire yɛla pa'alɛ ya, ya wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne sakɛ?
Nẽra nẽra nãn ka zom Nawẽnnɛ yire, sãn dagna Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire sige.
Wʋ Amoyisi n yʋʋn zẽkɛ bõnsɛla dɔɔgɔ zuo weego pʋam se'em na, dẽnɩ tɩ ba zẽkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ bɛla.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n bɔ ẽ sɩra wʋn tara vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ.» Nawẽnnɛ nõŋɛ nẽrsaalba mɛ halɩ, tɩ a tõm a Bi-yẽŋa dũnia zuo, tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n bɔ ẽ sɩra kãn sã'am, la a wʋn yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ.
Nawẽnnɛ ka tõm a Dayʋa la dũnia tɩ a di nẽrba sarɩya sɩbgɛ ba, a tõm ẽ tɩ a fãagɛ ba mɛ basɛ.
La sɛka n bɔ ẽ sɩra, ba kãn di a sarɩya.
La sɛka n ka bɔ ẽ sɩra la, a põn koŋe bʋʋrɔ mɛ, ẽn ka bɔ Nawẽnnɛ Bi-yẽŋa la sɩra la ĩyã.
Bõn-ẽna n de sarɩyadia la: Peelem wa'am dũnia pʋam mɛ, la nẽrsaalba nõŋɛ la lika gãnna peelem na, ba tõoma n de tõon-be'ero la ĩyã.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n tõnnɩ tõon-be'ero sisri peelem mɛ, a ka sẽm peelem pʋam, a zotɩ mɛ tɩ a tõoma la wʋn puke.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n tõnnɩ sɩra sẽm na peelem zẽ'am, tɩ a tõoma la pa'alɛ tɩ a sakrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ.
Azã tɔgɛ Azezi yelle Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi la a karẽnbiisi sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm ka bɔna bilam misra nẽrba ko'om pʋam.
Tɩ Azã mẽ daan bɔna Enõ tẽŋa n lɛm Salim tẽŋa la misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam, se'ere n soe la, ko'om n daan boe mĩ zo'oge.
Tɩ nẽrba sẽnna, tɩ a misra ba.
Wakat-ẽŋa ba daan nãn ka kẽ'esɛ Azã yʋ'a deem.
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi basɛba, la Zifdõma nẽra daan wẽ'era nõke'ene, Zifdõma sisgo n yetɩ ba pɛɛra ba mẽŋa malgra la yelle.
